69 #ifdef TRACE_ENABLE_ITT
70 static __itt_string_handle* itt_handle_pre = __itt_string_handle_create( "ALF_pre" );
71 static __itt_domain* itt_domain_ALF_pre = __itt_domain_create( "ALFPre" );

73 
74 struct FilterIdxCount
75 {
76  uint64_t count;
77  uint8_t filterIdx;
78 };
79 
80 bool compareCounts(FilterIdxCount a, FilterIdxCount b) { return a.count > b.count; }
81 
82 #define AlfCtx(c) SubCtx( Ctx::Alf, c)
83 
84 void AlfCovariance::getClipMax(const AlfFilterShape& alfShape, int *clip_max) const
85 {
86  for( int k = 0; k < numCoeff-1; ++k )
87  {
88  clip_max[k] = 0;
89 
90  bool inc = true;
91  while( inc && clip_max[k]+1 < numBins && y[clip_max[k]+1][k] == y[clip_max[k]][k] )
92  {
93  for( int l = 0; inc && l < numCoeff; ++l )
94  if( E[clip_max[k]][0][k][l] != E[clip_max[k]+1][0][k][l] )
95  {
96  inc = false;
97  }
98  if( inc )
99  {
100  ++clip_max[k];
101  }
102  }
103  }
104  clip_max[numCoeff-1] = 0;
105 }
106 
107 void AlfCovariance::reduceClipCost(const AlfFilterShape& alfShape, int *clip) const
108 {
109  for( int k = 0; k < numCoeff-1; ++k )
110  {
111  bool dec = true;
112  while( dec && clip[k] > 0 && y[clip[k]-1][k] == y[clip[k]][k] )
113  {
114  for( int l = 0; dec && l < numCoeff; ++l )
115  if( E[clip[k]][clip[l]][k][l] != E[clip[k]-1][clip[l]][k][l] )
116  {
117  dec = false;
118  }
119  if( dec )
120  {
121  --clip[k];
122  }
123  }
124  }
125 }
126 
127 double AlfCovariance::optimizeFilter(const AlfFilterShape& alfShape, int* clip, double *f, bool optimize_clip) const
128 {
129  const int size = alfShape.numCoeff;
130  int clip_max[MAX_NUM_ALF_LUMA_COEFF];
131 
132  double err_best, err_last;
133 
134  TE kE;
135  Ty ky;
136 
137  if( optimize_clip )
138  {
139  // Start by looking for min clipping that has no impact => max_clipping
140  getClipMax(alfShape, clip_max);
141  for (int k=0; k<size; ++k)
142  {
143  clip[k] = std::max(clip_max[k], clip[k]);
144  clip[k] = std::min(clip[k], numBins-1);
145  }
146  }
147 
148  setEyFromClip( clip, kE, ky, size );
149 
150  gnsSolveByChol( kE, ky, f, size );
151  err_best = calculateError( clip, f, size );
152 
153  int step = optimize_clip ? (numBins+1)/2 : 0;
154 
155  while( step > 0 )
156  {
157  double err_min = err_best;
158  int idx_min = -1;
159  int inc_min = 0;
160 
161  for( int k = 0; k < size-1; ++k )
162  {
163  if( clip[k] - step >= clip_max[k] )
164  {
165  clip[k] -= step;
166  ky[k] = y[clip[k]][k];
167  for( int l = 0; l < size; l++ )
168  {
169  kE[k][l] = E[clip[k]][clip[l]][k][l];
170  kE[l][k] = E[clip[l]][clip[k]][l][k];
171  }
172 
173  gnsSolveByChol( kE, ky, f, size );
174  err_last = calculateError( clip, f, size );
175 
176  if( err_last < err_min )
177  {
178  err_min = err_last;
179  idx_min = k;
180  inc_min = -step;
181  }
182  clip[k] += step;
183  }
184  if( clip[k] + step < numBins )
185  {
186  clip[k] += step;
187  ky[k] = y[clip[k]][k];
188  for( int l = 0; l < size; l++ )
189  {
190  kE[k][l] = E[clip[k]][clip[l]][k][l];
191  kE[l][k] = E[clip[l]][clip[k]][l][k];
192  }
193 
194  gnsSolveByChol( kE, ky, f, size );
195  err_last = calculateError( clip, f, size );
196 
197  if( err_last < err_min )
198  {
199  err_min = err_last;
200  idx_min = k;
201  inc_min = step;
202  }
203  clip[k] -= step;
204 
205  }
206  ky[k] = y[clip[k]][k];
207  for( int l = 0; l < size; l++ )
208  {
209  kE[k][l] = E[clip[k]][clip[l]][k][l];
210  kE[l][k] = E[clip[l]][clip[k]][l][k];
211  }
212  }
213 
214  if( idx_min >= 0 )
215  {
216  err_best = err_min;
217  clip[idx_min] += inc_min;
218  ky[idx_min] = y[clip[idx_min]][idx_min];
219  for( int l = 0; l < size; l++ )
220  {
221  kE[idx_min][l] = E[clip[idx_min]][clip[l]][idx_min][l];
222  kE[l][idx_min] = E[clip[l]][clip[idx_min]][l][idx_min];
223  }
224  }
225  else
226  {
227  --step;
228  }
229  }
230 
231  if( optimize_clip ) {
232  // test all max
233  for( int k = 0; k < size-1; ++k )
234  {
235  clip_max[k] = 0;
236  }
237  TE kE_max;
238  Ty ky_max;
239  setEyFromClip( clip_max, kE_max, ky_max, size );
240 
241  gnsSolveByChol( kE_max, ky_max, f, size );
242  err_last = calculateError( clip_max, f, size );
243  if( err_last < err_best )
244  {
245  err_best = err_last;
246  for (int k=0; k<size; ++k)
247  {
248  clip[k] = clip_max[k];
249  }
250  }
251  else
252  {
253  // update clip to reduce coding cost
254  reduceClipCost(alfShape, clip);
255 
256  // update f with best solution
257  gnsSolveByChol( kE, ky, f, size );
258  }
259  }
260 
261  return err_best;
262 }
263 
264 template<>
265 double AlfCovariance::calcDiffErrorForCoeffs<false>( const int *clip, const int *coeff, const int numCoeff, const int coeffBefore, const int coeffAfter, const int coeffPos, const double invFactor ) const
266 {
267  double error = 0;
268  const int coeffDiff = (coeffAfter-coeffBefore);
269  for( int i = 0; i < numCoeff; i++ )
270  {
271  if( i == coeffPos )
272  {
273  double sum = 0;
274  for( int j = i + 1; j < numCoeff; j++ )
275  {
276  sum += E[0][0][i][j] * coeff[j];
277  }
278  error += (invFactor * sum - y[0][i]) * coeffDiff * 2;
279  error += invFactor * ( E[0][0][i][i] * (coeffAfter * coeffAfter - coeffBefore * coeffBefore));
280  break;
281  }
282  else
283  {
284  for( int j = i + 1; j < numCoeff; j++ )
285  {
286  if( j == coeffPos )
287  {
288  error += 2 * invFactor * E[0][0][i][j] * coeffDiff * coeff[i];
289  }
290  }
291  }
292  }
293 
294  return error * invFactor;
295 }
296 
297 template<>
298 double AlfCovariance::calcDiffErrorForCoeffs<true>( const int *clip, const int *coeff, const int numCoeff, const int coeffBefore, const int coeffAfter, const int coeffPos, const double invFactor ) const
299 {
300  double error = 0;
301  const int coeffDiff = (coeffAfter-coeffBefore);
302  for( int i = 0; i < numCoeff; i++ )
303  {
304  if( i == coeffPos )
305  {
306  double sum = 0;
307  for( int j = i + 1; j < numCoeff; j++ )
308  {
309  sum += E[clip[i]][clip[j]][i][j] * coeff[j];
310  }
311  error += (invFactor * sum - y[clip[i]][i]) * coeffDiff * 2;
312  error += invFactor * ( E[clip[i]][clip[i]][i][i] * (coeffAfter * coeffAfter - coeffBefore * coeffBefore));
313  break;
314  }
315  else
316  {
317  for( int j = i + 1; j < numCoeff; j++ )
318  {
319  if( j == coeffPos )
320  {
321  error += 2 * invFactor * E[clip[i]][clip[j]][i][j] * coeffDiff * coeff[i];
322  }
323  }
324  }
325  }
326 
327  return error * invFactor;
328 }
329 
330 
331 
332 template<int numCoeff>
333 static double calcErrorForCoeffsLin( const AlfCovariance::TKE& E, const AlfCovariance::TKy& y, const int* coeff, const double invFactor )
334 {
335  double error = 0;
336 
337  for( int i = 0; i < numCoeff; i++ ) //diagonal
338  {
339  double sum = 0;
340  for( int j = i + 1; j < numCoeff; j++ )
341  {
342  // E[j][i] = E[i][j], sum will be multiplied by 2 later
343  sum += E[0][0][i][j] * coeff[j];
344  }
345  error += ( ( E[0][0][i][i] * coeff[i] + sum * 2 ) * invFactor - 2 * y[0][i] ) * coeff[i];
346  }
347 
348  return error * invFactor;
349 }
350 
351 #if defined( TARGET_SIMD_X86 ) && ENABLE_SIMD_OPT_ALF
352 static double calcErrorForCoeffsLin_13_SSE( const AlfCovariance::TKE& E, const AlfCovariance::TKy& y, const int* coeff, const double invFactor )
353 {
354  double error = 0;
355 
356  const __m128d mzero = _mm_setzero_pd();
357  const __m128d minvf = _mm_set1_pd( invFactor );
358  const __m128d mtwo = _mm_set1_pd( 2.0 );
359 
360  __m128d merror = _mm_setzero_pd(), msum0, msum1;
361  __m128d mcoef1 = _mm_cvtepi32_pd( _mm_loadl_epi64( ( const __m128i* ) &coeff [1] ) );
362  __m128d mcoef3 = _mm_cvtepi32_pd( _mm_loadl_epi64( ( const __m128i* ) &coeff [3] ) );
363  __m128d mcoef5 = _mm_cvtepi32_pd( _mm_loadl_epi64( ( const __m128i* ) &coeff [5] ) );
364  __m128d mcoef7 = _mm_cvtepi32_pd( _mm_loadl_epi64( ( const __m128i* ) &coeff [7] ) );
365  __m128d mcoef9 = _mm_cvtepi32_pd( _mm_loadl_epi64( ( const __m128i* ) &coeff [9] ) );
366  __m128d mcoef11 = _mm_cvtepi32_pd( _mm_loadl_epi64( ( const __m128i* ) &coeff[11] ) );
367 
368 
369  __m128d mE1 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][0][ 1] );
370  __m128d mE3 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][0][ 3] );
371  __m128d mE5 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][0][ 5] );
372  __m128d mE7 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][0][ 7] );
373  __m128d mE9 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][0][ 9] );
374  __m128d mE11 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][0][11] );
375 
376  mE1 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef1, mE1 );
377  mE3 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef3, mE3 );
378  mE5 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef5, mE5 );
379  mE7 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef7, mE7 );
380  mE9 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef9, mE9 );
381  mE11 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef11, mE11 );
382 
383  msum0 = _mm_add_pd( _mm_add_pd( mE1, mE3 ), _mm_add_pd( _mm_add_pd( mE5, mE7 ), _mm_add_pd( mE9, mE11 ) ) );
384 
385 
386  mcoef1 = _mm_blend_pd( mcoef1, mzero, 1 );
387 
388  mE1 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][1][ 1] );
389  mE3 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][1][ 3] );
390  mE5 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][1][ 5] );
391  mE7 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][1][ 7] );
392  mE9 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][1][ 9] );
393  mE11 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][1][11] );
394 
395  mE1 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef1, mE1 );
396  mE3 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef3, mE3 );
397  mE5 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef5, mE5 );
398  mE7 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef7, mE7 );
399  mE9 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef9, mE9 );
400  mE11 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef11, mE11 );
401 
402  msum1 = _mm_add_pd( _mm_add_pd( mE1, mE3 ), _mm_add_pd( _mm_add_pd( mE5, mE7 ), _mm_add_pd( mE9, mE11 ) ) );
403 
404  msum0 = _mm_hadd_pd( msum0, msum1 );
405 
406 
407 
408  __m128d mcoef = _mm_cvtepi32_pd( _mm_loadl_epi64( ( const __m128i* ) &coeff[0] ) );
409  __m128d my = _mm_loadu_pd( &y[0][0] );
410  __m128d mE = _mm_setr_pd( E[0][0][0][0], E[0][0][1][1] );
411 
412  mE1 = _mm_mul_pd( mE, mcoef );
413  mE3 = _mm_mul_pd( msum0, mtwo );
414  mE1 = _mm_add_pd( mE1, mE3 );
415  mE1 = _mm_mul_pd( mE1, minvf );
416  mE3 = _mm_mul_pd( mtwo, my );
417  mE1 = _mm_sub_pd( mE1, mE3 );
418  mE1 = _mm_mul_pd( mE1, mcoef );
419  merror = _mm_add_pd( merror, mE1 );
420 
421  //error += ( ( E[0][0][0][0] * coeff[0] + sum0 * 2 ) * invFactor - 2 * y[0][0] ) * coeff[0];
422  //error += ( ( E[0][0][1][1] * coeff[1] + sum1 * 2 ) * invFactor - 2 * y[0][1] ) * coeff[1];
423 
424 
425 
426  //mcoef1 = _mm_blend_pd( mcoef1, mzero, 1 );
427 
428  //mE1 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][2][ 1] );
429  mE3 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][2][ 3] );
430  mE5 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][2][ 5] );
431  mE7 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][2][ 7] );
432  mE9 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][2][ 9] );
433  mE11 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][2][11] );
434 
435  //mE1 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef1, mE1 );
436  mE3 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef3, mE3 );
437  mE5 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef5, mE5 );
438  mE7 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef7, mE7 );
439  mE9 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef9, mE9 );
440  mE11 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef11, mE11 );
441 
442  msum0 = _mm_add_pd( mE3, _mm_add_pd( _mm_add_pd( mE5, mE7 ), _mm_add_pd( mE9, mE11 ) ) );
443 
444 
445  mcoef3 = _mm_blend_pd( mcoef3, mzero, 1 );
446 
447  //mE1 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][3][ 1] );
448  mE3 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][3][ 3] );
449  mE5 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][3][ 5] );
450  mE7 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][3][ 7] );
451  mE9 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][3][ 9] );
452  mE11 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][3][11] );
453 
454  //mE1 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef1, mE1 );
455  mE3 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef3, mE3 );
456  mE5 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef5, mE5 );
457  mE7 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef7, mE7 );
458  mE9 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef9, mE9 );
459  mE11 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef11, mE11 );
460 
461  msum1 = _mm_add_pd( mE3, _mm_add_pd( _mm_add_pd( mE5, mE7 ), _mm_add_pd( mE9, mE11 ) ) );
462  msum0 = _mm_hadd_pd( msum0, msum1 );
463 
464 
465 
466  mcoef = _mm_cvtepi32_pd( _mm_loadl_epi64( ( const __m128i* ) &coeff[2] ) );
467  my = _mm_loadu_pd( &y[0][2] );
468  mE = _mm_setr_pd( E[0][0][2][2], E[0][0][3][3] );
469 
470  mE1 = _mm_mul_pd( mE, mcoef );
471  mE3 = _mm_mul_pd( msum0, mtwo );
472  mE1 = _mm_add_pd( mE1, mE3 );
473  mE1 = _mm_mul_pd( mE1, minvf );
474  mE3 = _mm_mul_pd( mtwo, my );
475  mE1 = _mm_sub_pd( mE1, mE3 );
476  mE1 = _mm_mul_pd( mE1, mcoef );
477  merror = _mm_add_pd( merror, mE1 );
478 
479  //error += ( ( E[0][0][2][2] * coeff[2] + sum0 * 2 ) * invFactor - 2 * y[0][2] ) * coeff[2];
480  //error += ( ( E[0][0][3][3] * coeff[3] + sum1 * 2 ) * invFactor - 2 * y[0][3] ) * coeff[3];
481 
482 
483 
484  //mcoef3 = _mm_blend_pd( mcoef3, mzero, 1 );
485 
486  //mE1 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][4][ 1] );
487  //mE3 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][4][ 3] );
488  mE5 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][4][ 5] );
489  mE7 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][4][ 7] );
490  mE9 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][4][ 9] );
491  mE11 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][4][11] );
492 
493  //mE1 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef1, mE1 );
494  //mE3 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef3, mE3 );
495  mE5 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef5, mE5 );
496  mE7 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef7, mE7 );
497  mE9 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef9, mE9 );
498  mE11 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef11, mE11 );
499 
500  msum0 = _mm_add_pd( _mm_add_pd( mE5, mE7 ), _mm_add_pd( mE9, mE11 ) );
501 
502 
503  mcoef5 = _mm_blend_pd( mcoef5, mzero, 1 );
504 
505  //mE1 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][5][ 1] );
506  //mE3 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][5][ 3] );
507  mE5 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][5][ 5] );
508  mE7 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][5][ 7] );
509  mE9 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][5][ 9] );
510  mE11 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][5][11] );
511 
512  //mE1 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef1, mE1 );
513  //mE3 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef3, mE3 );
514  mE5 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef5, mE5 );
515  mE7 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef7, mE7 );
516  mE9 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef9, mE9 );
517  mE11 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef11, mE11 );
518 
519  msum1 = _mm_add_pd( _mm_add_pd( mE5, mE7 ), _mm_add_pd( mE9, mE11 ) );
520  msum0 = _mm_hadd_pd( msum0, msum1 );
521 
522 
523 
524  mcoef = _mm_cvtepi32_pd( _mm_loadl_epi64( ( const __m128i* ) &coeff[4] ) );
525  my = _mm_loadu_pd( &y[0][4] );
526  mE = _mm_setr_pd( E[0][0][4][4], E[0][0][5][5] );
527 
528  mE1 = _mm_mul_pd( mE, mcoef );
529  mE3 = _mm_mul_pd( msum0, mtwo );
530  mE1 = _mm_add_pd( mE1, mE3 );
531  mE1 = _mm_mul_pd( mE1, minvf );
532  mE3 = _mm_mul_pd( mtwo, my );
533  mE1 = _mm_sub_pd( mE1, mE3 );
534  mE1 = _mm_mul_pd( mE1, mcoef );
535  merror = _mm_add_pd( merror, mE1 );
536 
537  //error += ( ( E[0][0][4][4] * coeff[4] + sum0 * 2 ) * invFactor - 2 * y[0][4] ) * coeff[4];
538  //error += ( ( E[0][0][5][5] * coeff[5] + sum1 * 2 ) * invFactor - 2 * y[0][5] ) * coeff[5];
539 
540 
541 
542  //mcoef5 = _mm_blend_pd( mcoef5, mzero, 1 );
543 
544  //mE1 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][6][ 1] );
545  //mE3 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][6][ 3] );
546  //mE5 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][6][ 5] );
547  mE7 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][6][ 7] );
548  mE9 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][6][ 9] );
549  mE11 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][6][11] );
550 
551  //mE1 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef1, mE1 );
552  //mE3 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef3, mE3 );
553  //mE5 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef5, mE5 );
554  mE7 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef7, mE7 );
555  mE9 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef9, mE9 );
556  mE11 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef11, mE11 );
557 
558  msum0 = _mm_add_pd( mE7, _mm_add_pd( mE9, mE11 ) );
559 
560 
561  mcoef7 = _mm_blend_pd( mcoef7, mzero, 1 );
562 
563  //mE1 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][7][ 1] );
564  //mE3 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][7][ 3] );
565  //mE5 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][7][ 5] );
566  mE7 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][7][ 7] );
567  mE9 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][7][ 9] );
568  mE11 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][7][11] );
569 
570  //mE1 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef1, mE1 );
571  //mE3 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef3, mE3 );
572  //mE5 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef5, mE5 );
573  mE7 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef7, mE7 );
574  mE9 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef9, mE9 );
575  mE11 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef11, mE11 );
576 
577  msum1 = _mm_add_pd( mE7, _mm_add_pd( mE9, mE11 ) );
578  msum0 = _mm_hadd_pd( msum0, msum1 );
579 
580 
581 
582  mcoef = _mm_cvtepi32_pd( _mm_loadl_epi64( ( const __m128i* ) &coeff[6] ) );
583  my = _mm_loadu_pd( &y[0][6] );
584  mE = _mm_setr_pd( E[0][0][6][6], E[0][0][7][7] );
585 
586  mE1 = _mm_mul_pd( mE, mcoef );
587  mE3 = _mm_mul_pd( msum0, mtwo );
588  mE1 = _mm_add_pd( mE1, mE3 );
589  mE1 = _mm_mul_pd( mE1, minvf );
590  mE3 = _mm_mul_pd( mtwo, my );
591  mE1 = _mm_sub_pd( mE1, mE3 );
592  mE1 = _mm_mul_pd( mE1, mcoef );
593  merror = _mm_add_pd( merror, mE1 );
594 
595  //error += ( ( E[0][0][6][6] * coeff[6] + sum0 * 2 ) * invFactor - 2 * y[0][6] ) * coeff[6];
596  //error += ( ( E[0][0][7][7] * coeff[7] + sum1 * 2 ) * invFactor - 2 * y[0][7] ) * coeff[7];
597 
598 
599 
600  //mcoef7 = _mm_blend_pd( mcoef7, mzero, 1 );
601 
602  //mE1 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][8][ 1] );
603  //mE3 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][8][ 3] );
604  //mE5 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][8][ 5] );
605  //mE7 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][8][ 7] );
606  mE9 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][8][ 9] );
607  mE11 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][8][11] );
608 
609  //mE1 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef1, mE1 );
610  //mE3 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef3, mE3 );
611  //mE5 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef5, mE5 );
612  //mE7 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef7, mE7 );
613  mE9 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef9, mE9 );
614  mE11 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef11, mE11 );
615 
616  msum0 = _mm_add_pd( mE9, mE11 );
617 
618 
619  mcoef9 = _mm_blend_pd( mcoef9, mzero, 1 );
620 
621  //mE1 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][9][ 1] );
622  //mE3 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][9][ 3] );
623  //mE5 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][9][ 5] );
624  //mE7 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][9][ 7] );
625  mE9 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][9][ 9] );
626  mE11 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][9][11] );
627 
628  //mE1 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef1, mE1 );
629  //mE3 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef3, mE3 );
630  //mE5 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef5, mE5 );
631  //mE7 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef7, mE7 );
632  mE9 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef9, mE9 );
633  mE11 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef11, mE11 );
634 
635  msum1 = _mm_add_pd( mE9, mE11 );
636  msum0 = _mm_hadd_pd( msum0, msum1 );
637 
638 
639 
640  mcoef = _mm_cvtepi32_pd( _mm_loadl_epi64( ( const __m128i* ) &coeff[8] ) );
641  my = _mm_loadu_pd( &y[0][8] );
642  mE = _mm_setr_pd( E[0][0][8][8], E[0][0][9][9] );
643 
644  mE1 = _mm_mul_pd( mE, mcoef );
645  mE3 = _mm_mul_pd( msum0, mtwo );
646  mE1 = _mm_add_pd( mE1, mE3 );
647  mE1 = _mm_mul_pd( mE1, minvf );
648  mE3 = _mm_mul_pd( mtwo, my );
649  mE1 = _mm_sub_pd( mE1, mE3 );
650  mE1 = _mm_mul_pd( mE1, mcoef );
651  merror = _mm_add_pd( merror, mE1 );
652 
653  //error += ( ( E[0][0][8][8] * coeff[8] + sum0 * 2 ) * invFactor - 2 * y[0][8] ) * coeff[8];
654  //error += ( ( E[0][0][9][9] * coeff[9] + sum1 * 2 ) * invFactor - 2 * y[0][9] ) * coeff[9];
655 
656 
657 
658  //mcoef9 = _mm_blend_pd( mcoef9, mzero, 1 );
659 
660  //mE1 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][10][ 1] );
661  //mE3 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][10][ 3] );
662  //mE5 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][10][ 5] );
663  //mE7 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][10][ 7] );
664  //mE9 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][10][ 9] );
665  mE11 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][10][11] );
666 
667  //mE1 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef1, mE1 );
668  //mE3 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef3, mE3 );
669  //mE5 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef5, mE5 );
670  //mE7 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef7, mE7 );
671  //mE9 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef9, mE9 );
672  mE11 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef11, mE11 );
673 
674  msum0 = mE11;
675 
676 
677  mcoef11 = _mm_blend_pd( mcoef11, mzero, 1 );
678 
679  //mE1 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][1][ 1] );
680  //mE3 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][1][ 3] );
681  //mE5 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][1][ 5] );
682  //mE7 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][1][ 7] );
683  //mE9 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][1][ 9] );
684  mE11 = _mm_loadu_pd( &E[0][0][11][11] );
685 
686  //mE1 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef1, mE1 );
687  //mE3 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef3, mE3 );
688  //mE5 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef5, mE5 );
689  //mE7 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef7, mE7 );
690  //mE9 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef9, mE9 );
691  mE11 = _mm_mul_pd( mcoef11, mE11 );
692 
693  msum1 = mE11;
694  msum0 = _mm_hadd_pd( msum0, msum1 );
695 
696 
697 
698  mcoef = _mm_cvtepi32_pd( _mm_loadl_epi64( ( const __m128i* ) &coeff[10] ) );
699  my = _mm_loadu_pd( &y[0][10] );
700  mE = _mm_setr_pd( E[0][0][10][10], E[0][0][11][11] );
701 
702  mE1 = _mm_mul_pd( mE, mcoef );
703  mE3 = _mm_mul_pd( msum0, mtwo );
704  mE1 = _mm_add_pd( mE1, mE3 );
705  mE1 = _mm_mul_pd( mE1, minvf );
706  mE3 = _mm_mul_pd( mtwo, my );
707  mE1 = _mm_sub_pd( mE1, mE3 );
708  mE1 = _mm_mul_pd( mE1, mcoef );
709  merror = _mm_add_pd( merror, mE1 );
710 
711  //error += ( ( E[0][0][10][10] * coeff[10] + sum0 * 2 ) * invFactor - 2 * y[0][10] ) * coeff[10];
712  //error += ( ( E[0][0][11][11] * coeff[11] + sum1 * 2 ) * invFactor - 2 * y[0][11] ) * coeff[11];
713 
714  error = _mm_cvtsd_f64( _mm_hadd_pd( merror, mzero ) );
715  error += ( ( E[0][0][12][12] * coeff[12] ) * invFactor - 2 * y[0][12] ) * coeff[12];
716 
717  return error * invFactor;
718 }
719 #endif
720 
721 template<int numCoeff>
722 static double calcErrorForCoeffsNonLin( const AlfCovariance::TKE& E, const AlfCovariance::TKy& y, const int* clip, const int* coeff, const double invFactor )
723 {
724  double error = 0;
725 
726  for( int i = 0; i < numCoeff; i++ ) //diagonal
727  {
728  double sum = 0;
729  for( int j = i + 1; j < numCoeff; j++ )
730  {
731  // E[j][i] = E[i][j], sum will be multiplied by 2 later
732  sum += E[clip[i]][clip[j]][i][j] * coeff[j];
733  }
734  error += ( ( E[clip[i]][clip[i]][i][i] * coeff[i] + sum * 2 ) * invFactor - 2 * y[clip[i]][i] ) * coeff[i];
735  }
736 
737  return error * invFactor;
738 }
739 
740 template<>
741 double AlfCovariance::calcErrorForCoeffs<true>( const int *clip, const int *coeff, const int numCoeff, const double invFactor ) const
742 {
743  if( numCoeff == 7 ) return calcErrorForCoeffsNonLin< 7>( E, y, clip, coeff, invFactor );
744  if( numCoeff == 13 ) return calcErrorForCoeffsNonLin<13>( E, y, clip, coeff, invFactor );
745 
746  THROW( "Unexpected number of coefficients: " << numCoeff );
747  return 0.0;
748 }
749 
750 template<>
751 double AlfCovariance::calcErrorForCoeffs<false>( const int *clip, const int *coeff, const int numCoeff, const double invFactor ) const
752 {
753  if( numCoeff == 7 ) return calcErrorForCoeffsLin< 7>( E, y, coeff, invFactor );
754  if( numCoeff == 13 )
755  {
756 #if defined( TARGET_SIMD_X86 ) && ENABLE_SIMD_OPT_ALF
757  if( read_x86_extension_flags() > SCALAR )
758  return calcErrorForCoeffsLin_13_SSE( E, y, coeff, invFactor );
759  else
760 #endif
761  return calcErrorForCoeffsLin<13>( E, y, coeff, invFactor );
762  }
763 
764  THROW( "Unexpected number of coefficients: " << numCoeff );
765  return 0.0;
766 }
767 
768 double AlfCovariance::calcErrorForCcAlfCoeffs(const int16_t* coeff, const int numCoeff, const double invFactor) const
769 {
770  double error = 0;
771 
772  for (int i = 0; i < numCoeff; i++) // diagonal
773  {
774  double sum = 0;
775  for (int j = i + 1; j < numCoeff; j++)
776  {
777  // E[j][i] = E[i][j], sum will be multiplied by 2 later
778  sum += E[0][0][i][j] * coeff[j];
779  }
780  error += ((E[0][0][i][i] * coeff[i] + sum * 2) * invFactor - 2 * y[0][i]) * coeff[i];
781  }
782 
783  return error * invFactor;
784 }
785 
786 double AlfCovariance::calculateError( const int *clip, const double *coeff, const int numCoeff ) const
787 {
788  double sum = 0;
789  for( int i = 0; i < numCoeff; i++ )
790  {
791  sum += coeff[i] * y[clip[i]][i];
792  }
793 
794  return pixAcc - sum;
795 }
796 
797 double AlfCovariance::calculateError( const int *clip ) const
798 {
799  Ty c;
800  return optimizeFilter( clip, c, numCoeff );
801 }
802 
803 //********************************
804 // Cholesky decomposition
805 //********************************
806 
807 #define ROUND(a) (((a) < 0)? (int)((a) - 0.5) : (int)((a) + 0.5))
808 #define REG 0.0001
809 #define REG_SQR 0.0000001
810 
811 //Find filter coeff related
812 int AlfCovariance::gnsCholeskyDec( TE inpMatr, TE outMatr, int numEq ) const
813 {
814  Ty invDiag; /* Vector of the inverse of diagonal entries of outMatr */
815 
816  for( int i = 0; i < numEq; i++ )
817  {
818  for( int j = i; j < numEq; j++ )
819  {
820  /* Compute the scaling factor */
821  double scale = inpMatr[i][j];
822  if( i > 0 )
823  {
824  for( int k = i - 1; k >= 0; k-- )
825  {
826  scale -= outMatr[k][j] * outMatr[k][i];
827  }
828  }
829 
830  /* Compute i'th row of outMatr */
831  if( i == j )
832  {
833  if( scale <= REG_SQR ) // if(scale <= 0 ) /* If inpMatr is singular */
834  {
835  return 0;
836  }
837  else /* Normal operation */
838  invDiag[i] = 1.0 / ( outMatr[i][i] = sqrt( scale ) );
839  }
840  else
841  {
842  outMatr[i][j] = scale * invDiag[i]; /* Upper triangular part */
843  outMatr[j][i] = 0.0; /* Lower triangular part set to 0 */
844  }
845  }
846  }
847  return 1; /* Signal that Cholesky factorization is successfully performed */
848 }
849 
850 void AlfCovariance::gnsTransposeBacksubstitution( TE U, double* rhs, double* x, int order ) const
851 {
852  /* Backsubstitution starts */
853  x[0] = rhs[0] / U[0][0]; /* First row of U' */
854  for( int i = 1; i < order; i++ )
855  { /* For the rows 1..order-1 */
856 
857  double sum = 0; //Holds backsubstitution from already handled rows
858 
859  for( int j = 0; j < i; j++ ) /* Backsubst already solved unknowns */
860  {
861  sum += x[j] * U[j][i];
862  }
863 
864  x[i] = ( rhs[i] - sum ) / U[i][i]; /* i'th component of solution vect. */
865  }
866 }
867 
868 void AlfCovariance::gnsBacksubstitution( TE R, double* z, int size, double* A ) const
869 {
870  size--;
871  A[size] = z[size] / R[size][size];
872 
873  for( int i = size - 1; i >= 0; i-- )
874  {
875  double sum = 0;
876 
877  for( int j = i + 1; j <= size; j++ )
878  {
879  sum += R[i][j] * A[j];
880  }
881 
882  A[i] = ( z[i] - sum ) / R[i][i];
883  }
884 }
885 
886 int AlfCovariance::gnsSolveByChol( const int *clip, double *x, int numEq ) const
887 {
888  TE LHS;
889  Ty rhs;
890 
891  setEyFromClip( clip, LHS, rhs, numEq );
892  return gnsSolveByChol( LHS, rhs, x, numEq );
893 }
894 
895 int AlfCovariance::gnsSolveByChol( TE LHS, double* rhs, double *x, int numEq ) const
896 {
897  Ty aux; /* Auxiliary vector */
898  TE U; /* Upper triangular Cholesky factor of LHS */
899 
900  int res = 1; // Signal that Cholesky factorization is successfully performed
901 
902  /* The equation to be solved is LHSx = rhs */
903 
904  /* Compute upper triangular U such that U'*U = LHS */
905  if( gnsCholeskyDec( LHS, U, numEq ) ) /* If Cholesky decomposition has been successful */
906  {
907  /* Now, the equation is U'*U*x = rhs, where U is upper triangular
908  * Solve U'*aux = rhs for aux
909  */
910  gnsTransposeBacksubstitution( U, rhs, aux, numEq );
911 
912  /* The equation is now U*x = aux, solve it for x (new motion coefficients) */
913  gnsBacksubstitution( U, aux, numEq, x );
914 
915  }
916  else /* LHS was singular */
917  {
918  res = 0;
919 
920  /* Regularize LHS */
921  for( int i = 0; i < numEq; i++ )
922  {
923  LHS[i][i] += REG;
924  }
925 
926  /* Compute upper triangular U such that U'*U = regularized LHS */
927  res = gnsCholeskyDec( LHS, U, numEq );
928 
929  if( !res )
930  {
931  std::memset( x, 0, sizeof( double )*numEq );
932  return 0;
933  }
934 
935  /* Solve U'*aux = rhs for aux */
936  gnsTransposeBacksubstitution( U, rhs, aux, numEq );
937 
938  /* Solve U*x = aux for x */
939  gnsBacksubstitution( U, aux, numEq, x );
940  }
941  return res;
942 }
944 
945 EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::EncAdaptiveLoopFilter()
946  : m_encCfg ( nullptr )
947  , m_apsMap ( nullptr )
948  , m_CABACEstimator ( nullptr )
949  , m_CtxCache ( nullptr )
950  , m_apsIdStart ( ALF_CTB_MAX_NUM_APS )
951  , m_bestFilterCount( 0 )
952  , m_threadpool ( nullptr )
953  {
954  for( int i = 0; i < MAX_NUM_COMP; i++ )
955  {
956  m_alfCovariance[i] = nullptr;
957  }
958  for( int i = 0; i < MAX_NUM_CH; i++ )
959  {
960  m_alfCovarianceFrame[i] = nullptr;
961  }
962  m_filterCoeffSet = nullptr;
963  m_filterClippSet = nullptr;
964  m_diffFilterCoeff = nullptr;
965 
966  m_alfWSSD = 0;
967 
968  m_alfCovarianceCcAlf[0] = nullptr;
969  m_alfCovarianceCcAlf[1] = nullptr;
970  m_alfCovarianceFrameCcAlf[0] = nullptr;
971  m_alfCovarianceFrameCcAlf[1] = nullptr;
972 }
973 
974 void EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::init( const VVEncCfg& encCfg, CABACWriter& cabacEstimator, CtxCache& ctxCache, NoMallocThreadPool* threadpool )
975 {
976 
977  AdaptiveLoopFilter::create( encCfg.m_PadSourceWidth, encCfg.m_PadSourceHeight, encCfg.m_internChromaFormat, encCfg.m_CTUSize, encCfg.m_CTUSize, encCfg.m_MaxCodingDepth, encCfg.m_internalBitDepth );
978 
979  m_encCfg = &encCfg;
980  m_CABACEstimator = &cabacEstimator;
981  m_CtxCache = &ctxCache;
982 
983  const int numBins = m_encCfg->m_useNonLinearAlfLuma || m_encCfg->m_useNonLinearAlfChroma ? MaxAlfNumClippingValues : 1;
984 
985  for( int channelIdx = 0; channelIdx < MAX_NUM_CH; channelIdx++ )
986  {
987  ChannelType chType = (ChannelType)channelIdx;
988  int numClasses = channelIdx ? VVENC_MAX_NUM_ALF_ALTERNATIVES_CHROMA : MAX_NUM_ALF_CLASSES;
989  m_alfCovarianceFrame[chType] = new AlfCovariance*[m_filterShapes[chType].size()];
990  for( int i = 0; i != m_filterShapes[chType].size(); i++ )
991  {
992  m_alfCovarianceFrame[chType][i] = new AlfCovariance[numClasses];
993  for( int k = 0; k < numClasses; k++ )
994  {
995  m_alfCovarianceFrame[chType][i][k].create( m_filterShapes[chType][i].numCoeff, numBins );
996  }
997  }
998  }
999 
1000  for( int compIdx = 0; compIdx < MAX_NUM_COMP; compIdx++ )
1001  {
1002  m_ctuEnableFlagTmp[compIdx] = new uint8_t[m_numCTUsInPic];
1003  m_ctuEnableFlagTmp2[compIdx] = new uint8_t[m_numCTUsInPic];
1004  if( isLuma( ComponentID(compIdx) ) )
1005  {
1006  m_ctuAlternativeTmp[compIdx] = nullptr;
1007  }
1008  else
1009  {
1010  m_ctuAlternativeTmp[compIdx] = new uint8_t[m_numCTUsInPic];
1011  std::fill_n( m_ctuAlternativeTmp[compIdx], m_numCTUsInPic, 0 );
1012  }
1013  ChannelType chType = toChannelType( ComponentID( compIdx ) );
1014  int numClasses = compIdx ? 1 : MAX_NUM_ALF_CLASSES;
1015 
1016  m_alfCovariance[compIdx] = new AlfCovariance**[m_filterShapes[chType].size()];
1017 
1018  for( int i = 0; i != m_filterShapes[chType].size(); i++ )
1019  {
1020  m_alfCovariance[compIdx][i] = new AlfCovariance*[m_numCTUsInPic];
1021  for( int j = 0; j < m_numCTUsInPic; j++ )
1022  {
1023  m_alfCovariance[compIdx][i][j] = new AlfCovariance[numClasses];
1024  for( int k = 0; k < numClasses; k++ )
1025  {
1026  m_alfCovariance[compIdx][i][j][k].create( m_filterShapes[chType][i].numCoeff, numBins );
1027  }
1028  }
1029  }
1030  }
1031 
1032  for( int i = 0; i != m_filterShapes[COMP_Y].size(); i++ )
1033  {
1034  for (int j = 0; j <= MAX_NUM_ALF_CLASSES + 1; j++)
1035  {
1036  m_alfCovarianceMerged[i][j].create( m_filterShapes[COMP_Y][i].numCoeff, numBins );
1037  }
1038  }
1039 
1040  m_filterCoeffSet = new int*[std::max(MAX_NUM_ALF_CLASSES, VVENC_MAX_NUM_ALF_ALTERNATIVES_CHROMA)];
1041  m_filterClippSet = new int*[std::max(MAX_NUM_ALF_CLASSES, VVENC_MAX_NUM_ALF_ALTERNATIVES_CHROMA)];
1042  m_diffFilterCoeff = new int*[MAX_NUM_ALF_CLASSES];
1043 
1044  for( int i = 0; i < MAX_NUM_ALF_CLASSES; i++ )
1045  {
1046  m_filterCoeffSet[i] = new int[MAX_NUM_ALF_LUMA_COEFF];
1047  m_filterClippSet[i] = new int[MAX_NUM_ALF_LUMA_COEFF];
1048  m_diffFilterCoeff[i] = new int[MAX_NUM_ALF_LUMA_COEFF];
1049  }
1050 
1051 // m_apsIdStart = ALF_CTB_MAX_NUM_APS;
1052  m_ctbDistortionFixedFilter = new double[m_numCTUsInPic];
1053  for (int comp = 0; comp < MAX_NUM_COMP; comp++)
1054  {
1055  m_ctbDistortionUnfilter[comp] = new double[m_numCTUsInPic];
1056  }
1057  m_alfCtbFilterSetIndexTmp.resize(m_numCTUsInPic);
1058  memset(m_clipDefaultEnc, 0, sizeof(m_clipDefaultEnc));
1059  m_apsIdCcAlfStart[0] = (int) MAX_NUM_APS;
1060  m_apsIdCcAlfStart[1] = (int) MAX_NUM_APS;
1061  for( int compIdx = 1; compIdx < MAX_NUM_COMP; compIdx++ )
1062  {
1063  int numFilters = MAX_NUM_CC_ALF_FILTERS;
1064  m_alfCovarianceCcAlf[compIdx-1] = new AlfCovariance**[m_filterShapesCcAlf[compIdx-1].size()];
1065  m_alfCovarianceFrameCcAlf[compIdx-1] = new AlfCovariance*[m_filterShapesCcAlf[compIdx-1].size()];
1066  for( int i = 0; i != m_filterShapesCcAlf[compIdx-1].size(); i++ )
1067  {
1068  m_alfCovarianceFrameCcAlf[compIdx - 1][i] = new AlfCovariance[numFilters];
1069  for (int k = 0; k < numFilters; k++)
1070  {
1071  m_alfCovarianceFrameCcAlf[compIdx - 1][i][k].create(m_filterShapesCcAlf[compIdx - 1][i].numCoeff, numBins);
1072  }
1073 
1074  m_alfCovarianceCcAlf[compIdx - 1][i] = new AlfCovariance *[numFilters];
1075  for (int j = 0; j < numFilters; j++)
1076  {
1077  m_alfCovarianceCcAlf[compIdx - 1][i][j] = new AlfCovariance[m_numCTUsInPic];
1078  for (int k = 0; k < m_numCTUsInPic; k++)
1079  {
1080  m_alfCovarianceCcAlf[compIdx - 1][i][j][k].create(m_filterShapesCcAlf[compIdx - 1][i].numCoeff, numBins);
1081  }
1082  }
1083  }
1084  }
1085  m_trainingCovControl = new uint8_t[m_numCTUsInPic];
1086  for ( int i = 0; i < MAX_NUM_CC_ALF_FILTERS; i++ )
1087  {
1088  m_trainingDistortion[i] = new uint64_t[m_numCTUsInPic];
1089  }
1090  m_filterControl = new uint8_t[m_numCTUsInPic];
1091  m_bestFilterControl = new uint8_t[m_numCTUsInPic];
1092  uint32_t area = (encCfg.m_PadSourceWidth >> getComponentScaleX(COMP_Cb,encCfg.m_internChromaFormat))*(encCfg.m_PadSourceHeight >> getComponentScaleY(COMP_Cb,encCfg.m_internChromaFormat));
1093  m_bufOrigin = ( Pel* ) xMalloc( Pel, area );
1094  m_buf = new PelBuf( m_bufOrigin, encCfg.m_PadSourceWidth >> getComponentScaleX(COMP_Cb,encCfg.m_internChromaFormat), encCfg.m_PadSourceWidth >> getComponentScaleX(COMP_Cb,encCfg.m_internChromaFormat), encCfg.m_PadSourceHeight >> getComponentScaleY(COMP_Cb,encCfg.m_internChromaFormat) );
1095  m_lumaSwingGreaterThanThresholdCount = new uint64_t[m_numCTUsInPic];
1096  m_chromaSampleCountNearMidPoint = new uint64_t[m_numCTUsInPic];
1097  m_threadpool = threadpool;
1098 #if ALF_CTU_PAR_TRACING
1099  m_traceStreams = new std::stringstream[m_numCTUsInPic];
1100 #endif
1101 }
1102 
1103 void EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::destroy()
1104 {
1105  if (!m_created)
1106  {
1107  return;
1108  }
1109  for( int channelIdx = 0; channelIdx < MAX_NUM_CH; channelIdx++ )
1110  {
1111  if( m_alfCovarianceFrame[channelIdx] )
1112  {
1113  ChannelType chType = (ChannelType)channelIdx;
1114  int numClasses = channelIdx ? VVENC_MAX_NUM_ALF_ALTERNATIVES_CHROMA : MAX_NUM_ALF_CLASSES;
1115  for( int i = 0; i != m_filterShapes[chType].size(); i++ )
1116  {
1117  for( int k = 0; k < numClasses; k++ )
1118  {
1119  m_alfCovarianceFrame[channelIdx][i][k].destroy();
1120  }
1121  delete[] m_alfCovarianceFrame[channelIdx][i];
1122  m_alfCovarianceFrame[channelIdx][i] = nullptr;
1123  }
1124  delete[] m_alfCovarianceFrame[channelIdx];
1125  m_alfCovarianceFrame[channelIdx] = nullptr;
1126  }
1127  }
1128 
1129  for( int compIdx = 0; compIdx < MAX_NUM_COMP; compIdx++ )
1130  {
1131  if( m_ctuEnableFlagTmp[compIdx] )
1132  {
1133  delete[] m_ctuEnableFlagTmp[compIdx];
1134  m_ctuEnableFlagTmp[compIdx] = nullptr;
1135  }
1136 
1137  if( m_ctuEnableFlagTmp2[compIdx] )
1138  {
1139  delete[] m_ctuEnableFlagTmp2[compIdx];
1140  m_ctuEnableFlagTmp2[compIdx] = nullptr;
1141  }
1142 
1143  if( m_ctuAlternativeTmp[compIdx] )
1144  {
1145  delete[] m_ctuAlternativeTmp[compIdx];
1146  m_ctuAlternativeTmp[compIdx] = nullptr;
1147  }
1148 
1149  if( m_alfCovariance[compIdx] )
1150  {
1151  ChannelType chType = toChannelType( ComponentID( compIdx ) );
1152  int numClasses = compIdx ? 1 : MAX_NUM_ALF_CLASSES;
1153 
1154  for( int i = 0; i != m_filterShapes[chType].size(); i++ )
1155  {
1156  for( int j = 0; j < m_numCTUsInPic; j++ )
1157  {
1158  for( int k = 0; k < numClasses; k++ )
1159  {
1160  m_alfCovariance[compIdx][i][j][k].destroy();
1161  }
1162  delete[] m_alfCovariance[compIdx][i][j];
1163  m_alfCovariance[compIdx][i][j] = nullptr;
1164 
1165  }
1166  delete[] m_alfCovariance[compIdx][i];
1167  m_alfCovariance[compIdx][i] = nullptr;
1168 
1169  }
1170  delete[] m_alfCovariance[compIdx];
1171  m_alfCovariance[compIdx] = nullptr;
1172  }
1173  }
1174 
1175  for( int i = 0; i != m_filterShapes[COMP_Y].size(); i++ )
1176  {
1177  for (int j = 0; j <= MAX_NUM_ALF_CLASSES + 1; j++)
1178  {
1179  m_alfCovarianceMerged[i][j].destroy();
1180  }
1181  }
1182 
1183  if( m_filterCoeffSet )
1184  {
1185  for( int i = 0; i < MAX_NUM_ALF_CLASSES; i++ )
1186  {
1187  delete[] m_filterCoeffSet[i];
1188  m_filterCoeffSet[i] = nullptr;
1189  }
1190  delete[] m_filterCoeffSet;
1191  m_filterCoeffSet = nullptr;
1192  }
1193 
1194  if( m_filterClippSet )
1195  {
1196  for( int i = 0; i < MAX_NUM_ALF_CLASSES; i++ )
1197  {
1198  delete[] m_filterClippSet[i];
1199  m_filterClippSet[i] = nullptr;
1200  }
1201  delete[] m_filterClippSet;
1202  m_filterClippSet = nullptr;
1203  }
1204 
1205  if( m_diffFilterCoeff )
1206  {
1207  for( int i = 0; i < MAX_NUM_ALF_CLASSES; i++ )
1208  {
1209  delete[] m_diffFilterCoeff[i];
1210  m_diffFilterCoeff[i] = nullptr;
1211  }
1212  delete[] m_diffFilterCoeff;
1213  m_diffFilterCoeff = nullptr;
1214  }
1215 
1216 
1217  delete[] m_ctbDistortionFixedFilter;
1218  m_ctbDistortionFixedFilter = nullptr;
1219  for (int comp = 0; comp < MAX_NUM_COMP; comp++)
1220  {
1221  delete[] m_ctbDistortionUnfilter[comp];
1222  m_ctbDistortionUnfilter[comp] = nullptr;
1223  }
1224  for (int compIdx = 1; compIdx < MAX_NUM_COMP; compIdx++)
1225  {
1226  int numFilters = MAX_NUM_CC_ALF_FILTERS;
1227  if (m_alfCovarianceFrameCcAlf[compIdx - 1])
1228  {
1229  for (int i = 0; i != m_filterShapesCcAlf[compIdx - 1].size(); i++)
1230  {
1231  for (int k = 0; k < numFilters; k++)
1232  {
1233  m_alfCovarianceFrameCcAlf[compIdx - 1][i][k].destroy();
1234  }
1235  delete[] m_alfCovarianceFrameCcAlf[compIdx - 1][i];
1236  }
1237  delete[] m_alfCovarianceFrameCcAlf[compIdx - 1];
1238  m_alfCovarianceFrameCcAlf[compIdx - 1] = nullptr;
1239  }
1240 
1241  if (m_alfCovarianceCcAlf[compIdx - 1])
1242  {
1243  for (int i = 0; i != m_filterShapesCcAlf[compIdx - 1].size(); i++)
1244  {
1245  for (int j = 0; j < numFilters; j++)
1246  {
1247  for (int k = 0; k < m_numCTUsInPic; k++)
1248  {
1249  m_alfCovarianceCcAlf[compIdx - 1][i][j][k].destroy();
1250  }
1251  delete[] m_alfCovarianceCcAlf[compIdx - 1][i][j];
1252  }
1253  delete[] m_alfCovarianceCcAlf[compIdx - 1][i];
1254  }
1255  delete[] m_alfCovarianceCcAlf[compIdx - 1];
1256  m_alfCovarianceCcAlf[compIdx - 1] = nullptr;
1257  }
1258  }
1259 
1260  if (m_trainingCovControl)
1261  {
1262  delete[] m_trainingCovControl;
1263  m_trainingCovControl = nullptr;
1264  }
1265 
1266  for ( int i = 0; i < MAX_NUM_CC_ALF_FILTERS; i++ )
1267  {
1268  if (m_trainingDistortion[i])
1269  {
1270  delete[] m_trainingDistortion[i];
1271  m_trainingDistortion[i] = nullptr;
1272  }
1273  }
1274 
1275  if (m_filterControl)
1276  {
1277  delete[] m_filterControl;
1278  m_filterControl = nullptr;
1279  }
1280 
1281  if (m_bestFilterControl)
1282  {
1283  delete[] m_bestFilterControl;
1284  m_bestFilterControl = nullptr;
1285  }
1286 
1287  if (m_bufOrigin)
1288  {
1289  xFree(m_bufOrigin);
1290  m_bufOrigin = nullptr;
1291  }
1292 
1293  if (m_buf)
1294  {
1295  delete m_buf;
1296  m_buf = nullptr;
1297  }
1298 
1299  if (m_lumaSwingGreaterThanThresholdCount)
1300  {
1301  delete[] m_lumaSwingGreaterThanThresholdCount;
1302  m_lumaSwingGreaterThanThresholdCount = nullptr;
1303  }
1304  if (m_chromaSampleCountNearMidPoint)
1305  {
1306  delete[] m_chromaSampleCountNearMidPoint;
1307  m_chromaSampleCountNearMidPoint = nullptr;
1308  }
1309 #if ALF_CTU_PAR_TRACING
1310  delete[] m_traceStreams;
1311 #endif
1312  AdaptiveLoopFilter::destroy();
1313 }
1314 
1315 
1316 void EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::initCABACEstimator( Slice* pcSlice, ParameterSetMap<APS>* apsMap )
1317 {
1318  m_apsMap = apsMap;
1319  m_CABACEstimator->initCtxModels( *pcSlice );
1320  m_CABACEstimator->resetBits();
1321 }
1322 
1323 void EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::xSetupCcAlfAPS( CodingStructure &cs )
1324 {
1325  if (m_ccAlfFilterParam.ccAlfFilterEnabled[COMP_Cb - 1])
1326  {
1327  int ccAlfCbApsId = cs.slice->tileGroupCcAlfCbApsId;
1328  APS* aps = m_apsMap->getPS((cs.slice->tileGroupCcAlfCbApsId << NUM_APS_TYPE_LEN) + ALF_APS);
1329  if (aps == NULL)
1330  {
1331  aps = m_apsMap->allocatePS((ccAlfCbApsId << NUM_APS_TYPE_LEN) + ALF_APS);
1332  aps->temporalId = cs.slice->TLayer;
1333  }
1334  aps->ccAlfParam.ccAlfFilterEnabled[COMP_Cb - 1] = 1;
1335  aps->ccAlfParam.ccAlfFilterCount[COMP_Cb - 1] = m_ccAlfFilterParam.ccAlfFilterCount[COMP_Cb - 1];
1336  for ( int filterIdx = 0; filterIdx < MAX_NUM_CC_ALF_FILTERS; filterIdx++ )
1337  {
1338  aps->ccAlfParam.ccAlfFilterIdxEnabled[COMP_Cb - 1][filterIdx] =
1339  m_ccAlfFilterParam.ccAlfFilterIdxEnabled[COMP_Cb - 1][filterIdx];
1340  memcpy(aps->ccAlfParam.ccAlfCoeff[COMP_Cb - 1][filterIdx],
1341  m_ccAlfFilterParam.ccAlfCoeff[COMP_Cb - 1][filterIdx], sizeof(short) * MAX_NUM_CC_ALF_CHROMA_COEFF);
1342  }
1343  aps->apsId = ccAlfCbApsId;
1344  aps->apsType = ALF_APS;
1345  aps->poc = cs.slice->poc;
1346  if (m_reuseApsId[COMP_Cb - 1] < 0)
1347  {
1348  aps->ccAlfParam.newCcAlfFilter[COMP_Cb - 1] = 1;
1349  m_apsMap->setChangedFlag((ccAlfCbApsId << NUM_APS_TYPE_LEN) + ALF_APS, true);
1350  aps->temporalId = cs.slice->TLayer;
1351  }
1352  cs.slice->tileGroupCcAlfCbEnabled = true;
1353  }
1354  else
1355  {
1356  cs.slice->tileGroupCcAlfCbEnabled = false;
1357  }
1358  if (m_ccAlfFilterParam.ccAlfFilterEnabled[COMP_Cr - 1])
1359  {
1360  int ccAlfCrApsId = cs.slice->tileGroupCcAlfCrApsId;
1361  APS* aps = m_apsMap->getPS((cs.slice->tileGroupCcAlfCrApsId << NUM_APS_TYPE_LEN) + ALF_APS);
1362  if (aps == NULL)
1363  {
1364  aps = m_apsMap->allocatePS((ccAlfCrApsId << NUM_APS_TYPE_LEN) + ALF_APS);
1365  aps->temporalId = cs.slice->TLayer;
1366  }
1367  aps->ccAlfParam.ccAlfFilterEnabled[COMP_Cr - 1] = 1;
1368  aps->ccAlfParam.ccAlfFilterCount[COMP_Cr - 1] = m_ccAlfFilterParam.ccAlfFilterCount[COMP_Cr - 1];
1369  for ( int filterIdx = 0; filterIdx < MAX_NUM_CC_ALF_FILTERS; filterIdx++ )
1370  {
1371  aps->ccAlfParam.ccAlfFilterIdxEnabled[COMP_Cr - 1][filterIdx] =
1372  m_ccAlfFilterParam.ccAlfFilterIdxEnabled[COMP_Cr - 1][filterIdx];
1373  memcpy(aps->ccAlfParam.ccAlfCoeff[COMP_Cr - 1][filterIdx],
1374  m_ccAlfFilterParam.ccAlfCoeff[COMP_Cr - 1][filterIdx], sizeof(short) * MAX_NUM_CC_ALF_CHROMA_COEFF);
1375  }
1376  aps->apsId = ccAlfCrApsId;
1377  aps->poc = cs.slice->poc;
1378  if (m_reuseApsId[COMP_Cr - 1] < 0)
1379  {
1380  aps->ccAlfParam.newCcAlfFilter[COMP_Cr - 1] = 1;
1381  m_apsMap->setChangedFlag((ccAlfCrApsId << NUM_APS_TYPE_LEN) + ALF_APS, true);
1382  aps->temporalId = cs.slice->TLayer;
1383  }
1384  aps->apsType = ALF_APS;
1385  cs.slice->tileGroupCcAlfCrEnabled = true;
1386  }
1387  else
1388  {
1389  cs.slice->tileGroupCcAlfCrEnabled = false;
1390  }
1391 }
1392 
1393 void EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::getStatisticsCTU( Picture& pic, CodingStructure& cs, PelUnitBuf& recYuv, const int ctuRsAddr )
1394 {
1395  PROFILER_SCOPE_AND_STAGE( 1, g_timeProfiler, P_ALF );
1396 
1397  if( cs.sps->maxTLayers > 1 && cs.sps->maxTLayers - m_encCfg->m_alfSpeed <= pic.TLayer )
1398  {
1399  return;
1400  }
1401 
1402  PelUnitBuf orgYuv = cs.picture->getOrigBuf();
1403  const int numClassBlocksInCTU = ( MAX_CU_SIZE * MAX_CU_SIZE ) >> 4;
1404 
1405  const CPelBuf& recLuma = recYuv.get( COMP_Y );
1406  const PreCalcValues& pcv = *cs.pcv;
1407  bool clipTop = false, clipBottom = false, clipLeft = false, clipRight = false;
1408  int numHorVirBndry = 0, numVerVirBndry = 0;
1409  int horVirBndryPos[] = { 0, 0, 0 };
1410  int verVirBndryPos[] = { 0, 0, 0 };
1411 
1412 // const int numberOfComponents = getNumberValidComponents( m_chromaFormat );
1413 
1414  // init CTU stats buffers
1415  const int numberOfComponents = getNumberValidComponents( m_chromaFormat );
1416  for( int compIdx = 0; compIdx < numberOfComponents; compIdx++ )
1417  {
1418  const ComponentID compID = ComponentID( compIdx );
1419  const int numClasses = isLuma( compID ) ? MAX_NUM_ALF_CLASSES : 1;
1420 
1421  for( int shape = 0; shape != m_filterShapes[toChannelType( compID )].size(); shape++ )
1422  {
1423 // for( int ctuIdx = 0; ctuIdx < m_numCTUsInPic; ctuIdx++ )
1424  {
1425  for( int classIdx = 0; classIdx < numClasses; classIdx++ )
1426  {
1427  m_alfCovariance[compIdx][shape][ctuRsAddr][classIdx].reset();
1428  }
1429  }
1430  }
1431  }
1432 
1433  const int xPos = ( ctuRsAddr % pcv.widthInCtus ) << pcv.maxCUSizeLog2;
1434  const int yPos = ( ctuRsAddr / pcv.widthInCtus ) << pcv.maxCUSizeLog2;
1435 
1436  const int width = ( xPos + pcv.maxCUSize > pcv.lumaWidth ) ? ( pcv.lumaWidth - xPos ) : pcv.maxCUSize;
1437  const int height = ( yPos + pcv.maxCUSize > pcv.lumaHeight ) ? ( pcv.lumaHeight - yPos ) : pcv.maxCUSize;
1438 
1439  int rasterSliceAlfPad = 0;
1440  if( isCrossedByVirtualBoundaries( cs, xPos, yPos, width, height, clipTop, clipBottom, clipLeft, clipRight, numHorVirBndry, numVerVirBndry, horVirBndryPos, verVirBndryPos, rasterSliceAlfPad ) )
1441  {
1442  int yStart = yPos;
1443  for( int i = 0; i <= numHorVirBndry; i++ )
1444  {
1445  const int yEnd = i == numHorVirBndry ? yPos + height : horVirBndryPos[i];
1446  const int h = yEnd - yStart;
1447  const bool clipT = ( i == 0 && clipTop ) || ( i > 0 ) || ( yStart == 0 );
1448  const bool clipB = ( i == numHorVirBndry && clipBottom ) || ( i < numHorVirBndry ) || ( yEnd == pcv.lumaHeight );
1449 
1450  int xStart = xPos;
1451  for( int j = 0; j <= numVerVirBndry; j++ )
1452  {
1453  // Classification
1454  const int xEnd = j == numVerVirBndry ? xPos + width : verVirBndryPos[j];
1455  const int w = xEnd - xStart;
1456  const bool clipL = ( j == 0 && clipLeft ) || ( j > 0 ) || ( xStart == 0 );
1457  const bool clipR = ( j == numVerVirBndry && clipRight ) || ( j < numVerVirBndry ) || ( xEnd == pcv.lumaWidth );
1458 
1459  const int wBuf = w + ( clipL ? 0 : MAX_ALF_PADDING_SIZE ) + ( clipR ? 0 : MAX_ALF_PADDING_SIZE );
1460  const int hBuf = h + ( clipT ? 0 : MAX_ALF_PADDING_SIZE ) + ( clipB ? 0 : MAX_ALF_PADDING_SIZE );
1461  PelUnitBuf dstBuf = m_tempBuf2.subBuf( UnitArea( cs.area.chromaFormat, Area( 0, 0, wBuf, hBuf ) ) );
1462  CPelUnitBuf srcBuf = recYuv.subBuf( UnitArea( cs.area.chromaFormat, Area( xStart - ( clipL ? 0 : MAX_ALF_PADDING_SIZE ), yStart - ( clipT ? 0 : MAX_ALF_PADDING_SIZE ), wBuf, hBuf ) ) );
1463  dstBuf.copyFrom( srcBuf );
1464  // pad top-left unavailable samples for raster slice
1465  if( xStart == xPos && yStart == yPos && ( rasterSliceAlfPad & 1 ) )
1466  {
1467  dstBuf.padBorderPel( MAX_ALF_PADDING_SIZE, 1 );
1468  }
1469 
1470  // pad bottom-right unavailable samples for raster slice
1471  if( xEnd == xPos + width && yEnd == yPos + height && ( rasterSliceAlfPad & 2 ) )
1472  {
1473  dstBuf.padBorderPel( MAX_ALF_PADDING_SIZE, 2 );
1474  }
1475  dstBuf.extendBorderPel( MAX_ALF_PADDING_SIZE );
1476  PelUnitBuf buf = dstBuf.subBuf( UnitArea ( cs.area.chromaFormat, Area( clipL ? 0 : MAX_ALF_PADDING_SIZE, clipT ? 0 : MAX_ALF_PADDING_SIZE, w, h ) ) );
1477 
1478  const Area blkSrc( 0, 0, w, h );
1479  const Area blkDst( xStart, yStart, w, h );
1480  deriveClassification( &m_classifier[numClassBlocksInCTU * ctuRsAddr], buf.get( COMP_Y ), blkDst, blkSrc );
1481 
1482  // CTU statistic
1483  const UnitArea area( m_chromaFormat, Area( 0, 0, w, h ) );
1484  const UnitArea areaDst( m_chromaFormat, Area( xStart, yStart, w, h ) );
1485  for( int compIdx = 0; compIdx < numberOfComponents; compIdx++ )
1486  {
1487  const ComponentID compID = ComponentID( compIdx );
1488  const ChannelType chType = toChannelType( compID );
1489  const CompArea& compArea = area.block( compID );
1490 
1491  int recStride = buf.get( compID ).stride;
1492  Pel* rec = buf.get( compID ).bufAt( compArea );
1493 
1494  int orgStride = orgYuv.get( compID ).stride;
1495  Pel* org = orgYuv.get( compID ).bufAt( xStart >> getComponentScaleX( compID, m_chromaFormat ), yStart >> getComponentScaleY( compID, m_chromaFormat ) );
1496 
1497 
1498  for( int shape = 0; shape != m_filterShapes[chType].size(); shape++ )
1499  {
1500  const CompArea& compAreaDst = areaDst.block( compID );
1501  getPreBlkStats( m_alfCovariance[compIdx][shape][ctuRsAddr], m_filterShapes[chType][shape], compIdx ? nullptr : &m_classifier[numClassBlocksInCTU * ctuRsAddr], org, orgStride, rec, recStride, compAreaDst, compArea, chType
1502  , ( ( compIdx == 0 ) ? m_alfVBLumaCTUHeight : m_alfVBChmaCTUHeight )
1503  , ( compIdx == 0 ) ? m_alfVBLumaPos : m_alfVBChmaPos
1504  );
1505  }
1506  }
1507 
1508  xStart = xEnd;
1509  }
1510 
1511  yStart = yEnd;
1512  }
1513  }
1514  else
1515  {
1516  Area blk( xPos, yPos, width, height );
1517  deriveClassification( &m_classifier[numClassBlocksInCTU * ctuRsAddr], recLuma, blk, blk );
1518 
1519  // CTU statistic
1520  const UnitArea area( m_chromaFormat, Area( xPos, yPos, width, height ) );
1521  for( int compIdx = 0; compIdx < numberOfComponents; compIdx++ )
1522  {
1523  const ComponentID compID = ComponentID( compIdx );
1524  const CompArea& compArea = area.block( compID );
1525 
1526  int recStride = recYuv.get( compID ).stride;
1527  Pel* rec = recYuv.get( compID ).bufAt( compArea );
1528 
1529  int orgStride = orgYuv.get( compID ).stride;
1530  Pel* org = orgYuv.get( compID ).bufAt( compArea );
1531 
1532  ChannelType chType = toChannelType( compID );
1533 
1534  for( int shape = 0; shape != m_filterShapes[chType].size(); shape++ )
1535  {
1536  getPreBlkStats( m_alfCovariance[compIdx][shape][ctuRsAddr], m_filterShapes[chType][shape], compIdx ? nullptr : &m_classifier[numClassBlocksInCTU * ctuRsAddr], org, orgStride, rec, recStride, compArea, compArea, chType
1537  , ( ( compIdx == 0 ) ? m_alfVBLumaCTUHeight : m_alfVBChmaCTUHeight )
1538  , ( compIdx == 0 ) ? m_alfVBLumaPos : m_alfVBChmaPos
1539  );
1540  }
1541  }
1542  }
1543 }
1544 
1545 void EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::performCCALF( Picture& pic, CodingStructure& cs )
1546 {
1547  initCABACEstimator( cs.slice, &pic.picApsMap );
1548  const TempCtx ctxStartCcAlf(m_CtxCache, SubCtx(Ctx::CcAlfFilterControlFlag, m_CABACEstimator->getCtx()));
1549 
1550  // Do not transmit CC ALF if it is unchanged
1551  if (cs.slice->tileGroupAlfEnabled[COMP_Y])
1552  {
1553  for (int32_t lumaAlfApsId : cs.slice->tileGroupLumaApsId)
1554  {
1555  APS* aps = (lumaAlfApsId >= 0) ? m_apsMap->getPS((lumaAlfApsId << NUM_APS_TYPE_LEN) + ALF_APS) : nullptr;
1556  if (aps && m_apsMap->getChangedFlag((lumaAlfApsId << NUM_APS_TYPE_LEN) + ALF_APS))
1557  {
1558  aps->ccAlfParam.newCcAlfFilter[0] = false;
1559  aps->ccAlfParam.newCcAlfFilter[1] = false;
1560  }
1561  }
1562  }
1563  int chromaAlfApsId = ( cs.slice->tileGroupAlfEnabled[COMP_Cb] || cs.slice->tileGroupAlfEnabled[COMP_Cr]) ? cs.slice->tileGroupChromaApsId : -1;
1564  APS* aps = (chromaAlfApsId >= 0) ? m_apsMap->getPS((chromaAlfApsId << NUM_APS_TYPE_LEN) + ALF_APS) : nullptr;
1565  if (aps && m_apsMap->getChangedFlag((chromaAlfApsId << NUM_APS_TYPE_LEN) + ALF_APS))
1566  {
1567  aps->ccAlfParam.newCcAlfFilter[0] = false;
1568  aps->ccAlfParam.newCcAlfFilter[1] = false;
1569  }
1570 
1571  if (!cs.slice->sps->ccalfEnabled )
1572  {
1573  return;
1574  }
1575 
1576  m_tempBuf.get(COMP_Cb).copyFrom(cs.getRecoBuf().get(COMP_Cb));
1577  m_tempBuf.get(COMP_Cr).copyFrom(cs.getRecoBuf().get(COMP_Cr));
1578 
1579  PelUnitBuf orgYuv = cs.picture->getOrigBuf();
1580  PelUnitBuf recYuv = m_tempBuf.getBuf(cs.area);
1581  recYuv.extendBorderPel(MAX_ALF_FILTER_LENGTH >> 1);
1582 
1583  deriveStatsForCcAlfFiltering(orgYuv, recYuv, COMP_Cb, m_numCTUsInWidth, (0 + 1), cs);
1584  deriveStatsForCcAlfFiltering(orgYuv, recYuv, COMP_Cr, m_numCTUsInWidth, (0 + 1), cs);
1585  initDistortionCcalf();
1586 
1587  m_CABACEstimator->getCtx() = SubCtx(Ctx::CcAlfFilterControlFlag, ctxStartCcAlf);
1588  deriveCcAlfFilter(cs, COMP_Cb, orgYuv, recYuv, cs.getRecoBuf());
1589  m_CABACEstimator->getCtx() = SubCtx(Ctx::CcAlfFilterControlFlag, ctxStartCcAlf);
1590  deriveCcAlfFilter(cs, COMP_Cr, orgYuv, recYuv, cs.getRecoBuf());
1591 
1592  xSetupCcAlfAPS(cs);
1593 
1594  for (int compIdx = 1; compIdx < getNumberValidComponents(cs.pcv->chrFormat); compIdx++)
1595  {
1596  ComponentID compID = ComponentID(compIdx);
1597  if (m_ccAlfFilterParam.ccAlfFilterEnabled[compIdx - 1])
1598  {
1599  applyCcAlfFilter(cs, compID, cs.getRecoBuf().get(compID), recYuv, m_ccAlfFilterControl[compIdx - 1],
1600  m_ccAlfFilterParam.ccAlfCoeff[compIdx - 1], -1);
1601  }
1602  }
1603 }
1604 
1605 void EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::getStatisticsFrame( Picture& pic, CodingStructure& cs )
1606 {
1607  PelUnitBuf recoBuf = cs.picture->getRecoBuf();
1608  resetFrameStats();
1609  for( int ctuRsAddr = 0; ctuRsAddr < m_numCTUsInPic; ctuRsAddr++ )
1610  {
1611  getStatisticsCTU( pic, cs, recoBuf, ctuRsAddr );
1612  }
1613 }
1614 
1615 void EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::deriveFilter( Picture& pic, CodingStructure& cs, const double* lambdas )
1616 {
1617  PROFILER_SCOPE_AND_STAGE( 1, g_timeProfiler, P_ALF );
1618 
1619  if( cs.sps->maxTLayers > 1 && cs.sps->maxTLayers - m_encCfg->m_alfSpeed <= pic.TLayer )
1620  {
1621  memset( cs.slice->tileGroupAlfEnabled, 0, sizeof( cs.slice->tileGroupAlfEnabled ) );
1622  return;
1623  }
1624 
1625  initCABACEstimator( cs.slice, &pic.picApsMap );
1626  if( m_encCfg->m_maxParallelFrames )
1627  {
1628  setApsIdStart( pic.picApsMap.getApsIdStart() );
1629  }
1630 
1631  // On TL0 and pending RAS: reset APS
1632  int layerIdx = cs.vps == nullptr ? 0 : cs.vps->generalLayerIdx[ cs.slice->pic->layerId ];
1633  if ( !layerIdx && ( cs.slice->pendingRasInit || cs.slice->isIDRorBLA() || ( cs.slice->nalUnitType == VVENC_NAL_UNIT_CODED_SLICE_CRA && m_encCfg->m_craAPSreset ) ) )
1634  {
1635  memset(cs.slice->alfAps, 0, sizeof(*cs.slice->alfAps)*ALF_CTB_MAX_NUM_APS);
1636  m_apsIdStart = ALF_CTB_MAX_NUM_APS;
1637  m_apsMap->clearActive();
1638  for (int i = 0; i < ALF_CTB_MAX_NUM_APS; i++)
1639  {
1640  APS* alfAPS = m_apsMap->getPS((i << NUM_APS_TYPE_LEN) + ALF_APS);
1641  m_apsMap->clearChangedFlag((i << NUM_APS_TYPE_LEN) + ALF_APS);
1642  if (alfAPS)
1643  {
1644  alfAPS->alfParam.reset();
1645  alfAPS->ccAlfParam.reset();
1646  alfAPS = nullptr;
1647  }
1648  }
1649  }
1650 
1651  // Accumulate ALF statistic
1652  const int numberOfComponents = getNumberValidComponents( m_chromaFormat );
1653  for( int compIdx = 0; compIdx < numberOfComponents; compIdx++ )
1654  {
1655  const ComponentID compID = ComponentID( compIdx );
1656  const ChannelType chType = toChannelType( compID );
1657  for( int shape = 0; shape != m_filterShapes[chType].size(); shape++ )
1658  {
1659  for( int ctuRsAddr = 0; ctuRsAddr < m_numCTUsInPic; ctuRsAddr++ )
1660  {
1661  for( int classIdx = 0; classIdx < ( isLuma( compID ) ? MAX_NUM_ALF_CLASSES : 1 ); classIdx++ )
1662  {
1663  m_alfCovarianceFrame[chType][shape][isLuma( compID ) ? classIdx : 0] += m_alfCovariance[compIdx][shape][ctuRsAddr][classIdx];
1664 #if ENABLE_TRACING
1665  m_alfCovarianceFrame[chType][shape][isLuma( compID ) ? classIdx : 0].trace();
1666 #endif
1667  }
1668  }
1669  }
1670  }
1671 
1672 
1673  AlfParam alfParam;
1674  alfParam.reset();
1675  const TempCtx ctxStart( m_CtxCache, AlfCtx( m_CABACEstimator->getCtx() ) );
1676 
1677  // set available filter shapes
1678  alfParam.filterShapes = m_filterShapes;
1679 
1680  for( int ctbIdx = 0; ctbIdx < m_numCTUsInPic; ctbIdx++ )
1681  {
1682  pic.m_alfCtbFilterIndex[ctbIdx] = NUM_FIXED_FILTER_SETS;
1683  }
1684 
1685  // set CTU ALF enable flags, it was already reset before ALF process
1686  for( int compIdx = 0; compIdx < MAX_NUM_COMP; compIdx++ )
1687  {
1688  m_ctuEnableFlag[compIdx] = cs.picture->m_alfCtuEnabled[ compIdx ].data();
1689  m_ctuAlternative[compIdx] = cs.picture->m_alfCtuAlternative[ compIdx ].data();
1690  }
1691 
1692  // reset ALF parameters
1693  alfParam.reset();
1694  int shiftLuma = 2 * DISTORTION_PRECISION_ADJUSTMENT( m_inputBitDepth[CH_L] );
1695  int shiftChroma = 2 * DISTORTION_PRECISION_ADJUSTMENT( m_inputBitDepth[CH_C] );
1696  m_lambda[COMP_Y] = lambdas[COMP_Y] * double( 1 << shiftLuma );
1697  m_lambda[COMP_Cb] = lambdas[COMP_Cb] * double( 1 << shiftChroma );
1698  m_lambda[COMP_Cr] = lambdas[COMP_Cr] * double( 1 << shiftChroma );
1699 
1700  // consider using new filter (only)
1701  alfParam.newFilterFlag[CH_L] = true;
1702  alfParam.newFilterFlag[CH_C] = true;
1703  cs.slice->tileGroupNumAps = ( 1 ); // Only new filter for RD cost optimization
1704 
1705  const bool useCtuWiseLambda = m_encCfg->m_usePerceptQPA && cs.slice->pps->useDQP;
1706  const double lambdaChromaWeight = useCtuWiseLambda && ( m_lambda[COMP_Y] > 0.0 ) ? ( m_lambda[COMP_Cb] + m_lambda[COMP_Cr] ) / ( 2.0 * m_lambda[COMP_Y] ) : 0.0;
1707 
1708  // derive filter (luma)
1709  alfEncoder( cs, alfParam, CH_L, lambdaChromaWeight );
1710  // derive filter (chroma)
1711  alfEncoder( cs, alfParam, CH_C, lambdaChromaWeight );
1712 
1713  // let alfEncoderCtb decide now
1714  alfParam.newFilterFlag[CH_L] = false;
1715  alfParam.newFilterFlag[CH_C] = false;
1716  cs.slice->tileGroupNumAps = ( 0 );
1717  m_CABACEstimator->getCtx() = AlfCtx( ctxStart );
1718  alfEncoderCtb( cs, alfParam, lambdaChromaWeight );
1719 }
1720 
1721 void EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::reconstructCTU_MT( Picture& pic, CodingStructure& cs, int ctuRsAddr )
1722 {
1723  PROFILER_SCOPE_AND_STAGE( 1, g_timeProfiler, P_ALF );
1724 
1725  if( cs.sps->maxTLayers > 1 && cs.sps->maxTLayers - m_encCfg->m_alfSpeed <= pic.TLayer )
1726  {
1727  return;
1728  }
1729 
1730  const int nCtuX = ctuRsAddr % cs.pcv->widthInCtus;
1731  const int nCtuY = ctuRsAddr / cs.pcv->widthInCtus;
1732 
1733  // copy unfiltered reco (including padded / extented area)
1734  const ChromaFormat chromaFormat = cs.area.chromaFormat;
1735  UnitArea ctuArea = UnitArea( chromaFormat, cs.pcv->getCtuArea( nCtuX, nCtuY ) );
1736  const int extMargin = ( MAX_ALF_FILTER_LENGTH + 1 ) >> 1;
1737  for( int i = 0; i < getNumberValidComponents( chromaFormat ); i++ )
1738  {
1739  const int extX = extMargin >> getComponentScaleX( ComponentID( i ), chromaFormat );
1740  const int extY = extMargin >> getComponentScaleY( ComponentID( i ), chromaFormat );
1741  CompArea cpyArea = ctuArea.blocks[ i ];
1742  cpyArea.x += extX;
1743  cpyArea.y += extY;
1744  if ( nCtuX == 0 )
1745  {
1746  cpyArea.x -= 2 * extX;
1747  cpyArea.width += 2 * extX;
1748  }
1749  if ( nCtuY == 0 )
1750  {
1751  cpyArea.y -= 2 * extY;
1752  cpyArea.height += 2 * extY;
1753  }
1754  PelBuf dstBuf = m_tempBuf.getBuf( cpyArea );
1755  PelBuf srcBuf = pic.getRecoBuf( cpyArea );
1756  dstBuf.copyFrom( srcBuf );
1757  }
1758 
1759  // Perform filtering
1760  PelUnitBuf ctuBuf = m_tempBuf.getBuf( ctuArea );
1761  reconstructCTU( pic, cs, ctuBuf, ctuRsAddr );
1762 }
1763 
1764 #if ENABLE_TRACING
1765 template< typename Tsrc >
1766 void traceStreamBlock( std::stringstream& str, Tsrc *buf, unsigned stride, unsigned block_w, unsigned block_h )
1767 {
1768  unsigned i, j;
1769  for( j = 0; j < block_h; j++ )
1770  {
1771  for( i = 0; i < block_w; i++ )
1772  {
1773  str << std::setw( 4 ) << std::hex << buf[j * stride + i];
1774  //trace_ctx->dtrace<false>( channel, "%4d ", buf[j*stride + i] );
1775  }
1776  str << std::endl;
1777  }
1778  str << std::endl;
1779 }
1780 #endif
1781 
1782 void EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::reconstructCTU( Picture& pic, CodingStructure& cs, const CPelUnitBuf& recExtBufCTU, int ctuRsAddr )
1783 {
1784  bool ctuEnableFlag = m_ctuEnableFlag[COMP_Y][ctuRsAddr];
1785  const int numberOfComponents = getNumberValidComponents( m_chromaFormat );
1786  for( int compIdx = 1; compIdx < numberOfComponents; compIdx++ )
1787  ctuEnableFlag |= m_ctuEnableFlag[compIdx][ctuRsAddr] > 0;
1788 
1789 #if ALF_CTU_PAR_TRACING
1790  {
1791  const PreCalcValues& pcv = *cs.pcv;
1792  const int xPos = ( ctuRsAddr % pcv.widthInCtus ) << pcv.maxCUSizeLog2;
1793  const int yPos = ( ctuRsAddr / pcv.widthInCtus ) << pcv.maxCUSizeLog2;
1794  const int width = ( xPos + pcv.maxCUSize > pcv.lumaWidth ) ? ( pcv.lumaWidth - xPos ) : pcv.maxCUSize;
1795  const int height = ( yPos + pcv.maxCUSize > pcv.lumaHeight ) ? ( pcv.lumaHeight - yPos ) : pcv.maxCUSize;
1796 
1797  traceStreamBlock( m_traceStreams[ctuRsAddr], recExtBufCTU.bufs[0].buf - ( MAX_ALF_FILTER_LENGTH >> 1 ) * recExtBufCTU.bufs[0].stride - ( MAX_ALF_FILTER_LENGTH >> 1 ),
1798  recExtBufCTU.bufs[0].stride,
1799  width + 2 * ( MAX_ALF_FILTER_LENGTH >> 1 ),
1800  height + 2 * ( MAX_ALF_FILTER_LENGTH >> 1 ) );
1801  if( ctuRsAddr == m_numCTUsToProcess - 1 )
1802  {
1803  for( int i = 0; i < m_numCTUsToProcess; i++ )
1804  {
1805  DTRACE( g_trace_ctx, D_MISC, "CTU=%d \n", i );
1806  DTRACE( g_trace_ctx, D_MISC, "%s", m_traceStreams[i].str().c_str() );
1807  }
1808  }
1809  }
1810 #endif
1811 
1812  if( ctuEnableFlag )
1813  {
1814  PelUnitBuf& recBuf = cs.getRecoBufRef();
1815  const ClpRngs& clpRngs = cs.slice->clpRngs;
1816 
1817  const short* alfCtuFilterIndex = cs.picture->m_alfCtbFilterIndex.data();
1818 
1819  const PreCalcValues& pcv = *cs.pcv;
1820  const int xPos = ( ctuRsAddr % pcv.widthInCtus ) << pcv.maxCUSizeLog2;
1821  const int yPos = ( ctuRsAddr / pcv.widthInCtus ) << pcv.maxCUSizeLog2;
1822  const int width = ( xPos + pcv.maxCUSize > pcv.lumaWidth ) ? ( pcv.lumaWidth - xPos ) : pcv.maxCUSize;
1823  const int height = ( yPos + pcv.maxCUSize > pcv.lumaHeight ) ? ( pcv.lumaHeight - yPos ) : pcv.maxCUSize;
1824  const int nonLinAlfLuma = m_encCfg->m_useNonLinearAlfLuma ? 1 : 0;
1825  const int nonLinAlfChroma = m_encCfg->m_useNonLinearAlfChroma ? 1 : 0;
1826 
1827  const int numClassBlocksInCTU = ( MAX_CU_SIZE * MAX_CU_SIZE ) >> 4;
1828 
1829  bool clipTop = false, clipBottom = false, clipLeft = false, clipRight = false;
1830  int numHorVirBndry = 0, numVerVirBndry = 0;
1831  int horVirBndryPos[] = { 0, 0, 0 };
1832  int verVirBndryPos[] = { 0, 0, 0 };
1833  int rasterSliceAlfPad = 0;
1834  if( isCrossedByVirtualBoundaries( cs, xPos, yPos, width, height, clipTop, clipBottom, clipLeft, clipRight, numHorVirBndry, numVerVirBndry, horVirBndryPos, verVirBndryPos, rasterSliceAlfPad ) )
1835  {
1836  int yStart = yPos;
1837  for( int i = 0; i <= numHorVirBndry; i++ )
1838  {
1839  const int yEnd = i == numHorVirBndry ? yPos + height : horVirBndryPos[i];
1840  const int h = yEnd - yStart;
1841  const bool clipT = ( i == 0 && clipTop ) || ( i > 0 ) || ( yStart == 0 );
1842  const bool clipB = ( i == numHorVirBndry && clipBottom ) || ( i < numHorVirBndry ) || ( yEnd == pcv.lumaHeight );
1843 
1844  int xStart = xPos;
1845  for( int j = 0; j <= numVerVirBndry; j++ )
1846  {
1847  const int xEnd = j == numVerVirBndry ? xPos + width : verVirBndryPos[j];
1848  const int w = xEnd - xStart;
1849  const bool clipL = ( j == 0 && clipLeft ) || ( j > 0 ) || ( xStart == 0 );
1850  const bool clipR = ( j == numVerVirBndry && clipRight ) || ( j < numVerVirBndry ) || ( xEnd == pcv.lumaWidth );
1851 
1852  const int wBuf = w + ( clipL ? 0 : MAX_ALF_PADDING_SIZE ) + ( clipR ? 0 : MAX_ALF_PADDING_SIZE );
1853  const int hBuf = h + ( clipT ? 0 : MAX_ALF_PADDING_SIZE ) + ( clipB ? 0 : MAX_ALF_PADDING_SIZE );
1854  PelUnitBuf dstBuf = m_tempBuf2.subBuf( UnitArea( cs.area.chromaFormat, Area( 0, 0, wBuf, hBuf ) ) );
1855  dstBuf.copyFrom( recExtBufCTU );
1856  // pad top-left unavailable samples for raster slice
1857  if( xStart == xPos && yStart == yPos && ( rasterSliceAlfPad & 1 ) )
1858  {
1859  dstBuf.padBorderPel( MAX_ALF_PADDING_SIZE, 1 );
1860  }
1861 
1862  // pad bottom-right unavailable samples for raster slice
1863  if( xEnd == xPos + width && yEnd == yPos + height && ( rasterSliceAlfPad & 2 ) )
1864  {
1865  dstBuf.padBorderPel( MAX_ALF_PADDING_SIZE, 2 );
1866  }
1867  dstBuf.extendBorderPel( MAX_ALF_PADDING_SIZE );
1868  PelUnitBuf buf = dstBuf.subBuf( UnitArea( cs.area.chromaFormat, Area( clipL ? 0 : MAX_ALF_PADDING_SIZE, clipT ? 0 : MAX_ALF_PADDING_SIZE, w, h ) ) );
1869 
1870  if( m_ctuEnableFlag[COMP_Y][ctuRsAddr] )
1871  {
1872  const Area blkSrc( 0, 0, w, h );
1873  const Area blkDst( xStart, yStart, w, h );
1874  short filterSetIndex = alfCtuFilterIndex[ctuRsAddr];
1875  short* coeff;
1876  short* clip;
1877  if( filterSetIndex >= NUM_FIXED_FILTER_SETS )
1878  {
1879  coeff = m_coeffApsLuma[filterSetIndex - NUM_FIXED_FILTER_SETS];
1880  clip = m_clippApsLuma[filterSetIndex - NUM_FIXED_FILTER_SETS];
1881  }
1882  else
1883  {
1884  coeff = m_fixedFilterSetCoeffDec[filterSetIndex];
1885  clip = m_clipDefault;
1886  }
1887  m_filter7x7Blk[nonLinAlfLuma]( &m_classifier[numClassBlocksInCTU * ctuRsAddr], recBuf, buf, blkDst, blkSrc, COMP_Y, coeff, clip, clpRngs.comp[COMP_Y], cs
1888  , m_alfVBLumaCTUHeight
1889  , m_alfVBLumaPos
1890  );
1891  }
1892 
1893  for( int compIdx = 1; compIdx < numberOfComponents; compIdx++ )
1894  {
1895  ComponentID compID = ComponentID( compIdx );
1896  const int chromaScaleX = getComponentScaleX( compID, recBuf.chromaFormat );
1897  const int chromaScaleY = getComponentScaleY( compID, recBuf.chromaFormat );
1898  if( m_ctuEnableFlag[compIdx][ctuRsAddr] )
1899  {
1900  const Area blkSrc( 0, 0, w >> chromaScaleX, h >> chromaScaleY );
1901  const Area blkDst( xStart >> chromaScaleX, yStart >> chromaScaleY, w >> chromaScaleX, h >> chromaScaleY );
1902  const int alt_num = m_ctuAlternative[compID][ctuRsAddr];
1903  m_filter5x5Blk[nonLinAlfChroma]( m_classifier, recBuf, buf, blkDst, blkSrc, compID, m_chromaCoeffFinal[alt_num], m_chromaClippFinal[alt_num], clpRngs.comp[compIdx], cs
1904  , m_alfVBChmaCTUHeight
1905  , m_alfVBChmaPos
1906  );
1907  }
1908  }
1909 
1910  xStart = xEnd;
1911  }
1912 
1913  yStart = yEnd;
1914  }
1915  }
1916  else
1917  {
1918  const UnitArea area( cs.area.chromaFormat, Area( xPos, yPos, width, height ) );
1919  if( m_ctuEnableFlag[COMP_Y][ctuRsAddr] )
1920  {
1921  const Area blk( xPos, yPos, width, height );
1922  const Area blkSrc( 0, 0, width, height );
1923  short filterSetIndex = alfCtuFilterIndex[ctuRsAddr];
1924  short* coeff;
1925  short* clip;
1926  if( filterSetIndex >= NUM_FIXED_FILTER_SETS )
1927  {
1928  coeff = m_coeffApsLuma[filterSetIndex - NUM_FIXED_FILTER_SETS];
1929  clip = m_clippApsLuma[filterSetIndex - NUM_FIXED_FILTER_SETS];
1930  }
1931  else
1932  {
1933  coeff = m_fixedFilterSetCoeffDec[filterSetIndex];
1934  clip = m_clipDefault;
1935  }
1936  m_filter7x7Blk[nonLinAlfLuma]( &m_classifier[numClassBlocksInCTU * ctuRsAddr], recBuf, recExtBufCTU, blk, blkSrc, COMP_Y, coeff, clip, clpRngs.comp[COMP_Y], cs
1937  , m_alfVBLumaCTUHeight
1938  , m_alfVBLumaPos
1939  );
1940  }
1941 
1942  for( int compIdx = 1; compIdx < numberOfComponents; compIdx++ )
1943  {
1944  ComponentID compID = ComponentID( compIdx );
1945  const int chromaScaleX = getComponentScaleX( compID, recBuf.chromaFormat );
1946  const int chromaScaleY = getComponentScaleY( compID, recBuf.chromaFormat );
1947  if( m_ctuEnableFlag[compIdx][ctuRsAddr] )
1948  {
1949  Area blk( xPos >> chromaScaleX, yPos >> chromaScaleY, width >> chromaScaleX, height >> chromaScaleY );
1950  const Area blkSrc( 0, 0, width >> chromaScaleX, height >> chromaScaleY );
1951  const int alt_num = m_ctuAlternative[compID][ctuRsAddr];
1952  m_filter5x5Blk[nonLinAlfChroma]( m_classifier, recBuf, recExtBufCTU, blk, blkSrc, compID, m_chromaCoeffFinal[alt_num], m_chromaClippFinal[alt_num], clpRngs.comp[compIdx], cs
1953  , m_alfVBChmaCTUHeight
1954  , m_alfVBChmaPos
1955  );
1956  }
1957  }
1958  }
1959  }
1960 
1961 }
1962 
1963 void EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::alfReconstructor( CodingStructure& cs )
1964 {
1965  PROFILER_SCOPE_AND_STAGE( 0, g_timeProfiler, P_ALF_REC );
1966  if( !cs.slice->tileGroupAlfEnabled[COMP_Y] )
1967  {
1968  return;
1969  }
1970 
1971 
1972  reconstructCoeffAPSs( cs, true, cs.slice->tileGroupAlfEnabled[COMP_Cb] || cs.slice->tileGroupAlfEnabled[COMP_Cr], false );
1973  const PreCalcValues& pcv = *cs.pcv;
1974 
1975  int ctuIdx = 0;
1976  for( int yPos = 0; yPos < pcv.lumaHeight; yPos += pcv.maxCUSize )
1977  {
1978  for( int xPos = 0; xPos < pcv.lumaWidth; xPos += pcv.maxCUSize )
1979  {
1980  reconstructCTU_MT( *cs.picture, cs, ctuIdx );
1981  ctuIdx++;
1982  }
1983  }
1984 }
1985 
1986 void EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::resetFrameStats()
1987 {
1988  // init Frame stats buffers
1989  const int numberOfChannels = getNumberValidChannels( m_chromaFormat );
1990  for( int channelIdx = 0; channelIdx < numberOfChannels; channelIdx++ )
1991  {
1992  const ChannelType channelID = ChannelType( channelIdx );
1993  const int numAlts = channelID == CH_L ? 1 : VVENC_MAX_NUM_ALF_ALTERNATIVES_CHROMA;
1994  const int numClasses = isLuma( channelID ) ? MAX_NUM_ALF_CLASSES : 1;
1995 
1996  for( int altIdx = 0; altIdx < numAlts; ++altIdx )
1997  {
1998  for( int shape = 0; shape != m_filterShapes[channelIdx].size(); shape++ )
1999  {
2000  for( int classIdx = 0; classIdx < numClasses; classIdx++ )
2001  {
2002  m_alfCovarianceFrame[channelIdx][shape][isLuma( channelID ) ? classIdx : altIdx].reset();
2003  }
2004  }
2005  }
2006  }
2007 }
2008 
2009 double EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::deriveCtbAlfEnableFlags( CodingStructure& cs, const int iShapeIdx, ChannelType channel, const double chromaWeight,
2010  const int numClasses, const int numCoeff, double& distUnfilter )
2011 {
2012  TempCtx ctxTempStart( m_CtxCache );
2013  TempCtx ctxTempBest( m_CtxCache );
2014  TempCtx ctxTempAltStart( m_CtxCache );
2015  TempCtx ctxTempAltBest( m_CtxCache );
2016  const ComponentID compIDFirst = isLuma( channel ) ? COMP_Y : COMP_Cb;
2017  const ComponentID compIDLast = isLuma( channel ) ? COMP_Y : COMP_Cr;
2018  const int numAlts = isLuma( channel ) ? 1 : m_alfParamTemp.numAlternativesChroma;
2019  const double invFactor = 1.0/((double)(1<<(m_NUM_BITS-1)));
2020  const bool doClip = isLuma( channel ) ? m_encCfg->m_useNonLinearAlfLuma : m_encCfg->m_useNonLinearAlfChroma;
2021  double cost = 0;
2022  distUnfilter = 0;
2023 
2024  setEnableFlag(m_alfParamTemp, channel, true);
2025 
2026  reconstructCoeff(m_alfParamTemp, channel, true, isLuma(channel));
2027  for( int altIdx = 0; altIdx < (isLuma(channel) ? 1 : VVENC_MAX_NUM_ALF_ALTERNATIVES_CHROMA); altIdx++)
2028  {
2029  for (int classIdx = 0; classIdx < (isLuma(channel) ? MAX_NUM_ALF_CLASSES : 1); classIdx++)
2030  {
2031  for (int i = 0; i < (isLuma(channel) ? MAX_NUM_ALF_LUMA_COEFF : MAX_NUM_ALF_CHROMA_COEFF); i++)
2032  {
2033  m_filterCoeffSet[isLuma(channel) ? classIdx : altIdx][i] = isLuma(channel) ? m_coeffFinal[classIdx * MAX_NUM_ALF_LUMA_COEFF + i] : m_chromaCoeffFinal[altIdx][i];
2034  m_filterClippSet[isLuma(channel) ? classIdx : altIdx][i] = isLuma(channel) ? m_clippFinal[classIdx * MAX_NUM_ALF_LUMA_COEFF + i] : m_chromaClippFinal[altIdx][i];
2035  }
2036  }
2037  }
2038 
2039  for( int ctuIdx = 0; ctuIdx < m_numCTUsInPic; ctuIdx++ )
2040  {
2041  for( int compID = compIDFirst; compID <= compIDLast; compID++ )
2042  {
2043  const double ctuLambda = chromaWeight > 0.0 ? (isLuma (channel) ? cs.picture->ctuQpaLambda[ctuIdx] : cs.picture->ctuQpaLambda[ctuIdx] * chromaWeight) : m_lambda[compID];
2044  double distUnfilterCtu = getUnfilteredDistortion( m_alfCovariance[compID][iShapeIdx][ctuIdx], numClasses );
2045 
2046  ctxTempStart = AlfCtx( m_CABACEstimator->getCtx() );
2047  m_CABACEstimator->resetBits();
2048  m_ctuEnableFlag[compID][ctuIdx] = 1;
2049  m_CABACEstimator->codeAlfCtuEnabledFlag( cs, ctuIdx, compID, &m_alfParamTemp );
2050  if( isLuma( channel ) )
2051  {
2052  // Evaluate cost of signaling filter set index for convergence of filters enabled flag / filter derivation
2053  assert( cs.picture->m_alfCtbFilterIndex[ctuIdx] == NUM_FIXED_FILTER_SETS );
2054  assert( cs.slice->tileGroupNumAps == 1 );
2055  m_CABACEstimator->codeAlfCtuFilterIndex(cs, ctuIdx, &m_alfParamTemp.alfEnabled[COMP_Y]);
2056  }
2057  double costOn = distUnfilterCtu + ctuLambda * FRAC_BITS_SCALE * m_CABACEstimator->getEstFracBits();
2058 
2059  ctxTempBest = AlfCtx( m_CABACEstimator->getCtx() );
2060  if( isLuma( channel ) )
2061  {
2062  costOn += doClip ? getFilteredDistortion<true >( m_alfCovariance[compID][iShapeIdx][ctuIdx], numClasses, m_alfParamTemp.numLumaFilters - 1, numCoeff )
2063  : getFilteredDistortion<false>( m_alfCovariance[compID][iShapeIdx][ctuIdx], numClasses, m_alfParamTemp.numLumaFilters - 1, numCoeff );;
2064  }
2065  else
2066  {
2067  double bestAltCost = MAX_DOUBLE;
2068  int bestAltIdx = -1;
2069  ctxTempAltStart = AlfCtx( ctxTempBest );
2070  for( int altIdx = 0; altIdx < numAlts; ++altIdx )
2071  {
2072  if( altIdx )
2073  m_CABACEstimator->getCtx() = AlfCtx( ctxTempAltStart );
2074  m_CABACEstimator->resetBits();
2075  m_ctuAlternative[compID][ctuIdx] = altIdx;
2076  m_CABACEstimator->codeAlfCtuAlternative( cs, ctuIdx, compID, &m_alfParamTemp );
2077  double r_altCost = ctuLambda * FRAC_BITS_SCALE * m_CABACEstimator->getEstFracBits();
2078 
2079  double altDist = 0.;
2080  altDist += doClip ? m_alfCovariance[compID][iShapeIdx][ctuIdx][0].calcErrorForCoeffs<true >( m_filterClippSet[altIdx], m_filterCoeffSet[altIdx], numCoeff, invFactor )
2081  : m_alfCovariance[compID][iShapeIdx][ctuIdx][0].calcErrorForCoeffs<false>( m_filterClippSet[altIdx], m_filterCoeffSet[altIdx], numCoeff, invFactor );
2082 
2083  double altCost = altDist + r_altCost;
2084  if( altCost < bestAltCost )
2085  {
2086  bestAltCost = altCost;
2087  bestAltIdx = altIdx;
2088  ctxTempBest = AlfCtx( m_CABACEstimator->getCtx() );
2089  }
2090  }
2091  m_ctuAlternative[compID][ctuIdx] = bestAltIdx;
2092  costOn += bestAltCost;
2093  }
2094 
2095  m_CABACEstimator->getCtx() = AlfCtx( ctxTempStart );
2096  m_CABACEstimator->resetBits();
2097  m_ctuEnableFlag[compID][ctuIdx] = 0;
2098  m_CABACEstimator->codeAlfCtuEnabledFlag( cs, ctuIdx, compID, &m_alfParamTemp);
2099  double costOff = distUnfilterCtu + ctuLambda * FRAC_BITS_SCALE * m_CABACEstimator->getEstFracBits();
2100 
2101  if( costOn < costOff )
2102  {
2103  cost += costOn;
2104  m_CABACEstimator->getCtx() = AlfCtx( ctxTempBest );
2105  m_ctuEnableFlag[compID][ctuIdx] = 1;
2106  }
2107  else
2108  {
2109  cost += costOff;
2110  m_ctuEnableFlag[compID][ctuIdx] = 0;
2111  distUnfilter += distUnfilterCtu;
2112  }
2113  }
2114  }
2115 
2116  if( isChroma( channel ) )
2117  {
2118  setEnableFlag(m_alfParamTemp, channel, m_ctuEnableFlag);
2119  }
2120 
2121  return cost;
2122 }
2123 
2124 void EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::alfEncoder( CodingStructure& cs, AlfParam& alfParam, const ChannelType channel, const double lambdaChromaWeight )
2125 {
2126  PROFILER_SCOPE_AND_STAGE( 0, g_timeProfiler, P_ALF_ENC );
2127  const TempCtx ctxStart( m_CtxCache, AlfCtx( m_CABACEstimator->getCtx() ) );
2128  TempCtx ctxBest( m_CtxCache );
2129 
2130  double costMin = MAX_DOUBLE;
2131 
2132  std::vector<AlfFilterShape>& alfFilterShape = alfParam.filterShapes[channel];
2133  m_bitsNewFilter[channel] = 0;
2134  const int numClasses = isLuma( channel ) ? MAX_NUM_ALF_CLASSES : 1;
2135  int uiCoeffBits = 0;
2136 
2137  for( int iShapeIdx = 0; iShapeIdx < alfFilterShape.size(); iShapeIdx++ )
2138  {
2139  m_alfParamTemp = alfParam;
2140  //1. get unfiltered distortion
2141  if( isChroma(channel) )
2142  m_alfParamTemp.numAlternativesChroma = 1;
2143  double cost = getUnfilteredDistortion( m_alfCovarianceFrame[channel][iShapeIdx], channel );
2144  cost /= 1.001; // slight preference for unfiltered choice
2145 
2146  if( cost < costMin )
2147  {
2148  costMin = cost;
2149  setEnableFlag( alfParam, channel, false );
2150  // no CABAC signalling
2151  ctxBest = AlfCtx( ctxStart );
2152  setCtuEnableFlag( m_ctuEnableFlagTmp, channel, 0 );
2153  if( isChroma(channel) )
2154  setCtuAlternativeChroma( m_ctuAlternativeTmp, 0 );
2155  }
2156 
2157  const int nonLinearFlagMax =
2158  ( isLuma( channel ) ? m_encCfg->m_useNonLinearAlfLuma : m_encCfg->m_useNonLinearAlfChroma ) // For Chroma non linear flag is check for each alternative filter
2159  ? 2 : 1;
2160 
2161  for( int nonLinearFlag = 0; nonLinearFlag < nonLinearFlagMax; nonLinearFlag++ )
2162  {
2163  for( int numAlternatives = isLuma( channel ) ? 1 : getMaxNumAlternativesChroma(); numAlternatives > 0; numAlternatives-- )
2164  {
2165  if( isChroma( channel ) )
2166  m_alfParamTemp.numAlternativesChroma = numAlternatives;
2167  //2. all CTUs are on
2168  setEnableFlag( m_alfParamTemp, channel, true );
2169  m_alfParamTemp.nonLinearFlag[channel] = nonLinearFlag;
2170  m_CABACEstimator->getCtx() = AlfCtx( ctxStart );
2171  setCtuEnableFlag( m_ctuEnableFlag, channel, 1 );
2172  // all alternatives are on
2173  if( isChroma( channel ) )
2174  initCtuAlternativeChroma( m_ctuAlternative );
2175  cost = getFilterCoeffAndCost( cs, 0, channel, true, iShapeIdx, uiCoeffBits );
2176 
2177  if( cost < costMin )
2178  {
2179  m_bitsNewFilter[channel] = uiCoeffBits;
2180  costMin = cost;
2181  copyAlfParam( alfParam, m_alfParamTemp, channel );
2182  ctxBest = AlfCtx( m_CABACEstimator->getCtx() );
2183  setCtuEnableFlag( m_ctuEnableFlagTmp, channel, 1 );
2184  if( isChroma(channel) )
2185  copyCtuAlternativeChroma( m_ctuAlternativeTmp, m_ctuAlternative );
2186  }
2187 
2188  //3. CTU decision
2189  double distUnfilter = 0;
2190  double prevItCost = MAX_DOUBLE;
2191  const int iterNum = isLuma(channel) ? (2 * 4 + 1) : (2 * (2 + m_alfParamTemp.numAlternativesChroma - 1) + 1);
2192 
2193  for( int iter = 0; iter < iterNum; iter++ )
2194  {
2195  if ((iter & 0x01) == 0)
2196  {
2197  m_CABACEstimator->getCtx() = AlfCtx(ctxStart);
2198  cost = m_lambda[channel] * uiCoeffBits;
2199  cost += deriveCtbAlfEnableFlags(cs, iShapeIdx, channel, lambdaChromaWeight,
2200  numClasses, alfFilterShape[iShapeIdx].numCoeff, distUnfilter);
2201  if (cost < costMin)
2202  {
2203  m_bitsNewFilter[channel] = uiCoeffBits;
2204  costMin = cost;
2205  ctxBest = AlfCtx(m_CABACEstimator->getCtx());
2206  copyCtuEnableFlag(m_ctuEnableFlagTmp, m_ctuEnableFlag, channel);
2207  if( isChroma(channel) )
2208  copyCtuAlternativeChroma( m_ctuAlternativeTmp, m_ctuAlternative );
2209  copyAlfParam(alfParam, m_alfParamTemp, channel);
2210  }
2211  else if ( cost >= prevItCost )
2212  {
2213  // High probability that we have converged or we are diverging
2214  break;
2215  }
2216  prevItCost = cost;
2217  }
2218  else
2219  {
2220  // unfiltered distortion is added due to some CTBs may not use filter
2221  // no need to reset CABAC here, since uiCoeffBits is not affected
2222  /*cost = */getFilterCoeffAndCost( cs, distUnfilter, channel, true, iShapeIdx, uiCoeffBits );
2223  }
2224  }//for iter
2225  // Decrease number of alternatives and reset ctu params and filters
2226  }
2227  }// for nonLineaFlag
2228  }//for shapeIdx
2229  m_CABACEstimator->getCtx() = AlfCtx( ctxBest );
2230  if( isChroma(channel) )
2231  copyCtuAlternativeChroma( m_ctuAlternative, m_ctuAlternativeTmp );
2232  copyCtuEnableFlag( m_ctuEnableFlag, m_ctuEnableFlagTmp, channel );
2233 }
2234 
2235 void EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::copyAlfParam( AlfParam& alfParamDst, AlfParam& alfParamSrc, ChannelType channel )
2236 {
2237  if( isLuma( channel ) )
2238  {
2239  alfParamDst = alfParamSrc;
2240  }
2241  else
2242  {
2243  alfParamDst.alfEnabled[COMP_Cb] = alfParamSrc.alfEnabled[COMP_Cb];
2244  alfParamDst.alfEnabled[COMP_Cr] = alfParamSrc.alfEnabled[COMP_Cr];
2245  alfParamDst.numAlternativesChroma = alfParamSrc.numAlternativesChroma;
2246  alfParamDst.nonLinearFlag[CH_C] = alfParamSrc.nonLinearFlag[CH_C];
2247  memcpy( alfParamDst.chromaCoeff, alfParamSrc.chromaCoeff, sizeof( alfParamDst.chromaCoeff ) );
2248  memcpy( alfParamDst.chromaClipp, alfParamSrc.chromaClipp, sizeof( alfParamDst.chromaClipp ) );
2249  }
2250 }
2251 
2252 double EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::getFilterCoeffAndCost( CodingStructure& cs, double distUnfilter, ChannelType channel, bool bReCollectStat, int iShapeIdx, int& uiCoeffBits, bool onlyFilterCost )
2253 {
2254  //collect stat based on CTU decision
2255  if( bReCollectStat )
2256  {
2257  getFrameStats( channel, iShapeIdx );
2258  }
2259 
2260  double dist = distUnfilter;
2261  uiCoeffBits = 0;
2262  AlfFilterShape& alfFilterShape = m_alfParamTemp.filterShapes[channel][iShapeIdx];
2263  //get filter coeff
2264  if( isLuma( channel ) )
2265  {
2266  std::fill_n(m_alfClipMerged[iShapeIdx][0][0], MAX_NUM_ALF_LUMA_COEFF*MAX_NUM_ALF_CLASSES*MAX_NUM_ALF_CLASSES, m_alfParamTemp.nonLinearFlag[channel] ? AlfNumClippingValues / 2 : 0);
2267  // Reset Merge Tmp Cov
2268  m_alfCovarianceMerged[iShapeIdx][MAX_NUM_ALF_CLASSES].reset();
2269  m_alfCovarianceMerged[iShapeIdx][MAX_NUM_ALF_CLASSES + 1].reset();
2270  //distortion
