2271  dist += mergeFiltersAndCost( m_alfParamTemp, alfFilterShape, m_alfCovarianceFrame[channel][iShapeIdx], m_alfCovarianceMerged[iShapeIdx], m_alfClipMerged[iShapeIdx], uiCoeffBits );
2272  }
2273  else
2274  {
2275  //distortion
2276  for( int altIdx = 0; altIdx < m_alfParamTemp.numAlternativesChroma; ++altIdx )
2277  {
2278  assert(alfFilterShape.numCoeff == m_alfCovarianceFrame[channel][iShapeIdx][altIdx].numCoeff);
2279  AlfParam bestSliceParam;
2280  double bestCost = MAX_DOUBLE;
2281  double bestDist = MAX_DOUBLE;
2282  int bestCoeffBits = 0;
2283  const int nonLinearFlagMax = m_encCfg->m_useNonLinearAlfChroma ? 2 : 1;
2284 
2285  for( int nonLinearFlag = 0; nonLinearFlag < nonLinearFlagMax; nonLinearFlag++ )
2286  {
2287  int currentNonLinearFlag = m_alfParamTemp.nonLinearFlag[channel] ? 1 : 0;
2288  if (nonLinearFlag != currentNonLinearFlag)
2289  {
2290  continue;
2291  }
2292 
2293  std::fill_n(m_filterClippSet[altIdx], MAX_NUM_ALF_CHROMA_COEFF, nonLinearFlag ? AlfNumClippingValues / 2 : 0 );
2294  double dist = m_alfCovarianceFrame[channel][iShapeIdx][altIdx].pixAcc + deriveCoeffQuant( m_filterClippSet[altIdx], m_filterCoeffSet[altIdx], m_alfCovarianceFrame[channel][iShapeIdx][altIdx], alfFilterShape, m_NUM_BITS, nonLinearFlag );
2295  for( int i = 0; i < MAX_NUM_ALF_CHROMA_COEFF; i++ )
2296  {
2297  m_alfParamTemp.chromaCoeff[altIdx][i] = m_filterCoeffSet[altIdx][i];
2298  m_alfParamTemp.chromaClipp[altIdx][i] = m_filterClippSet[altIdx][i];
2299  }
2300  int coeffBits = getChromaCoeffRate( m_alfParamTemp, altIdx );
2301  double cost = dist + m_lambda[channel] * coeffBits;
2302  if( cost < bestCost )
2303  {
2304  bestCost = cost;
2305  bestDist = dist;
2306  bestCoeffBits = coeffBits;
2307  bestSliceParam = m_alfParamTemp;
2308  }
2309  }
2310  uiCoeffBits += bestCoeffBits;
2311  dist += bestDist;
2312  m_alfParamTemp = bestSliceParam;
2313  }
2314  uiCoeffBits += lengthUvlc( m_alfParamTemp.numAlternativesChroma-1 );
2315  uiCoeffBits++;
2316  }
2317  if (onlyFilterCost)
2318  {
2319  return dist + m_lambda[channel] * uiCoeffBits;
2320  }
2321  double rate = uiCoeffBits;
2322  m_CABACEstimator->resetBits();
2323  m_CABACEstimator->codeAlfCtuEnabled( cs, channel, &m_alfParamTemp);
2324  for( int ctuIdx = 0; ctuIdx < m_numCTUsInPic; ctuIdx++ )
2325  {
2326  if( isLuma( channel ) )
2327  {
2328  // Evaluate cost of signaling filter set index for convergence of filters enabled flag / filter derivation
2329  assert( cs.picture->m_alfCtbFilterIndex[ctuIdx] == NUM_FIXED_FILTER_SETS );
2330  assert( cs.slice->tileGroupNumAps == 1 );
2331  m_CABACEstimator->codeAlfCtuFilterIndex(cs, ctuIdx, &m_alfParamTemp.alfEnabled[COMP_Y]);
2332  }
2333  }
2334  m_CABACEstimator->codeAlfCtuAlternatives( cs, channel, &m_alfParamTemp );
2335  rate += FRAC_BITS_SCALE * m_CABACEstimator->getEstFracBits();
2336  return dist + m_lambda[channel] * rate;
2337 }
2338 
2339 int EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::getChromaCoeffRate( AlfParam& alfParam, int altIdx )
2340 {
2341  int iBits = 0;
2342 
2343  AlfFilterShape alfShape(5);
2344  // Filter coefficients
2345  for( int i = 0; i < alfShape.numCoeff - 1; i++ )
2346  {
2347  iBits += lengthUvlc( abs( alfParam.chromaCoeff[ altIdx ][ i ] ) ); // alf_coeff_chroma[altIdx][i]
2348  if( ( alfParam.chromaCoeff[ altIdx ][ i ] ) != 0 )
2349  iBits += 1;
2350  }
2351 
2352  if( m_alfParamTemp.nonLinearFlag[CH_C] )
2353  {
2354  for (int i = 0; i < alfShape.numCoeff - 1; i++)
2355  {
2356  if( !abs( alfParam.chromaCoeff[altIdx][i] ) )
2357  {
2358  alfParam.chromaClipp[altIdx][i] = 0;
2359  }
2360  }
2361  iBits += ((alfShape.numCoeff - 1) << 1);
2362  }
2363  return iBits;
2364 }
2365 
2366 double EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::getUnfilteredDistortion( AlfCovariance* cov, ChannelType channel )
2367 {
2368  double dist = 0;
2369  if( isLuma( channel ) )
2370  {
2371  dist = getUnfilteredDistortion( cov, MAX_NUM_ALF_CLASSES );
2372  }
2373  else
2374  {
2375  dist = getUnfilteredDistortion( cov, 1 );
2376  }
2377  return dist;
2378 }
2379 
2380 double EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::getUnfilteredDistortion( AlfCovariance* cov, const int numClasses )
2381 {
2382  double dist = 0;
2383  for( int classIdx = 0; classIdx < numClasses; classIdx++ )
2384  {
2385  dist += cov[classIdx].pixAcc;
2386  }
2387  return dist;
2388 }
2389 
2390 template<bool doClip>
2391 double EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::getFilteredDistortion( AlfCovariance* cov, const int numClasses, const int numFiltersMinus1, const int numCoeff )
2392 {
2393  const double invFactor = 1.0/((double)(1<<(m_NUM_BITS-1)));
2394  double dist = 0;
2395 
2396  for( int classIdx = 0; classIdx < numClasses; classIdx++ )
2397  {
2398  dist += cov[classIdx].calcErrorForCoeffs<doClip>(m_filterClippSet[classIdx], m_filterCoeffSet[classIdx], numCoeff, invFactor);
2399  }
2400 
2401  return dist;
2402 }
2403 
2404 double EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::mergeFiltersAndCost( AlfParam& alfParam, AlfFilterShape& alfShape, AlfCovariance* covFrame, AlfCovariance* covMerged, int clipMerged[MAX_NUM_ALF_CLASSES][MAX_NUM_ALF_CLASSES][MAX_NUM_ALF_LUMA_COEFF], int& uiCoeffBits )
2405 {
2406  int numFiltersBest = 0;
2407  int numFilters = MAX_NUM_ALF_CLASSES;
2408  bool codedVarBins[MAX_NUM_ALF_CLASSES];
2409  double errorForce0CoeffTab[MAX_NUM_ALF_CLASSES][2];
2410 
2411  double cost, cost0, dist, distForce0, costMin = MAX_DOUBLE;
2412  int coeffBits, coeffBitsForce0;
2413 
2414  mergeClasses( alfShape, covFrame, covMerged, clipMerged, MAX_NUM_ALF_CLASSES, m_filterIndices );
2415 
2416  while( numFilters >= 1 )
2417  {
2418  // filter coeffs are stored in m_filterCoeffSet
2419  dist = deriveFilterCoeffs( covFrame, covMerged, clipMerged, alfShape, m_filterIndices[numFilters - 1], numFilters, errorForce0CoeffTab, alfParam );
2420  coeffBits = deriveFilterCoefficientsPredictionMode( alfShape, m_filterCoeffSet, m_diffFilterCoeff, numFilters );
2421  distForce0 = getDistForce0( alfShape, numFilters, errorForce0CoeffTab, codedVarBins );
2422  coeffBitsForce0 = getCostFilterCoeffForce0( alfShape, m_filterCoeffSet, numFilters, codedVarBins );
2423 
2424  cost = dist + m_lambda[COMP_Y] * coeffBits;
2425  cost0 = distForce0 + m_lambda[COMP_Y] * coeffBitsForce0;
2426 
2427  if( cost0 < cost )
2428  {
2429  cost = cost0;
2430  }
2431 
2432  if( cost <= costMin )
2433  {
2434  costMin = cost;
2435  numFiltersBest = numFilters;
2436  }
2437  numFilters--;
2438  }
2439 
2440  dist = deriveFilterCoeffs( covFrame, covMerged, clipMerged, alfShape, m_filterIndices[numFiltersBest - 1], numFiltersBest, errorForce0CoeffTab, alfParam );
2441  coeffBits = deriveFilterCoefficientsPredictionMode( alfShape, m_filterCoeffSet, m_diffFilterCoeff, numFiltersBest );
2442  distForce0 = getDistForce0( alfShape, numFiltersBest, errorForce0CoeffTab, codedVarBins );
2443  coeffBitsForce0 = getCostFilterCoeffForce0( alfShape, m_filterCoeffSet, numFiltersBest, codedVarBins );
2444 
2445  cost = dist + m_lambda[COMP_Y] * coeffBits;
2446  cost0 = distForce0 + m_lambda[COMP_Y] * coeffBitsForce0;
2447 
2448  alfParam.numLumaFilters = numFiltersBest;
2449  double distReturn;
2450  if (cost <= cost0)
2451  {
2452  distReturn = dist;
2453  alfParam.alfLumaCoeffDeltaFlag = 0;
2454  uiCoeffBits = coeffBits;
2455  }
2456  else
2457  {
2458  distReturn = distForce0;
2459  alfParam.alfLumaCoeffDeltaFlag = 1;
2460  uiCoeffBits = coeffBitsForce0;
2461  memcpy( alfParam.alfLumaCoeffFlag, codedVarBins, sizeof( codedVarBins ) );
2462 
2463  for( int varInd = 0; varInd < numFiltersBest; varInd++ )
2464  {
2465  if( codedVarBins[varInd] == 0 )
2466  {
2467  memset( m_filterCoeffSet[varInd], 0, sizeof( int )*MAX_NUM_ALF_LUMA_COEFF );
2468  memset( m_filterClippSet[varInd], 0, sizeof( int )*MAX_NUM_ALF_LUMA_COEFF );
2469  }
2470  }
2471  }
2472 
2473  for( int ind = 0; ind < alfParam.numLumaFilters; ++ind )
2474  {
2475  for( int i = 0; i < alfShape.numCoeff; i++ )
2476  {
2477  alfParam.lumaCoeff[ind * MAX_NUM_ALF_LUMA_COEFF + i] = m_filterCoeffSet[ind][i];
2478  alfParam.lumaClipp[ind * MAX_NUM_ALF_LUMA_COEFF + i] = m_filterClippSet[ind][i];
2479  }
2480  }
2481 
2482  memcpy( alfParam.filterCoeffDeltaIdx, m_filterIndices[numFiltersBest - 1], sizeof( short ) * MAX_NUM_ALF_CLASSES );
2483  uiCoeffBits += getNonFilterCoeffRate( alfParam );
2484  return distReturn;
2485 }
2486 
2487 int EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::getNonFilterCoeffRate( AlfParam& alfParam )
2488 {
2489  int len = 2 + lengthUvlc (alfParam.numLumaFilters - 1);
2490  if( alfParam.numLumaFilters > 1 )
2491  {
2492  const int coeffLength = ceilLog2(alfParam.numLumaFilters);
2493  for( int i = 0; i < MAX_NUM_ALF_CLASSES; i++ )
2494  {
2495  len += coeffLength; // alf_luma_coeff_delta_idx u(v)
2496  }
2497  }
2498  return len;
2499 }
2500 
2501 
2502 int EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::getCostFilterCoeffForce0( AlfFilterShape& alfShape, int **pDiffQFilterCoeffIntPP, const int numFilters, bool* codedVarBins )
2503 {
2504  int len = 0;
2505  // Filter coefficients
2506  for( int ind = 0; ind < numFilters; ++ind )
2507  {
2508  if( codedVarBins[ind] )
2509  {
2510  for( int i = 0; i < alfShape.numCoeff - 1; i++ )
2511  {
2512  len += lengthUvlc( abs( pDiffQFilterCoeffIntPP[ ind ][ i ] ) ); // alf_coeff_luma_delta[i][j]
2513  if( ( abs( pDiffQFilterCoeffIntPP[ ind ][ i ] ) != 0 ) )
2514  len += 1;
2515  }
2516  }
2517  else
2518  {
2519  for (int i = 0; i < alfShape.numCoeff - 1; i++)
2520  {
2521  len += lengthUvlc(0); // alf_coeff_luma_delta[i][j]
2522  }
2523  }
2524  }
2525 
2526  if( m_alfParamTemp.nonLinearFlag[CH_L] )
2527  {
2528  for (int ind = 0; ind < numFilters; ++ind)
2529  {
2530  for (int i = 0; i < alfShape.numCoeff - 1; i++)
2531  {
2532  if (!abs(pDiffQFilterCoeffIntPP[ind][i]))
2533  {
2534  m_filterClippSet[ind][i] = 0;
2535  }
2536  len += 2;
2537  }
2538  }
2539  }
2540 
2541  return len;
2542 }
2543 
2544 int EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::deriveFilterCoefficientsPredictionMode( AlfFilterShape& alfShape, int **filterSet, int** filterCoeffDiff, const int numFilters )
2545 {
2546  return (m_alfParamTemp.nonLinearFlag[CH_L] ? getCostFilterClipp(alfShape, filterSet, numFilters) : 0) + getCostFilterCoeff(alfShape, filterSet, numFilters);
2547 }
2548 
2549 int EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::getCostFilterCoeff( AlfFilterShape& alfShape, int **pDiffQFilterCoeffIntPP, const int numFilters )
2550 {
2551  return lengthFilterCoeffs( alfShape, numFilters, pDiffQFilterCoeffIntPP ); // alf_coeff_luma_delta[i][j];
2552 }
2553 
2554 int EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::getCostFilterClipp( AlfFilterShape& alfShape, int **pDiffQFilterCoeffIntPP, const int numFilters )
2555 {
2556  for (int filterIdx = 0; filterIdx < numFilters; ++filterIdx)
2557  {
2558  for (int i = 0; i < alfShape.numCoeff - 1; i++)
2559  {
2560  if (!abs(pDiffQFilterCoeffIntPP[filterIdx][i]))
2561  {
2562  m_filterClippSet[filterIdx][i] = 0;
2563  }
2564  }
2565  }
2566  return (numFilters * (alfShape.numCoeff - 1)) << 1;
2567 }
2568 
2569 int EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::lengthFilterCoeffs( AlfFilterShape& alfShape, const int numFilters, int **FilterCoeff )
2570 {
2571  int bitCnt = 0;
2572 
2573  for( int ind = 0; ind < numFilters; ++ind )
2574  {
2575  for( int i = 0; i < alfShape.numCoeff - 1; i++ )
2576  {
2577  bitCnt += lengthUvlc( abs( FilterCoeff[ ind ][ i ] ) );
2578  if( abs( FilterCoeff[ ind ][ i ] ) != 0 )
2579  bitCnt += 1;
2580  }
2581  }
2582  return bitCnt;
2583 }
2584 
2585 
2586 double EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::getDistForce0( AlfFilterShape& alfShape, const int numFilters, double errorTabForce0Coeff[MAX_NUM_ALF_CLASSES][2], bool* codedVarBins )
2587 {
2588  int bitsVarBin[MAX_NUM_ALF_CLASSES];
2589 
2590  for( int ind = 0; ind < numFilters; ++ind )
2591  {
2592  bitsVarBin[ind] = 0;
2593  for( int i = 0; i < alfShape.numCoeff - 1; i++ )
2594  {
2595  bitsVarBin[ ind ] += lengthUvlc( abs( m_filterCoeffSet[ ind ][ i ] ) );
2596  if( abs( m_filterCoeffSet[ ind ][ i ] ) != 0 )
2597  bitsVarBin[ ind ] += 1;
2598  }
2599  }
2600 
2601  int zeroBitsVarBin = 0;
2602  for (int i = 0; i < alfShape.numCoeff - 1; i++)
2603  {
2604  zeroBitsVarBin += lengthUvlc( 0 );
2605  }
2606  if( m_alfParamTemp.nonLinearFlag[CH_L] )
2607  {
2608  for (int ind = 0; ind < numFilters; ++ind)
2609  {
2610  for (int i = 0; i < alfShape.numCoeff - 1; i++)
2611  {
2612  if (!abs(m_filterCoeffSet[ind][i]))
2613  {
2614  m_filterClippSet[ind][i] = 0;
2615  }
2616  }
2617  }
2618  }
2619 
2620  double distForce0 = getDistCoeffForce0( codedVarBins, errorTabForce0Coeff, bitsVarBin, zeroBitsVarBin, numFilters);
2621 
2622  return distForce0;
2623 }
2624 double EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::getDistCoeffForce0( bool* codedVarBins, double errorForce0CoeffTab[MAX_NUM_ALF_CLASSES][2], int* bitsVarBin, int zeroBitsVarBin, const int numFilters)
2625 {
2626  double distForce0 = 0;
2627  std::memset( codedVarBins, 0, sizeof( *codedVarBins ) * MAX_NUM_ALF_CLASSES );
2628 
2629  for( int filtIdx = 0; filtIdx < numFilters; filtIdx++ )
2630  {
2631  double costDiff = (errorForce0CoeffTab[filtIdx][0] + m_lambda[COMP_Y] * zeroBitsVarBin) - (errorForce0CoeffTab[filtIdx][1] + m_lambda[COMP_Y] * bitsVarBin[filtIdx]);
2632  codedVarBins[filtIdx] = costDiff > 0 ? true : false;
2633  distForce0 += errorForce0CoeffTab[filtIdx][codedVarBins[filtIdx] ? 1 : 0];
2634  }
2635 
2636  return distForce0;
2637 }
2638 
2639 int EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::lengthUvlc( int uiCode )
2640 {
2641  int uiLength = 1;
2642  int uiTemp = ++uiCode;
2643 
2644  CHECK( !uiTemp, "Integer overflow" );
2645 
2646  while( 1 != uiTemp )
2647  {
2648  uiTemp >>= 1;
2649  uiLength += 2;
2650  }
2651  // Take care of cases where uiLength > 32
2652  return ( uiLength >> 1 ) + ( ( uiLength + 1 ) >> 1 );
2653 }
2654 
2655 
2656 double EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::deriveFilterCoeffs( AlfCovariance* cov, AlfCovariance* covMerged, int clipMerged[MAX_NUM_ALF_CLASSES][MAX_NUM_ALF_CLASSES][MAX_NUM_ALF_LUMA_COEFF], AlfFilterShape& alfShape, short* filterIndices, int numFilters, double errorTabForce0Coeff[MAX_NUM_ALF_CLASSES][2], AlfParam& alfParam )
2657 {
2658  PROFILER_SCOPE_AND_STAGE( 0, g_timeProfiler, P_ALF_DERIVE_COEF );
2659  double error = 0.0;
2660  AlfCovariance& tmpCov = covMerged[MAX_NUM_ALF_CLASSES];
2661 
2662  for( int filtIdx = 0; filtIdx < numFilters; filtIdx++ )
2663  {
2664  tmpCov.reset();
2665  bool found_clip = false;
2666  for( int classIdx = 0; classIdx < MAX_NUM_ALF_CLASSES; classIdx++ )
2667  {
2668  if( filterIndices[classIdx] == filtIdx )
2669  {
2670  tmpCov += cov[classIdx];
2671  if( !found_clip )
2672  {
2673  found_clip = true; // clip should be at the adress of shortest one
2674  memcpy(m_filterClippSet[filtIdx], clipMerged[numFilters-1][classIdx], sizeof(int[MAX_NUM_ALF_LUMA_COEFF]));
2675  }
2676  }
2677  }
2678 
2679  // Find coeffcients
2680  assert(alfShape.numCoeff == tmpCov.numCoeff);
2681  errorTabForce0Coeff[filtIdx][1] = tmpCov.pixAcc + deriveCoeffQuant( m_filterClippSet[filtIdx], m_filterCoeffSet[filtIdx], tmpCov, alfShape, m_NUM_BITS, false );
2682  errorTabForce0Coeff[filtIdx][0] = tmpCov.pixAcc;
2683  error += errorTabForce0Coeff[filtIdx][1];
2684  }
2685  return error;
2686 }
2687 
2688 double EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::deriveCoeffQuant( int *filterClipp, int *filterCoeffQuant, const AlfCovariance& cov, const AlfFilterShape& shape, const int bitDepth, const bool optimizeClip )
2689 {
2690  const int factor = 1 << ( bitDepth - 1 );
2691  const int max_value = factor - 1;
2692  const int min_value = -factor + 1;
2693  const double invFactor = 1.0 /((double)factor);
2694  const bool doClip = m_encCfg->m_useNonLinearAlfLuma || m_encCfg->m_useNonLinearAlfChroma;
2695 
2696  const int numCoeff = shape.numCoeff;
2697  double filterCoeff[MAX_NUM_ALF_LUMA_COEFF];
2698 
2699  cov.optimizeFilter( shape, filterClipp, filterCoeff, optimizeClip );
2700  roundFiltCoeff( filterCoeffQuant, filterCoeff, numCoeff, factor );
2701 
2702  for ( int i = 0; i < numCoeff - 1; i++ )
2703  {
2704  filterCoeffQuant[i] = std::min( max_value, std::max( min_value, filterCoeffQuant[i] ) );
2705  }
2706  filterCoeffQuant[numCoeff - 1] = 0;
2707 
2708  int modified=1;
2709 
2710  double errRef = doClip ? cov.calcErrorForCoeffs<true >( filterClipp, filterCoeffQuant, numCoeff, invFactor )
2711  : cov.calcErrorForCoeffs<false>( filterClipp, filterCoeffQuant, numCoeff, invFactor );
2712  while( modified )
2713  {
2714  modified=0;
2715  for( int sign: {1, -1} )
2716  {
2717  double errMin = MAX_DOUBLE;
2718  int minInd = -1;
2719 
2720  for( int k = 0; k < numCoeff-1; k++ )
2721  {
2722  if( filterCoeffQuant[k] - sign > max_value || filterCoeffQuant[k] - sign < min_value )
2723  continue;
2724 
2725  double error = errRef + (doClip ? cov.calcDiffErrorForCoeffs<true >( filterClipp, filterCoeffQuant, numCoeff, filterCoeffQuant[k], filterCoeffQuant[k] - sign, k, invFactor )
2726  : cov.calcDiffErrorForCoeffs<false>( filterClipp, filterCoeffQuant, numCoeff, filterCoeffQuant[k], filterCoeffQuant[k] - sign, k, invFactor ));
2727 
2728  if( error < errMin )
2729  {
2730  errMin = error;
2731  minInd = k;
2732  }
2733  }
2734  if( errMin < errRef )
2735  {
2736  filterCoeffQuant[minInd] -= sign;
2737  modified++;
2738  errRef = errMin;
2739  }
2740  }
2741  }
2742 
2743  return errRef;
2744 }
2745 
2746 void EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::roundFiltCoeff( int *filterCoeffQuant, double *filterCoeff, const int numCoeff, const int factor )
2747 {
2748  for( int i = 0; i < numCoeff; i++ )
2749  {
2750  int sign = filterCoeff[i] > 0 ? 1 : -1;
2751  filterCoeffQuant[i] = int( filterCoeff[i] * sign * factor + 0.5 ) * sign;
2752  }
2753 }
2754 
2755 void EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::roundFiltCoeffCCALF( int16_t *filterCoeffQuant, double *filterCoeff, const int numCoeff, const int factor )
2756 {
2757  for( int i = 0; i < numCoeff; i++ )
2758  {
2759  int sign = filterCoeff[i] > 0 ? 1 : -1;
2760  double best_err = 128.0*128.0;
2761  int best_index = 0;
2762  for(int k = 0; k < CCALF_CANDS_COEFF_NR; k++)
2763  {
2764  double err = (filterCoeff[i] * sign * factor - CCALF_SMALL_TAB[k]);
2765  err = err*err;
2766  if(err < best_err)
2767  {
2768  best_err = err;
2769  best_index = k;
2770  }
2771  }
2772  filterCoeffQuant[i] = CCALF_SMALL_TAB[best_index] * sign;
2773  }
2774 }
2775 
2776 void EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::mergeClasses( const AlfFilterShape& alfShape, AlfCovariance* cov, AlfCovariance* covMerged, int clipMerged[MAX_NUM_ALF_CLASSES][MAX_NUM_ALF_CLASSES][MAX_NUM_ALF_LUMA_COEFF], const int numClasses, short filterIndices[MAX_NUM_ALF_CLASSES][MAX_NUM_ALF_CLASSES] )
2777 {
2778  PROFILER_SCOPE_AND_STAGE( 0, g_timeProfiler, P_ALF_MERGE );
2779  int tmpClip [MAX_NUM_ALF_LUMA_COEFF];
2780  int bestMergeClip [MAX_NUM_ALF_LUMA_COEFF];
2781  double err [MAX_NUM_ALF_CLASSES];
2782  double bestMergeErr =MAX_DOUBLE;
2783  bool availableClass [MAX_NUM_ALF_CLASSES];
2784  uint8_t indexList [MAX_NUM_ALF_CLASSES];
2785  uint8_t indexListTemp [MAX_NUM_ALF_CLASSES];
2786  int numRemaining = numClasses;
2787 
2788  memset( filterIndices, 0, sizeof( short ) * MAX_NUM_ALF_CLASSES * MAX_NUM_ALF_CLASSES );
2789 
2790  for( int i = 0; i < numClasses; i++ )
2791  {
2792  filterIndices[numRemaining - 1][i] = i;
2793  indexList[i] = i;
2794  availableClass[i] = true;
2795  covMerged[i] = cov[i];
2796  covMerged[i].numBins = m_alfParamTemp.nonLinearFlag[CH_L] ? AlfNumClippingValues : 1;
2797  }
2798 
2799  // Try merging different covariance matrices
2800 
2801  // temporal AlfCovariance structure is allocated as the last element in covMerged array, the size of covMerged is MAX_NUM_ALF_CLASSES + 1
2802  AlfCovariance& tmpCov = covMerged[MAX_NUM_ALF_CLASSES];
2803  tmpCov.numBins = m_alfParamTemp.nonLinearFlag[CH_L] ? AlfNumClippingValues : 1;
2804 
2805  // init Clip
2806  for( int i = 0; i < numClasses; i++ )
2807  {
2808  std::fill_n(clipMerged[numRemaining-1][i], MAX_NUM_ALF_LUMA_COEFF, m_alfParamTemp.nonLinearFlag[CH_L] ? AlfNumClippingValues / 2 : 0);
2809  if ( m_alfParamTemp.nonLinearFlag[CH_L] )
2810  {
2811  err[i] = covMerged[i].optimizeFilterClip( alfShape, clipMerged[numRemaining-1][i] );
2812  }
2813  else
2814  {
2815  err[i] = covMerged[i].calculateError( clipMerged[numRemaining-1][i] );
2816  }
2817  }
2818 
2819  while( numRemaining >= 2 )
2820  {
2821  double errorMin = std::numeric_limits<double>::max();
2822  int bestToMergeIdx1 = 0, bestToMergeIdx2 = 1;
2823 
2824  for( int i = 0; i < numClasses - 1; i++ )
2825  {
2826  if( availableClass[i] )
2827  {
2828  for( int j = i + 1; j < numClasses; j++ )
2829  {
2830  if( availableClass[j] )
2831  {
2832  double error1 = err[i];
2833  double error2 = err[j];
2834 
2835  tmpCov.add( covMerged[i], covMerged[j] );
2836  for( int l = 0; l < MAX_NUM_ALF_LUMA_COEFF; ++l )
2837  {
2838  tmpClip[l] = (clipMerged[numRemaining-1][i][l] + clipMerged[numRemaining-1][j][l] + 1 ) >> 1;
2839  }
2840  double errorMerged = m_alfParamTemp.nonLinearFlag[CH_L] ? tmpCov.optimizeFilterClip( alfShape, tmpClip ) : tmpCov.calculateError( tmpClip );
2841  double error = errorMerged - error1 - error2;
2842 
2843  if( error < errorMin )
2844  {
2845  bestMergeErr = errorMerged;
2846  memcpy(bestMergeClip, tmpClip, sizeof(bestMergeClip));
2847  errorMin = error;
2848  bestToMergeIdx1 = i;
2849  bestToMergeIdx2 = j;
2850  }
2851  }
2852  }
2853  }
2854  }
2855 
2856  covMerged[bestToMergeIdx1] += covMerged[bestToMergeIdx2];
2857  memcpy(clipMerged[numRemaining-2], clipMerged[numRemaining-1], sizeof(int[MAX_NUM_ALF_CLASSES][MAX_NUM_ALF_LUMA_COEFF]));
2858  memcpy(clipMerged[numRemaining-2][bestToMergeIdx1], bestMergeClip, sizeof(bestMergeClip));
2859  err[bestToMergeIdx1] = bestMergeErr;
2860  availableClass[bestToMergeIdx2] = false;
2861 
2862  for( int i = 0; i < numClasses; i++ )
2863  {
2864  if( indexList[i] == bestToMergeIdx2 )
2865  {
2866  indexList[i] = bestToMergeIdx1;
2867  }
2868  }
2869 
2870  numRemaining--;
2871  if( numRemaining <= numClasses )
2872  {
2873  std::memcpy( indexListTemp, indexList, sizeof( uint8_t ) * numClasses );
2874 
2875  bool exist = false;
2876  int ind = 0;
2877 
2878  for( int j = 0; j < numClasses; j++ )
2879  {
2880  exist = false;
2881  for( int i = 0; i < numClasses; i++ )
2882  {
2883  if( indexListTemp[i] == j )
2884  {
2885  exist = true;
2886  break;
2887  }
2888  }
2889 
2890  if( exist )
2891  {
2892  for( int i = 0; i < numClasses; i++ )
2893  {
2894  if( indexListTemp[i] == j )
2895  {
2896  filterIndices[numRemaining - 1][i] = ind;
2897  indexListTemp[i] = -1;
2898  }
2899  }
2900  ind++;
2901  }
2902  }
2903  }
2904  }
2905 }
2906 
2907 void EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::getFrameStats( ChannelType channel, int iShapeIdx )
2908 {
2909  int numClasses = isLuma( channel ) ? MAX_NUM_ALF_CLASSES : 1;
2910  int numAlternatives = isLuma( channel ) ? 1 : m_alfParamTemp.numAlternativesChroma;
2911  // When calling this function m_ctuEnableFlag shall be set to 0 for CTUs using alternative APS
2912  // Here we compute frame stats for building new alternative filters
2913  for( int altIdx = 0; altIdx < numAlternatives; ++altIdx )
2914  {
2915  for( int i = 0; i < numClasses; i++ )
2916  {
2917  m_alfCovarianceFrame[channel][iShapeIdx][isLuma( channel ) ? i : altIdx].reset();
2918  }
2919  if( isLuma( channel ) )
2920  {
2921  getFrameStat( m_alfCovarianceFrame[CH_L][iShapeIdx], m_alfCovariance[COMP_Y][iShapeIdx], m_ctuEnableFlag[COMP_Y], nullptr, numClasses, altIdx );
2922  }
2923  else
2924  {
2925  getFrameStat( m_alfCovarianceFrame[CH_C][iShapeIdx], m_alfCovariance[COMP_Cb][iShapeIdx], m_ctuEnableFlag[COMP_Cb], m_ctuAlternative[COMP_Cb], numClasses, altIdx );
2926  getFrameStat( m_alfCovarianceFrame[CH_C][iShapeIdx], m_alfCovariance[COMP_Cr][iShapeIdx], m_ctuEnableFlag[COMP_Cr], m_ctuAlternative[COMP_Cr], numClasses, altIdx );
2927  }
2928  }
2929 }
2930 
2931 void EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::getFrameStat( AlfCovariance* frameCov, AlfCovariance** ctbCov, uint8_t* ctbEnableFlags, uint8_t* ctbAltIdx, const int numClasses, int altIdx )
2932 {
2933  if( !ctbAltIdx )
2934  {
2935  for( int ctuIdx = 0; ctuIdx < m_numCTUsInPic; ctuIdx++ )
2936  {
2937  if( ctbEnableFlags[ctuIdx] )
2938  {
2939  for( int classIdx = 0; classIdx < numClasses; classIdx++ )
2940  {
2941  frameCov[classIdx] += ctbCov[ctuIdx][classIdx];
2942  }
2943  }
2944  }
2945  }
2946  else
2947  {
2948  for( int ctuIdx = 0; ctuIdx < m_numCTUsInPic; ctuIdx++ )
2949  {
2950  if( ctbEnableFlags[ctuIdx] && ( altIdx == ctbAltIdx[ctuIdx] ))
2951  {
2952  for( int classIdx = 0; classIdx < numClasses; classIdx++ )
2953  {
2954  frameCov[altIdx] += ctbCov[ctuIdx][classIdx];
2955  }
2956  }
2957  }
2958  }
2959 }
2960 
2961 
2962 void EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::getPreBlkStats(AlfCovariance* alfCovariance, const AlfFilterShape& shape, AlfClassifier* classifier, Pel* org, const int orgStride, Pel* rec, const int recStride, const CompArea& areaDst, const CompArea& area, const ChannelType channel, int vbCTUHeight, int vbPos)
2963 {
2964  constexpr int numBins = AlfNumClippingValues;
2965  int transposeIdx = 0;
2966  int classIdx = 0;
2967 
2968  const int halfFilterLength = shape.filterLength >> 1;
2969  int filterPattern[25]; // max entries in shape.pattern
2970 
2971  if( !m_encCfg->m_useNonLinearAlfLuma && !m_encCfg->m_useNonLinearAlfChroma && ( area.width & 3 ) == 0 )
2972  {
2973  for( int i = 0; i < shape.filterSize; i++ ) filterPattern[i] = shape.pattern[i] << 4;
2974  }
2975 
2976  if( !m_encCfg->m_useNonLinearAlfLuma && !m_encCfg->m_useNonLinearAlfChroma && ( area.width & 3 ) == 0 )
2977  {
2978  for( int i = 0; i < area.height; i += 4 )
2979  {
2980  const int maxFilterSamples = 4;
2981 
2982  int clipTopRow[4] = { -maxFilterSamples, -maxFilterSamples, -maxFilterSamples, -maxFilterSamples };
2983  int clipBotRow[4] = { maxFilterSamples, maxFilterSamples, maxFilterSamples, maxFilterSamples };
2984 
2985  for( int ii = 0; ii < 4; ii++ )
2986  {
2987  int vbDistance = ((areaDst.y + i + ii) % vbCTUHeight) - vbPos;
2988  if( vbDistance >= -3 && vbDistance < 0 )
2989  {
2990  clipBotRow[ii] = -vbDistance - 1;
2991  clipTopRow[ii] = -clipBotRow[ii]; // symmetric
2992  }
2993  else if( vbDistance >= 0 && vbDistance < 3 )
2994  {
2995  clipTopRow[ii] = -vbDistance;
2996  clipBotRow[ii] = -clipTopRow[ii]; // symmetric
2997  }
2998  }
2999 
3000  for( int j = 0; j < area.width; j += 4 )
3001  {
3002  const int idx = ( i / 4 ) * ( MAX_CU_SIZE / 4 ) + j / 4;
3003  if( classifier && classifier[idx].classIdx == m_ALF_UNUSED_CLASSIDX && classifier[idx].transposeIdx == m_ALF_UNUSED_TRANSPOSIDX )
3004  {
3005  continue;
3006  }
3007  if( classifier )
3008  {
3009  AlfClassifier& cl = classifier[idx];
3010  transposeIdx = cl.transposeIdx;
3011  classIdx = cl.classIdx;
3012  }
3013 
3014  Pel yLocal[4][4];
3015  for( int ii = 0; ii < 4; ii++ ) for( int jj = 0; jj < 4; jj++ )
3016  {
3017  yLocal[ii][jj] = org[j + jj + ii * orgStride] - rec[j + jj + ii * recStride];
3018  }
3019 
3020  // std::memset( ELocal, 0, sizeof( ELocal ) );
3021  Pel ELocal[MAX_NUM_ALF_LUMA_COEFF << 4];
3022 
3023  for( int ii = 0; ii < 4; ii++ )
3024  {
3025  if( clipBotRow[ii] == 4 )
3026  {
3027  calcLinCovariance4<false>( ELocal + ( ii << 2 ), rec + j + ii * recStride, recStride, filterPattern, halfFilterLength, transposeIdx, clipTopRow[ii], clipBotRow[ii] );
3028  }
3029  else
3030  {
3031  calcLinCovariance4<true>( ELocal + ( ii << 2 ), rec + j + ii * recStride, recStride, filterPattern, halfFilterLength, transposeIdx, clipTopRow[ii], clipBotRow[ii] );
3032  }
3033  }
3034 
3035  if( m_alfWSSD )
3036  {
3037  double weight[4][4];
3038  for( int ii = 0; ii < 4; ii++ ) for( int jj = 0; jj < 4; jj++ )
3039  {
3040  weight[ii][jj] = m_lumaLevelToWeightPLUT[org[j + jj + ii * orgStride]];
3041  }
3042 
3043  for( int k = 0; k < shape.numCoeff; k++ )
3044  {
3045  const Pel* Elocalk = &ELocal[k << 4];
3046  double* cov = &alfCovariance[classIdx].E[0][0][k][k];
3047 
3048  for( int l = k; l < shape.numCoeff; l++ )
3049  {
3050  const Pel* Elocall = &ELocal[l << 4];
3051 
3052  double sum = 0.0;
3053  for( int ii = 0; ii < 4; ii++ ) for( int jj = 0; jj < 4; jj++ )
3054  {
3055  sum += weight[ii][jj] * Elocall[(ii << 2) + jj] * Elocalk[(ii << 2) + jj];
3056  }
3057 
3058  *cov++ += sum;
3059  }
3060 
3061  double sum = 0.0;
3062  for( int ii = 0; ii < 4; ii++ ) for( int jj = 0; jj < 4; jj++ )
3063  {
3064  sum += weight[ii][jj] * Elocalk[(ii << 2) + jj] * yLocal[ii][jj];
3065  }
3066 
3067  alfCovariance[classIdx].y[0][k] += sum;
3068  }
3069 
3070  double sum = 0.0;
3071  for( int ii = 0; ii < 4; ii++ ) for( int jj = 0; jj < 4; jj++ )
3072  {
3073  sum += weight[ii][jj] * yLocal[ii][jj] * yLocal[ii][jj];
3074  }
3075 
3076  alfCovariance[classIdx].pixAcc += sum;
3077  }
3078  else
3079  {
3080 #if defined( TARGET_SIMD_X86 ) && ENABLE_SIMD_OPT_ALF
3081  if( read_x86_extension_flags() > SCALAR )
3082  {
3083  const __m128i mylocal0 = _mm_loadu_si128( ( const __m128i* ) &yLocal[0][0] );
3084  const __m128i mylocal8 = _mm_loadu_si128( ( const __m128i* ) &yLocal[2][0] );
3085 
3086  for( int k = 0; k < shape.numCoeff; k++ )
3087  {
3088  const Pel* Elocalk = &ELocal[k << 4];
3089  double* cov = &alfCovariance[classIdx].E[0][0][k][k];
3090 
3091  const __m128i melocalk0 = _mm_loadu_si128( ( const __m128i* ) &Elocalk[0] );
3092  const __m128i melocalk8 = _mm_loadu_si128( ( const __m128i* ) &Elocalk[8] );
3093 
3094  int l = k;
3095 
3096  for( ; l < ( shape.numCoeff - 1 ); l += 2 )
3097  {
3098  const Pel* Elocall = &ELocal[l << 4];
3099 
3100  __m128i melocall0 = _mm_loadu_si128( ( const __m128i* ) &Elocall[0] );
3101  __m128i melocall8 = _mm_loadu_si128( ( const __m128i* ) &Elocall[8] );
3102 
3103  __m128i mmacc0 = _mm_madd_epi16( melocalk0, melocall0 );
3104  __m128i mmacc8 = _mm_madd_epi16( melocalk8, melocall8 );
3105 
3106  __m128i mmacca = _mm_add_epi32( mmacc0, mmacc8 );
3107 
3108  Elocall = &ELocal[(l + 1) << 4];
3109 
3110  melocall0 = _mm_loadu_si128( ( const __m128i* ) &Elocall[0] );
3111  melocall8 = _mm_loadu_si128( ( const __m128i* ) &Elocall[8] );
3112 
3113  mmacc0 = _mm_madd_epi16( melocalk0, melocall0 );
3114  mmacc8 = _mm_madd_epi16( melocalk8, melocall8 );
3115 
3116  __m128i mmaccb = _mm_add_epi32( mmacc0, mmacc8 );
3117 
3118  __m128i mmacc = _mm_hadd_epi32( mmacca, mmaccb );
3119  mmacc = _mm_hadd_epi32( mmacc, mmacc );
3120 
3121  __m128d madd = _mm_cvtepi32_pd( mmacc );
3122  __m128d mcov = _mm_loadu_pd( cov );
3123  mcov = _mm_add_pd( mcov, madd );
3124  _mm_storeu_pd( cov, mcov );
3125 
3126  cov += 2;
3127  }
3128 
3129  if( l != shape.numCoeff )
3130  {
3131  const Pel* Elocall = &ELocal[l << 4];
3132 
3133  const __m128i melocall0 = _mm_loadu_si128( ( const __m128i* ) &Elocall[0] );
3134  const __m128i melocall8 = _mm_loadu_si128( ( const __m128i* ) &Elocall[8] );
3135 
3136  const __m128i mmacc0 = _mm_madd_epi16( melocalk0, melocall0 );
3137  const __m128i mmacc8 = _mm_madd_epi16( melocalk8, melocall8 );
3138 
3139  __m128i mmacc = _mm_add_epi32( mmacc0, mmacc8 );
3140  mmacc = _mm_hadd_epi32( mmacc, mmacc );
3141  mmacc = _mm_hadd_epi32( mmacc, mmacc );
3142 
3143  *cov += _mm_extract_epi32( mmacc, 0 );
3144  }
3145 
3146  const __m128i mmacc0 = _mm_madd_epi16( melocalk0, mylocal0 );
3147  const __m128i mmacc8 = _mm_madd_epi16( melocalk8, mylocal8 );
3148 
3149  __m128i mmacc = _mm_add_epi32( mmacc0, mmacc8 );
3150  mmacc = _mm_hadd_epi32( mmacc, mmacc );
3151  mmacc = _mm_hadd_epi32( mmacc, mmacc );
3152 
3153  alfCovariance[classIdx].y[0][k] += _mm_extract_epi32( mmacc, 0 );
3154  }
3155 
3156  const __m128i mmacc0 = _mm_madd_epi16( mylocal0, mylocal0 );
3157  const __m128i mmacc8 = _mm_madd_epi16( mylocal8, mylocal8 );
3158 
3159  __m128i mmacc = _mm_add_epi32( mmacc0, mmacc8 );
3160  mmacc = _mm_hadd_epi32( mmacc, mmacc );
3161  mmacc = _mm_hadd_epi32( mmacc, mmacc );
3162 
3163  alfCovariance[classIdx].pixAcc += _mm_extract_epi32( mmacc, 0 );
3164  }
3165  else
3166 #endif
3167  {
3168  for( int k = 0; k < shape.numCoeff; k++ )
3169  {
3170  const Pel* Elocalk = &ELocal[k << 4];
3171  double* cov = &alfCovariance[classIdx].E[0][0][k][k];
3172 
3173  for( int l = k; l < shape.numCoeff; l++ )
3174  {
3175  const Pel* Elocall = &ELocal[l << 4];
3176 
3177  int64_t sum = 0;
3178  for( int ii = 0; ii < 4; ii++ ) for( int jj = 0; jj < 4; jj++ )
3179  {
3180  sum += int( Elocall[(ii << 2) + jj] ) * Elocalk[(ii << 2) + jj];
3181  }
3182 
3183  *cov++ += sum;
3184  }
3185 
3186  int64_t sum = 0;
3187  for( int ii = 0; ii < 4; ii++ ) for( int jj = 0; jj < 4; jj++ )
3188  {
3189  sum += int( Elocalk[(ii << 2) + jj] ) * yLocal[ii][jj];
3190  }
3191 
3192  alfCovariance[classIdx].y[0][k] += sum;
3193  }
3194 
3195  int64_t sum = 0;
3196  for( int ii = 0; ii < 4; ii++ ) for( int jj = 0; jj < 4; jj++ )
3197  {
3198  sum += int( yLocal[ii][jj] ) * yLocal[ii][jj];
3199  }
3200 
3201  alfCovariance[classIdx].pixAcc += sum;
3202  }
3203  }
3204 
3205  alfCovariance[classIdx].all0 = false;
3206  }
3207 
3208  org += ( orgStride << 2 );
3209  rec += ( recStride << 2 );
3210  }
3211  }
3212  else
3213  {
3214  for( int i = 0; i < area.height; i += 4 )
3215  {
3216  const int maxFilterSamples = 4;
3217 
3218  int clipTopRow = -maxFilterSamples;
3219  int clipBotRow = maxFilterSamples;
3220 
3221  int vbDistance = ((areaDst.y + i) % vbCTUHeight) - vbPos;
3222  if( vbDistance >= -3 && vbDistance < 0 )
3223  {
3224  clipBotRow = -vbDistance - 1;
3225  clipTopRow = -clipBotRow; // symmetric
3226  }
3227  else if( vbDistance >= 0 && vbDistance < 3 )
3228  {
3229  clipTopRow = -vbDistance;
3230  clipBotRow = -clipTopRow; // symmetric
3231  }
3232 
3233  for( int j = 0; j < area.width; j++ )
3234  {
3235  const int idx = ( i / 4 ) * ( MAX_CU_SIZE / 4 ) + j / 4;
3236  if( classifier && classifier[idx].classIdx == m_ALF_UNUSED_CLASSIDX && classifier[idx].transposeIdx == m_ALF_UNUSED_TRANSPOSIDX )
3237  {
3238  continue;
3239  }
3240  if( classifier )
3241  {
3242  AlfClassifier& cl = classifier[idx];
3243  transposeIdx = cl.transposeIdx;
3244  classIdx = cl.classIdx;
3245  }
3246 
3247  int yLocal = org[j] - rec[j];
3248 
3249  int ELocal[MAX_NUM_ALF_LUMA_COEFF][MaxAlfNumClippingValues];
3250  // std::memset( ELocal, 0, sizeof( ELocal ) );
3251  calcCovariance( ELocal, rec + j, recStride, shape, transposeIdx, channel, vbDistance );
3252 
3253  if( m_alfWSSD )
3254  {
3255  double weight = m_lumaLevelToWeightPLUT[org[j]];
3256 
3257  for( int k = 0; k < shape.numCoeff; k++ )
3258  {
3259  for( int l = k; l < shape.numCoeff; l++ )
3260  {
3261  int Elocalkb0 = ELocal[k][0];
3262  int Elocalkb1 = ELocal[k][1];
3263  int Elocalkb2 = ELocal[k][2];
3264  int Elocalkb3 = ELocal[k][3];
3265 
3266  int Elocallb0 = ELocal[l][0];
3267  int Elocallb1 = ELocal[l][1];
3268  int Elocallb2 = ELocal[l][2];
3269  int Elocallb3 = ELocal[l][3];
3270 
3271  alfCovariance[classIdx].E[0][0][k][l] += weight * (Elocalkb0 * ( double ) Elocallb0);
3272  alfCovariance[classIdx].E[0][1][k][l] += weight * (Elocalkb0 * ( double ) Elocallb1);
3273  alfCovariance[classIdx].E[0][2][k][l] += weight * (Elocalkb0 * ( double ) Elocallb2);
3274  alfCovariance[classIdx].E[0][3][k][l] += weight * (Elocalkb0 * ( double ) Elocallb3);
3275 
3276  alfCovariance[classIdx].E[1][0][k][l] += weight * (Elocalkb1 * ( double ) Elocallb0);
3277  alfCovariance[classIdx].E[1][1][k][l] += weight * (Elocalkb1 * ( double ) Elocallb1);
3278  alfCovariance[classIdx].E[1][2][k][l] += weight * (Elocalkb1 * ( double ) Elocallb2);
3279  alfCovariance[classIdx].E[1][3][k][l] += weight * (Elocalkb1 * ( double ) Elocallb3);
3280 
3281  alfCovariance[classIdx].E[2][0][k][l] += weight * (Elocalkb2 * ( double ) Elocallb0);
3282  alfCovariance[classIdx].E[2][1][k][l] += weight * (Elocalkb2 * ( double ) Elocallb1);
3283  alfCovariance[classIdx].E[2][2][k][l] += weight * (Elocalkb2 * ( double ) Elocallb2);
3284  alfCovariance[classIdx].E[2][3][k][l] += weight * (Elocalkb2 * ( double ) Elocallb3);
3285 
3286  alfCovariance[classIdx].E[3][0][k][l] += weight * (Elocalkb3 * ( double ) Elocallb0);
3287  alfCovariance[classIdx].E[3][1][k][l] += weight * (Elocalkb3 * ( double ) Elocallb1);
3288  alfCovariance[classIdx].E[3][2][k][l] += weight * (Elocalkb3 * ( double ) Elocallb2);
3289  alfCovariance[classIdx].E[3][3][k][l] += weight * (Elocalkb3 * ( double ) Elocallb3);
3290  }
3291 
3292  for( int b = 0; b < numBins; b++ )
3293  {
3294  alfCovariance[classIdx].y[b][k] += weight * (ELocal[k][b] * ( double ) yLocal);
3295  }
3296  }
3297 
3298  alfCovariance[classIdx].pixAcc += weight * (yLocal * ( double ) yLocal);
3299  }
3300  else
3301  {
3302  for( int k = 0; k < shape.numCoeff; k++ )
3303  {
3304  for( int l = k; l < shape.numCoeff; l++ )
3305  {
3306  int Elocalkb0 = ELocal[k][0];
3307  int Elocalkb1 = ELocal[k][1];
3308  int Elocalkb2 = ELocal[k][2];
3309  int Elocalkb3 = ELocal[k][3];
3310 
3311  int Elocallb0 = ELocal[l][0];
3312  int Elocallb1 = ELocal[l][1];
3313  int Elocallb2 = ELocal[l][2];
3314  int Elocallb3 = ELocal[l][3];
3315 
3316  alfCovariance[classIdx].E[0][0][k][l] += Elocalkb0 * Elocallb0;
3317  alfCovariance[classIdx].E[0][1][k][l] += Elocalkb0 * Elocallb1;
3318  alfCovariance[classIdx].E[0][2][k][l] += Elocalkb0 * Elocallb2;
3319  alfCovariance[classIdx].E[0][3][k][l] += Elocalkb0 * Elocallb3;
3320 
3321  alfCovariance[classIdx].E[1][0][k][l] += Elocalkb1 * Elocallb0;
3322  alfCovariance[classIdx].E[1][1][k][l] += Elocalkb1 * Elocallb1;
3323  alfCovariance[classIdx].E[1][2][k][l] += Elocalkb1 * Elocallb2;
3324  alfCovariance[classIdx].E[1][3][k][l] += Elocalkb1 * Elocallb3;
3325 
3326  alfCovariance[classIdx].E[2][0][k][l] += Elocalkb2 * Elocallb0;
3327  alfCovariance[classIdx].E[2][1][k][l] += Elocalkb2 * Elocallb1;
3328  alfCovariance[classIdx].E[2][2][k][l] += Elocalkb2 * Elocallb2;
3329  alfCovariance[classIdx].E[2][3][k][l] += Elocalkb2 * Elocallb3;
3330 
3331  alfCovariance[classIdx].E[3][0][k][l] += Elocalkb3 * Elocallb0;
3332  alfCovariance[classIdx].E[3][1][k][l] += Elocalkb3 * Elocallb1;
3333  alfCovariance[classIdx].E[3][2][k][l] += Elocalkb3 * Elocallb2;
3334  alfCovariance[classIdx].E[3][3][k][l] += Elocalkb3 * Elocallb3;
3335  }
3336  for( int b = 0; b < numBins; b++ )
3337  {
3338  alfCovariance[classIdx].y[b][k] += ELocal[k][b] * yLocal;
3339  }
3340  }
3341 
3342  alfCovariance[classIdx].pixAcc += yLocal * yLocal;
3343  }
3344 
3345  alfCovariance[classIdx].all0 = false;
3346  }
3347 
3348  org += orgStride;
3349  rec += recStride;
3350  }
3351  }
3352 
3353  int numClasses = classifier ? MAX_NUM_ALF_CLASSES : 1;
3354 
3355  if( !m_encCfg->m_useNonLinearAlfLuma && !m_encCfg->m_useNonLinearAlfChroma )
3356  {
3357  for( classIdx = 0; classIdx < numClasses; classIdx++ )
3358  {
3359  for( int k = 1; k < shape.numCoeff; k++ )
3360  {
3361  for( int l = 0; l < k; l++ )
3362  {
3363 #if FIX_FOR_TEMPORARY_COMPILER_ISSUES_ENABLED && defined( __GNUC__ )
3364 #pragma GCC diagnostic push
3365 #pragma GCC diagnostic ignored "-Warray-bounds"
3366 #endif
3367  alfCovariance[classIdx].E[0][0][k][l] = alfCovariance[classIdx].E[0][0][l][k];
3368 #if FIX_FOR_TEMPORARY_COMPILER_ISSUES_ENABLED && defined( __GNUC__ )
3369 #pragma GCC diagnostic pop
3370 #endif
3371  }
3372  }
3373  }
3374  }
3375  else
3376  {
3377  for( classIdx = 0; classIdx < numClasses; classIdx++ )
3378  {
3379  for( int k = 1; k < shape.numCoeff; k++ )
3380  {
3381  for( int l = 0; l < k; l++ )
3382  {
3383  for( int b0 = 0; b0 < numBins; b0++ )
3384  {
3385  for( int b1 = 0; b1 < numBins; b1++ )
3386  {
3387  alfCovariance[classIdx].E[b0][b1][k][l] = alfCovariance[classIdx].E[b1][b0][l][k];
3388  }
3389  }
3390  }
3391  }
3392  }
3393  }
3394 }
3395 
3396 template < bool clipToBdry >
3397 inline int clipIdx( int i, int clip )
3398 {
3399  if( clipToBdry )
3400  return std::max( i, clip );
3401  else
3402  return i;
3403 }
3404 
3405 template <bool clipToBdry>
3406 void EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::calcLinCovariance( int* ELocal, const Pel *rec, const int stride, const int* filterPattern, const int halfFilterLength, const int transposeIdx, int clipTopRow, int clipBotRow )
3407 {
3408  int k = 0;
3409 
3410  const short curr = rec[0];
3411 
3412  if( transposeIdx == 0 )
3413  {
3414  for( int i = -halfFilterLength; i < 0; i++ )
3415  {
3416  const Pel* rec0 = rec + clipIdx<clipToBdry>( i, clipTopRow ) * stride;
3417  const Pel* rec1 = rec - clipIdx<clipToBdry>( i, -clipBotRow ) * stride;
3418  for( int j = -halfFilterLength - i; j <= halfFilterLength + i; j++, k++ )
3419  {
3420  const int val0 = rec0[j] - curr;
3421  const int val1 = rec1[-j] - curr;
3422 
3423  ELocal[filterPattern[k]] = val0 + val1;
3424  }
3425  }
3426  for( int j = -halfFilterLength; j < 0; j++, k++ )
3427  {
3428  const int val0 = rec[j] - curr;
3429  const int val1 = rec[-j] - curr;
3430 
3431  ELocal[filterPattern[k]] = val0 + val1;
3432  }
3433  }
3434  else if( transposeIdx == 1 )
3435  {
3436  for( int j = -halfFilterLength; j < 0; j++ )
3437  {
3438  const Pel* rec0 = rec + j;
3439  const Pel* rec1 = rec - j;
3440  for( int i = -halfFilterLength - j; i <= halfFilterLength + j; i++, k++ )
3441  {
3442  const int val0 = rec0[ clipIdx<clipToBdry>( i, clipTopRow ) * stride] - curr;
3443  const int val1 = rec1[-clipIdx<clipToBdry>( i, -clipBotRow ) * stride] - curr;
3444 
3445  ELocal[filterPattern[k]] = val0 + val1;
3446  }
3447  }
3448  for( int i = -halfFilterLength; i < 0; i++, k++ )
3449  {
3450  const int val0 = rec[ clipIdx<clipToBdry>( i, clipTopRow ) * stride] - curr;
3451  const int val1 = rec[-clipIdx<clipToBdry>( i, -clipBotRow ) * stride] - curr;
3452 
3453  ELocal[filterPattern[k]] = val0 + val1;
3454  }
3455  }
3456  else if( transposeIdx == 2 )
3457  {
3458  for( int i = -halfFilterLength; i < 0; i++ )
3459  {
3460  const Pel* rec0 = rec + clipIdx<clipToBdry>( i, clipTopRow ) * stride;
3461  const Pel* rec1 = rec - clipIdx<clipToBdry>( i, -clipBotRow ) * stride;
3462 
3463  for( int j = halfFilterLength + i; j >= -halfFilterLength - i; j--, k++ )
3464  {
3465  const int val0 = rec0[j] - curr;
3466  const int val1 = rec1[-j] - curr;
3467 
3468  ELocal[filterPattern[k]] = val0 + val1;
3469  }
3470  }
3471  for( int j = -halfFilterLength; j < 0; j++, k++ )
3472  {
3473  const int val0 = rec[j] - curr;
3474  const int val1 = rec[-j] - curr;
3475 
3476  ELocal[filterPattern[k]] = val0 + val1;
3477  }
3478  }
3479  else
3480  {
3481  for( int j = -halfFilterLength; j < 0; j++ )
3482  {
3483  const Pel* rec0 = rec + j;
3484  const Pel* rec1 = rec - j;
3485  for( int i = halfFilterLength + j; i >= -halfFilterLength - j; i--, k++ )
3486  {
3487  const int val0 = rec0[ clipIdx<clipToBdry>( i, clipTopRow ) * stride] - curr;
3488  const int val1 = rec1[-clipIdx<clipToBdry>( i, -clipBotRow ) * stride] - curr;
3489 
3490  ELocal[filterPattern[k]] = val0 + val1;
3491  }
3492  }
3493  for( int i = -halfFilterLength; i < 0; i++, k++ )
3494  {
3495  const int val0 = rec[ clipIdx<clipToBdry>( i, clipTopRow ) * stride] - curr;
3496  const int val1 = rec[-clipIdx<clipToBdry>( i, -clipBotRow ) * stride] - curr;
3497 
3498  ELocal[filterPattern[k]] = val0 + val1;
3499  }
3500  }
3501 
3502  ELocal[filterPattern[k]] = curr;
3503 }
3504 
3505 template void EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::calcLinCovariance<true >( int* ELocal, const Pel* rec, const int stride, const int* filterPattern, const int halfFilterLength, const int transposeIdx, int clipTopRow, int clipBotRow );
3506 template void EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::calcLinCovariance<false>( int* ELocal, const Pel* rec, const int stride, const int* filterPattern, const int halfFilterLength, const int transposeIdx, int clipTopRow, int clipBotRow );
3507 
3508 template<bool clipToBdry>
3509 void EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::calcLinCovariance4( Pel* ELocal, const Pel *rec, const int stride, const int* filterPattern, const int halfFilterLength, const int transposeIdx, int clipTopRow, int clipBotRow )
3510 {
3511  int k = 0;
3512 
3513  const Pel* rec0 = &rec[0];
3514  const Pel* rec1 = &rec[1];
3515  const Pel* rec2 = &rec[2];
3516  const Pel* rec3 = &rec[3];
3517 
3518  const Pel curr0 = *rec0 << 1;
3519  const Pel curr1 = *rec1 << 1;
3520  const Pel curr2 = *rec2 << 1;
3521  const Pel curr3 = *rec3 << 1;
3522 
3523  if( transposeIdx == 0 )
3524  {
3525  for( int i = -halfFilterLength; i < 0; i++ )
3526  {
3527  const int off0 = clipIdx<clipToBdry>( i, clipTopRow ) * stride;
3528  const int off1 = -clipIdx<clipToBdry>( i, -clipBotRow ) * stride;
3529 
3530  const Pel* rec00 = rec0 + off0;
3531  const Pel* rec01 = rec0 + off1;
3532 
3533  const Pel* rec10 = rec1 + off0;
3534  const Pel* rec11 = rec1 + off1;
3535 
3536  const Pel* rec20 = rec2 + off0;
3537  const Pel* rec21 = rec2 + off1;
3538 
3539  const Pel* rec30 = rec3 + off0;
3540  const Pel* rec31 = rec3 + off1;
3541 
3542  for( int j = -halfFilterLength - i; j <= halfFilterLength + i; j++, k++ )
3543  {
3544  const Pel val00 = rec00[ j];
3545  const Pel val01 = rec01[-j];
3546 
3547  const Pel val10 = rec10[ j];
3548  const Pel val11 = rec11[-j];
3549 
3550  const Pel val20 = rec20[ j];
3551  const Pel val21 = rec21[-j];
3552 
3553  const Pel val30 = rec30[ j];
3554  const Pel val31 = rec31[-j];
3555 
3556  ELocal[filterPattern[k] + 0] = val00 + val01 - curr0;
3557  ELocal[filterPattern[k] + 1] = val10 + val11 - curr1;
3558  ELocal[filterPattern[k] + 2] = val20 + val21 - curr2;
3559  ELocal[filterPattern[k] + 3] = val30 + val31 - curr3;
3560  }
3561  }
3562 
3563  for( int j = -halfFilterLength; j < 0; j++, k++ )
3564  {
3565  const Pel val00 = rec0[ j];
3566  const Pel val01 = rec0[-j];
3567 
3568  const Pel val10 = rec1[ j];
3569  const Pel val11 = rec1[-j];
3570 
3571  const Pel val20 = rec2[ j];
3572  const Pel val21 = rec2[-j];
3573 
3574  const Pel val30 = rec3[ j];
3575  const Pel val31 = rec3[-j];
3576 
3577  ELocal[filterPattern[k] + 0] = val00 + val01 - curr0;
3578  ELocal[filterPattern[k] + 1] = val10 + val11 - curr1;
3579  ELocal[filterPattern[k] + 2] = val20 + val21 - curr2;
3580  ELocal[filterPattern[k] + 3] = val30 + val31 - curr3;
3581  }
3582  }
3583  else if( transposeIdx == 1 )
3584  {
3585  for( int j = -halfFilterLength; j < 0; j++ )
3586  {
3587  const Pel* rec00 = rec0 + j;
3588  const Pel* rec01 = rec0 - j;
3589 
3590  for( int i = -halfFilterLength - j; i <= halfFilterLength + j; i++, k++ )
3591  {
3592  const int off0 = clipIdx<clipToBdry>( i, clipTopRow ) * stride;
3593  const int off1 = -clipIdx<clipToBdry>( i, -clipBotRow ) * stride;
3594 
3595  const Pel *vptr0 = &rec00[off0];
3596  const Pel *vptr1 = &rec01[off1];
3597  const Pel* vptr2 = rec0;
3598 
3599  ELocal[filterPattern[k] + 0] = *vptr0++ + *vptr1++ - ( *vptr2++ << 1 );
3600  ELocal[filterPattern[k] + 1] = *vptr0++ + *vptr1++ - ( *vptr2++ << 1 );
3601  ELocal[filterPattern[k] + 2] = *vptr0++ + *vptr1++ - ( *vptr2++ << 1 );
3602  ELocal[filterPattern[k] + 3] = *vptr0++ + *vptr1++ - ( *vptr2++ << 1 );
3603  }
3604  }
3605  for( int i = -halfFilterLength; i < 0; i++, k++ )
3606  {
3607  const int off0 = clipIdx<clipToBdry>( i, clipTopRow ) * stride;
3608  const int off1 = -clipIdx<clipToBdry>( i, -clipBotRow ) * stride;
3609 
3610  const Pel *vptr0 = &rec0[off0];
3611  const Pel *vptr1 = &rec0[off1];
3612  const Pel* vptr2 = rec0;
3613 
3614  ELocal[filterPattern[k] + 0] = *vptr0++ + *vptr1++ - ( *vptr2++ << 1 );
3615  ELocal[filterPattern[k] + 1] = *vptr0++ + *vptr1++ - ( *vptr2++ << 1 );
3616  ELocal[filterPattern[k] + 2] = *vptr0++ + *vptr1++ - ( *vptr2++ << 1 );
3617  ELocal[filterPattern[k] + 3] = *vptr0++ + *vptr1++ - ( *vptr2++ << 1 );
3618  }
3619  }
3620  else if( transposeIdx == 2 )
3621  {
3622  for( int i = -halfFilterLength; i < 0; i++ )
3623  {
3624  const int off0 = clipIdx<clipToBdry>( i, clipTopRow ) * stride;
3625  const int off1 = -clipIdx<clipToBdry>( i, -clipBotRow ) * stride;
3626 
3627  const Pel* rec00 = rec0 + off0;
3628  const Pel* rec01 = rec0 + off1;
3629 
3630  const Pel* rec10 = rec1 + off0;
3631  const Pel* rec11 = rec1 + off1;
3632 
3633  const Pel* rec20 = rec2 + off0;
3634  const Pel* rec21 = rec2 + off1;
3635 
3636  const Pel* rec30 = rec3 + off0;
3637  const Pel* rec31 = rec3 + off1;
3638 
3639  for( int j = halfFilterLength + i; j >= -halfFilterLength - i; j--, k++ )
3640  {
3641  const Pel val00 = rec00[ j];
3642  const Pel val01 = rec01[-j];
3643 
3644  const Pel val10 = rec10[ j];
3645  const Pel val11 = rec11[-j];
3646 
3647  const Pel val20 = rec20[ j];
3648  const Pel val21 = rec21[-j];
3649 
3650  const Pel val30 = rec30[ j];
3651  const Pel val31 = rec31[-j];
3652 
3653  ELocal[filterPattern[k] + 0] = val00 + val01 - curr0;
3654  ELocal[filterPattern[k] + 1] = val10 + val11 - curr1;
3655  ELocal[filterPattern[k] + 2] = val20 + val21 - curr2;
3656  ELocal[filterPattern[k] + 3] = val30 + val31 - curr3;
3657  }
3658  }
3659  for( int j = -halfFilterLength; j < 0; j++, k++ )
3660  {
3661  const Pel val00 = rec0[ j];
3662  const Pel val01 = rec0[-j];
3663 
3664  const Pel val10 = rec1[ j];
3665  const Pel val11 = rec1[-j];
3666 
3667  const Pel val20 = rec2[ j];
3668  const Pel val21 = rec2[-j];
3669 
3670  const Pel val30 = rec3[ j];
3671  const Pel val31 = rec3[-j];
3672 
3673  ELocal[filterPattern[k] + 0] = val00 + val01 - curr0;
3674  ELocal[filterPattern[k] + 1] = val10 + val11 - curr1;
3675  ELocal[filterPattern[k] + 2] = val20 + val21 - curr2;
3676  ELocal[filterPattern[k] + 3] = val30 + val31 - curr3;
3677  }
3678  }
3679  else
3680  {
3681  for( int j = -halfFilterLength; j < 0; j++ )
3682  {
3683  const Pel* rec00 = rec0 + j;
3684  const Pel* rec01 = rec0 - j;
3685 
3686  for( int i = halfFilterLength + j; i >= -halfFilterLength - j; i--, k++ )
3687  {
3688  const int off0 = clipIdx<clipToBdry>( i, clipTopRow ) * stride;
3689  const int off1 = -clipIdx<clipToBdry>( i, -clipBotRow ) * stride;
3690 
3691  const Pel *vptr0 = &rec00[off0];
3692  const Pel *vptr1 = &rec01[off1];
3693  const Pel* vptr2 = rec0;
3694 
3695  ELocal[filterPattern[k] + 0] = *vptr0++ + *vptr1++ - ( *vptr2++ << 1 );
3696  ELocal[filterPattern[k] + 1] = *vptr0++ + *vptr1++ - ( *vptr2++ << 1 );
3697  ELocal[filterPattern[k] + 2] = *vptr0++ + *vptr1++ - ( *vptr2++ << 1 );
3698  ELocal[filterPattern[k] + 3] = *vptr0++ + *vptr1++ - ( *vptr2++ << 1 );
3699  }
3700  }
3701  for( int i = -halfFilterLength; i < 0; i++, k++ )
3702  {
3703  const int off0 = clipIdx<clipToBdry>( i, clipTopRow ) * stride;
3704  const int off1 = -clipIdx<clipToBdry>( i, -clipBotRow ) * stride;
3705 
3706  const Pel *vptr0 = &rec0[off0];
3707  const Pel *vptr1 = &rec0[off1];
3708  const Pel* vptr2 = rec0;
3709 
3710  ELocal[filterPattern[k] + 0] = *vptr0++ + *vptr1++ - ( *vptr2++ << 1 );
3711  ELocal[filterPattern[k] + 1] = *vptr0++ + *vptr1++ - ( *vptr2++ << 1 );
3712  ELocal[filterPattern[k] + 2] = *vptr0++ + *vptr1++ - ( *vptr2++ << 1 );
3713  ELocal[filterPattern[k] + 3] = *vptr0++ + *vptr1++ - ( *vptr2++ << 1 );
3714  }
3715  }
3716 
3717  ELocal[filterPattern[k] + 0] = *rec0;
3718  ELocal[filterPattern[k] + 1] = *rec1;
3719  ELocal[filterPattern[k] + 2] = *rec2;
3720  ELocal[filterPattern[k] + 3] = *rec3;
3721 }
3722 
3723 template void EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::calcLinCovariance4<true> ( Pel* ELocal, const Pel* rec, const int stride, const int* filterPattern, const int halfFilterLength, const int transposeIdx, int clipTopRow, int clipBotRow );
3724 template void EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::calcLinCovariance4<false>( Pel* ELocal, const Pel* rec, const int stride, const int* filterPattern, const int halfFilterLength, const int transposeIdx, int clipTopRow, int clipBotRow );
3725 
3726 void EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::calcCovariance( int ELocal[MAX_NUM_ALF_LUMA_COEFF][MaxAlfNumClippingValues], const Pel *rec, const int stride, const AlfFilterShape& shape, const int transposeIdx, const ChannelType channel, int vbDistance )
3727 {
3728  int clipTopRow = -4;
3729  int clipBotRow = 4;
3730  if (vbDistance >= -3 && vbDistance < 0)
3731  {
3732  clipBotRow = -vbDistance - 1;
3733  clipTopRow = -clipBotRow; // symmetric
3734  }
3735  else if (vbDistance >= 0 && vbDistance < 3)
3736  {
3737  clipTopRow = -vbDistance;
3738  clipBotRow = -clipTopRow; // symmetric
3739  }
3740 
3741  const int *filterPattern = shape.pattern.data();
3742  const int halfFilterLength = shape.filterLength >> 1;
3743  const Pel* clip = m_alfClippingValues[channel];
3744  constexpr int numBins = AlfNumClippingValues;
3745 
3746  int k = 0;
3747 
3748  const short curr = rec[0];
3749 
3750  if( transposeIdx == 0 )
3751  {
3752  for( int i = -halfFilterLength; i < 0; i++ )
3753  {
3754  const Pel* rec0 = rec + std::max(i, clipTopRow) * stride;
3755  const Pel* rec1 = rec - std::max(i, -clipBotRow) * stride;
3756  for( int j = -halfFilterLength - i; j <= halfFilterLength + i; j++, k++ )
3757  {
3758  const int val0 = rec0[ j] - curr;
3759  const int val1 = rec1[-j] - curr;
3760  for( int b = 0; b < numBins; b++ )
3761  {
3762  ELocal[filterPattern[k]][b] = clipALF( clip[b], val0, val1 );
3763  }
3764  }
3765  }
3766  for( int j = -halfFilterLength; j < 0; j++, k++ )
3767  {
3768  const int val0 = rec[ j] - curr;
3769  const int val1 = rec[-j] - curr;
3770  for( int b = 0; b < numBins; b++ )
3771  {
3772  ELocal[filterPattern[k]][b] = clipALF( clip[b], val0, val1 );
3773  }
3774  }
3775  }
3776  else if( transposeIdx == 1 )
3777  {
3778  for( int j = -halfFilterLength; j < 0; j++ )
3779  {
3780  const Pel* rec0 = rec + j;
3781  const Pel* rec1 = rec - j;
3782  for (int i = -halfFilterLength - j; i <= halfFilterLength + j; i++, k++)
3783  {
3784  const int val0 = rec0[std::max(i, clipTopRow) * stride] - curr;
3785  const int val1 = rec1[-std::max(i, -clipBotRow) * stride] - curr;
3786  for (int b = 0; b < numBins; b++)
3787  {
3788  ELocal[filterPattern[k]][b] = clipALF(clip[b], val0, val1);
3789  }
3790  }
3791  }
3792  for (int i = -halfFilterLength; i < 0; i++, k++)
3793  {
3794  const int val0 = rec[std::max(i, clipTopRow) * stride] - curr;
3795  const int val1 = rec[-std::max(i, -clipBotRow) * stride] - curr;
3796  for (int b = 0; b < numBins; b++)
3797  {
3798  ELocal[filterPattern[k]][b] = clipALF(clip[b], val0 , val1);
3799  }
3800  }
3801  }
3802  else if( transposeIdx == 2 )
3803  {
3804  for( int i = -halfFilterLength; i < 0; i++ )
3805  {
3806  const Pel* rec0 = rec + std::max(i, clipTopRow) * stride;
3807  const Pel* rec1 = rec - std::max(i, -clipBotRow) * stride;
3808 
3809  for( int j = halfFilterLength + i; j >= -halfFilterLength - i; j--, k++ )
3810  {
3811  const int val0 = rec0[j] - curr;
3812  const int val1 = rec1[-j] - curr;
3813  for( int b = 0; b < numBins; b++ )
3814  {
3815  ELocal[filterPattern[k]][b] = clipALF( clip[b], val0, val1 );
3816  }
3817  }
3818  }
3819  for( int j = -halfFilterLength; j < 0; j++, k++ )
3820  {
3821  const int val0 = rec[j] - curr;
3822  const int val1 = rec[-j] - curr;
3823  for( int b = 0; b < numBins; b++ )
3824  {
3825  ELocal[filterPattern[k]][b] = clipALF( clip[b], val0, val1 );
3826  }
3827  }
3828  }
3829  else
3830  {
3831  for( int j = -halfFilterLength; j < 0; j++ )
3832  {
3833  const Pel* rec0 = rec + j;
3834  const Pel* rec1 = rec - j;
3835  for (int i = halfFilterLength + j; i >= -halfFilterLength - j; i--, k++)
3836  {
3837  const int val0 = rec0[std::max(i, clipTopRow) * stride] - curr;
3838  const int val1 = rec1[-std::max(i, -clipBotRow) * stride] - curr;
3839  for (int b = 0; b < numBins; b++)
3840  {
3841  ELocal[filterPattern[k]][b] = clipALF(clip[b], val0 ,val1 );
3842  }
3843  }
3844  }
3845  for (int i = -halfFilterLength; i < 0; i++, k++)
3846  {
3847  const int val0 = rec[std::max(i, clipTopRow) * stride] - curr;
3848  const int val1 = rec[-std::max(i, -clipBotRow) * stride] - curr;
3849  for (int b = 0; b < numBins; b++)
3850  {
3851  ELocal[filterPattern[k]][b] = clipALF(clip[b], val0 ,val1 );
3852  }
3853  }
3854  }
3855  for( int b = 0; b < numBins; b++ )
3856  {
3857  ELocal[filterPattern[k]][b] = curr;
3858  }
3859 }
3860 
3861 void EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::setEnableFlag( AlfParam& alfSlicePara, ChannelType channel, bool val )
3862 {
3863  if( channel == CH_L )
3864  {
3865  alfSlicePara.alfEnabled[COMP_Y] = val;
3866  }
3867  else
3868  {
3869  alfSlicePara.alfEnabled[COMP_Cb] = alfSlicePara.alfEnabled[COMP_Cr] = val;
3870  }
3871 }
3872 
3873 
3874 void EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::setEnableFlag( AlfParam& alfSlicePara, ChannelType channel, uint8_t** ctuFlags )
3875 {
3876  const ComponentID compIDFirst = isLuma( channel ) ? COMP_Y : COMP_Cb;
3877  const ComponentID compIDLast = isLuma( channel ) ? COMP_Y : COMP_Cr;
3878  for( int compId = compIDFirst; compId <= compIDLast; compId++ )
3879  {
3880  alfSlicePara.alfEnabled[compId] = false;
3881  for( int i = 0; i < m_numCTUsInPic; i++ )
3882  {
3883  if( ctuFlags[compId][i] )
3884  {
3885  alfSlicePara.alfEnabled[compId] = true;
3886  break;
3887  }
3888  }
3889  }
3890 }
3891 
3892 void EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::copyCtuEnableFlag( uint8_t** ctuFlagsDst, uint8_t** ctuFlagsSrc, ChannelType channel )
3893 {
3894  if( isLuma( channel ) )
3895  {
3896  memcpy( ctuFlagsDst[COMP_Y], ctuFlagsSrc[COMP_Y], sizeof( uint8_t ) * m_numCTUsInPic );
3897  }
3898  else
3899  {
3900  memcpy( ctuFlagsDst[COMP_Cb], ctuFlagsSrc[COMP_Cb], sizeof( uint8_t ) * m_numCTUsInPic );
3901  memcpy( ctuFlagsDst[COMP_Cr], ctuFlagsSrc[COMP_Cr], sizeof( uint8_t ) * m_numCTUsInPic );
3902  }
3903 }
3904 
3905 void EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::setCtuEnableFlag( uint8_t** ctuFlags, ChannelType channel, uint8_t val )
3906 {
3907  if( isLuma( channel ) )
3908  {
3909  memset( ctuFlags[COMP_Y], val, sizeof( uint8_t ) * m_numCTUsInPic );
3910  }
3911  else
3912  {
3913  memset( ctuFlags[COMP_Cb], val, sizeof( uint8_t ) * m_numCTUsInPic );
3914  memset( ctuFlags[COMP_Cr], val, sizeof( uint8_t ) * m_numCTUsInPic );
3915  }
3916 }
3917 
3918 std::vector<int> EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::getAvaiApsIdsLuma(CodingStructure& cs, int& newApsId)
3919 {
3920  APS** apss = cs.slice->alfAps;
3921  for (int i = 0; i < ALF_CTB_MAX_NUM_APS; i++)
3922  {
3923  apss[i] = m_apsMap->getPS((i << NUM_APS_TYPE_LEN) + ALF_APS);
3924  }
3925 
3926  std::vector<int> result;
3927  if( m_encCfg->m_alfTempPred )
3928  {
3929  int apsIdChecked = 0, curApsId = m_apsIdStart;
3930  if (curApsId < ALF_CTB_MAX_NUM_APS)
3931  {
3932  while (apsIdChecked < ALF_CTB_MAX_NUM_APS && !cs.slice->isIntra() && result.size() < ALF_CTB_MAX_NUM_APS && !cs.slice->pendingRasInit && !cs.slice->isIDRorBLA())
3933  {
3934  APS* curAPS = cs.slice->alfAps[curApsId];
3935  if (curAPS && curAPS->layerId <= cs.slice->pic->layerId && curAPS->temporalId <= cs.slice->TLayer && curAPS->alfParam.newFilterFlag[CH_L])
3936  {
3937  result.push_back( curApsId );
3938  }
3939  apsIdChecked++;
3940  curApsId = (curApsId + 1) % ALF_CTB_MAX_NUM_APS;
3941  }
3942  }
3943  }
3944  cs.slice->tileGroupNumAps = ((int)result.size());
3945  cs.slice->setAlfApsIds(result);
3946  newApsId = m_apsIdStart - 1;
3947  if( !m_encCfg->m_alfTempPred )
3948  {
3949  newApsId = m_apsIdStart = 0;
3950  }
3951 
3952  if( newApsId < 0 )
3953  {
3954  newApsId = ALF_CTB_MAX_NUM_APS - 1;
3955  }
3956  CHECK(newApsId >= ALF_CTB_MAX_NUM_APS, "Wrong APS index assignment in getAvaiApsIdsLuma");
3957  return result;
3958 }
3959 void EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::initDistortion()
3960 {
3961  for (int comp = 0; comp < MAX_NUM_COMP; comp++)
3962  {
3963  for (int ctbIdx = 0; ctbIdx < m_numCTUsInPic; ctbIdx++)
3964  {
3965  m_ctbDistortionUnfilter[comp][ctbIdx] = getUnfilteredDistortion(m_alfCovariance[comp][0][ctbIdx], comp == 0 ? MAX_NUM_ALF_CLASSES : 1);
3966  }
3967  }
3968 }
3969 
3970 void EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::initDistortionCcalf()
3971 {
3972  for (int comp = 1; comp < MAX_NUM_COMP; comp++)
3973  {
3974  for (int ctbIdx = 0; ctbIdx < m_numCTUsInPic; ctbIdx++)
3975  {
3976  m_ctbDistortionUnfilter[comp][ctbIdx] = m_alfCovarianceCcAlf[comp - 1][0][0][ctbIdx].pixAcc;
3977  }
3978  }
3979 }
3980 
3981 void EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::alfEncoderCtb( CodingStructure& cs, AlfParam& alfParamNewFilters, const double lambdaChromaWeight )
3982 {
3983  PROFILER_SCOPE_AND_STAGE( 0, g_timeProfiler, P_ALF_ENC_CTB );
3984  TempCtx ctxStart ( m_CtxCache, AlfCtx(m_CABACEstimator->getCtx()));
3985  TempCtx ctxBest ( m_CtxCache );
3986  TempCtx ctxTempStart ( m_CtxCache );
3987  TempCtx ctxTempBest ( m_CtxCache );
3988  TempCtx ctxTempAltStart( m_CtxCache );
3989  TempCtx ctxTempAltBest ( m_CtxCache );
3990  AlfParam alfParamNewFiltersBest = alfParamNewFilters;
3991  APS** apss = cs.slice->alfAps;
3992  short* alfCtbFilterSetIndex = cs.picture->m_alfCtbFilterIndex.data();
3993  bool hasNewFilters[2] = { alfParamNewFilters.alfEnabled[COMP_Y] , alfParamNewFilters.alfEnabled[COMP_Cb] || alfParamNewFilters.alfEnabled[COMP_Cr] };
3994  const double invFactor = 1.0/((double)(1<<(m_NUM_BITS-1)));
3995  const bool doClip = m_encCfg->m_useNonLinearAlfLuma || m_encCfg->m_useNonLinearAlfChroma;
3996  initDistortion();
3997 
3998  //luma
3999  m_alfParamTemp = alfParamNewFilters;
4000  setCtuEnableFlag(m_ctuEnableFlag, CH_L, 1);
4001  getFrameStats(CH_L, 0);
4002  setCtuEnableFlag(m_ctuEnableFlag, CH_L, 0);
4003  double costOff = getUnfilteredDistortion(m_alfCovarianceFrame[CH_L][0], CH_L);
4004 
4005  int newApsId;
4006  std::vector<int> apsIds = getAvaiApsIdsLuma(cs, newApsId);
4007  std::vector<int> bestApsIds;
4008  double costMin = MAX_DOUBLE;
4009  reconstructCoeffAPSs(cs, true, false, true);
4010 
4011  DTRACE( g_trace_ctx, D_MISC, "POC=%d\n", cs.slice->poc );
4012 
4013  int numLoops = hasNewFilters[CH_L] ? 2 : 1;
4014  for (int useNewFilter = 0; useNewFilter < numLoops; useNewFilter++)
4015  {
4016  DTRACE( g_trace_ctx, D_MISC, "\t useNewFilter=%d\n", useNewFilter );
4017  int bitsNewFilter = 0;
4018  if (useNewFilter == 1)
4019  {
4020  if (!hasNewFilters[CH_L])
4021  {
4022  continue;
4023  }
4024  else
4025  {
4026  bitsNewFilter = m_bitsNewFilter[CH_L];
4027  reconstructCoeff(alfParamNewFilters, CH_L, true, true);
4028  }
4029  }
4030  int numIter = useNewFilter ? 2 : 1;
4031  for (int numTemporalAps = 0; numTemporalAps <= apsIds.size(); numTemporalAps++)
4032  {
4033  DTRACE( g_trace_ctx, D_MISC, "\t\t numTemporalAps=%d\n", numTemporalAps );
4034  if (numTemporalAps + useNewFilter >= ALF_CTB_MAX_NUM_APS)
4035  {
4036  continue;
4037  }
4038  cs.slice->tileGroupNumAps = (numTemporalAps + useNewFilter);
4039  int numFilterSet = NUM_FIXED_FILTER_SETS + numTemporalAps + useNewFilter;
4040  if (numTemporalAps == apsIds.size() && numTemporalAps > 0 && useNewFilter && newApsId == apsIds.back()) //last temporalAPS is occupied by new filter set and this temporal APS becomes unavailable
4041  {
4042  continue;
4043  }
4044  for (int iter = 0; iter < numIter; iter++)
4045  {
4046  DTRACE( g_trace_ctx, D_MISC, "\t\t\t iter=%d\n", iter );
4047  m_alfParamTemp = alfParamNewFilters;
4048  m_alfParamTemp.alfEnabled[CH_L] = true;
4049  double curCost = 3 * m_lambda[CH_L];
4050  if (iter > 0) //re-derive new filter-set
4051  {
4052  double dDistOrgNewFilter = 0;
4053  int blocksUsingNewFilter = 0;
4054  for (int ctbIdx = 0; ctbIdx < m_numCTUsInPic; ctbIdx++)
4055  {
4056  if (m_ctuEnableFlag[COMP_Y][ctbIdx] && alfCtbFilterSetIndex[ctbIdx] != NUM_FIXED_FILTER_SETS)
4057  {
4058  m_ctuEnableFlag[COMP_Y][ctbIdx] = 0;
4059  }
4060  else if (m_ctuEnableFlag[COMP_Y][ctbIdx] && alfCtbFilterSetIndex[ctbIdx] == NUM_FIXED_FILTER_SETS)
4061  {
4062  DTRACE( g_trace_ctx, D_MISC, "\t\t\t\t re-derive ctbIdx=%d\n", ctbIdx );
4063  blocksUsingNewFilter++;
4064  dDistOrgNewFilter += m_ctbDistortionUnfilter[COMP_Y][ctbIdx];
4065  for (int classIdx = 0; classIdx < MAX_NUM_ALF_CLASSES; classIdx++)
4066  {
4067  short* pCoeff = m_coeffFinal;
4068  short* pClipp = m_clippFinal;
4069  for (int i = 0; i < MAX_NUM_ALF_LUMA_COEFF; i++)
4070  {
4071  m_filterTmp[i] = pCoeff[classIdx * MAX_NUM_ALF_LUMA_COEFF + i];
4072  m_clipTmp[i] = pClipp[classIdx * MAX_NUM_ALF_LUMA_COEFF + i];
4073  }
4074  dDistOrgNewFilter += doClip ? m_alfCovariance[COMP_Y][0][ctbIdx][classIdx].calcErrorForCoeffs<true >(m_clipTmp, m_filterTmp, MAX_NUM_ALF_LUMA_COEFF, invFactor)
4075  : m_alfCovariance[COMP_Y][0][ctbIdx][classIdx].calcErrorForCoeffs<false>(m_clipTmp, m_filterTmp, MAX_NUM_ALF_LUMA_COEFF, invFactor);
4076  }
4077  }
4078  } //for(ctbIdx)
4079  if (blocksUsingNewFilter > 0 && blocksUsingNewFilter < m_numCTUsInPic)
4080  {
4081  int bitNL[2] = { 0, 0 };
4082  double errNL[2] = { 0.0, 0.0 };
4083  m_alfParamTemp.nonLinearFlag[CH_L] = 1;
4084  if (m_encCfg->m_useNonLinearAlfLuma)
4085  {
4086  errNL[1] = getFilterCoeffAndCost(cs, 0, CH_L, true, 0, bitNL[1], true);
4087  m_alfParamTempNL = m_alfParamTemp;
4088  }
4089  else
4090  {
4091  errNL[1] = MAX_DOUBLE;
4092  }
4093  m_alfParamTemp.nonLinearFlag[CH_L] = 0;
4094  errNL[0] = getFilterCoeffAndCost(cs, 0, CH_L, true, 0, bitNL[0], true);
4095 
4096  int bitsNewFilterTempLuma = bitNL[0];
4097  double err = errNL[0];
4098  if (errNL[1] < errNL[0])
4099  {
4100  err = errNL[1];
4101  bitsNewFilterTempLuma = bitNL[1];
4102  m_alfParamTemp = m_alfParamTempNL;
4103  }
4104 
4105  DTRACE( g_trace_ctx, D_MISC, " dDistOrgNewFilter=%.2f, rate=%.2f, cost=%.2f, rederived cost=%2.f ",
4106  dDistOrgNewFilter, m_lambda[CH_L] * m_bitsNewFilter[CH_L], dDistOrgNewFilter + m_lambda[CH_L] * m_bitsNewFilter[CH_L], err );
4107 
4108  if (dDistOrgNewFilter + m_lambda[CH_L] * m_bitsNewFilter[CH_L] < err) //re-derived filter is not good, skip
4109  {
4110  DTRACE( g_trace_ctx, D_MISC, "\n" );
4111  continue;
4112  }
4113 
4114  DTRACE( g_trace_ctx, D_MISC, ", use it\n" );
4115 
4116  reconstructCoeff(m_alfParamTemp, CH_L, true, true);
4117  bitsNewFilter = bitsNewFilterTempLuma;
4118  }
4119  else //no blocks using new filter, skip
4120  {
4121  continue;
4122  }
4123  }
4124 
4125  m_CABACEstimator->getCtx() = ctxStart;
4126  for (int ctbIdx = 0; ctbIdx < m_numCTUsInPic; ctbIdx++)
4127  {
4128  DTRACE( g_trace_ctx, D_MISC, "\t\t\t ctbIdx=%d\n", ctbIdx );
4129  const double ctuLambda = lambdaChromaWeight > 0.0 ? cs.picture->ctuQpaLambda[ctbIdx] : m_lambda[COMP_Y];
4130  const double distUnfilterCtb = m_ctbDistortionUnfilter[COMP_Y][ctbIdx];
4131  //ctb on
4132  m_ctuEnableFlag[COMP_Y][ctbIdx] = 1;
4133  double costOn = MAX_DOUBLE;
4134  ctxTempStart = AlfCtx(m_CABACEstimator->getCtx());
4135  int iBestFilterSetIdx = 0;
4136  for (int filterSetIdx = 0; filterSetIdx < numFilterSet; filterSetIdx++)
4137  {
4138  DTRACE( g_trace_ctx, D_MISC, "\t\t\t\t filterSetIdx=%d ", filterSetIdx );
4139  //rate
4140  m_CABACEstimator->getCtx() = AlfCtx(ctxTempStart);
4141  m_CABACEstimator->resetBits();
4142  m_CABACEstimator->codeAlfCtuEnabledFlag(cs, ctbIdx, COMP_Y, &m_alfParamTemp);
4143  alfCtbFilterSetIndex[ctbIdx] = filterSetIdx;
4144  m_CABACEstimator->codeAlfCtuFilterIndex(cs, ctbIdx, &m_alfParamTemp.alfEnabled[COMP_Y]);
4145  double rateOn = FRAC_BITS_SCALE * m_CABACEstimator->getEstFracBits();
4146  //distortion
4147  double dist = distUnfilterCtb;
4148 
4149  for (int classIdx = 0; classIdx < MAX_NUM_ALF_CLASSES; classIdx++)
4150  {
4151  if (filterSetIdx < NUM_FIXED_FILTER_SETS)
4152  {
4153  // fixed filter set
4154  int filterIdx = m_classToFilterMapping[filterSetIdx][classIdx];
4155 
4156  if( !m_alfCovariance[COMP_Y][0][ctbIdx][classIdx].all0 )
4157  dist += doClip ? m_alfCovariance[COMP_Y][0][ctbIdx][classIdx].calcErrorForCoeffs<true >(m_clipDefaultEnc, m_fixedFilterSetCoeff[filterIdx], MAX_NUM_ALF_LUMA_COEFF, invFactor)
4158  : m_alfCovariance[COMP_Y][0][ctbIdx][classIdx].calcErrorForCoeffs<false>(m_clipDefaultEnc, m_fixedFilterSetCoeff[filterIdx], MAX_NUM_ALF_LUMA_COEFF, invFactor);
4159  }
4160  else
4161  {
4162  short *pCoeff;
4163  short *pClipp;
4164  if (useNewFilter && filterSetIdx == NUM_FIXED_FILTER_SETS)
4165  {
4166  // New filter, no APS
4167  pCoeff = m_coeffFinal;
4168  pClipp = m_clippFinal;
4169  }
4170  else if (useNewFilter)
4171  {
4172  // New filter after APS
4173  pCoeff = m_coeffApsLuma[filterSetIdx - 1 - NUM_FIXED_FILTER_SETS];
4174  pClipp = m_clippApsLuma[filterSetIdx - 1 - NUM_FIXED_FILTER_SETS];
4175  }
4176  else
4177  {
4178  // filter from APS
4179  pCoeff = m_coeffApsLuma[filterSetIdx - NUM_FIXED_FILTER_SETS];
4180  pClipp = m_clippApsLuma[filterSetIdx - NUM_FIXED_FILTER_SETS];
4181  }
4182  for (int i = 0; i < MAX_NUM_ALF_LUMA_COEFF; i++)
4183  {
4184  m_filterTmp[i] = pCoeff[classIdx * MAX_NUM_ALF_LUMA_COEFF + i];
4185  m_clipTmp[i] = pClipp[classIdx * MAX_NUM_ALF_LUMA_COEFF + i];
4186  }
4187 
4188  if( !m_alfCovariance[COMP_Y][0][ctbIdx][classIdx].all0 )
4189  dist += doClip ? m_alfCovariance[COMP_Y][0][ctbIdx][classIdx].calcErrorForCoeffs<true >(m_clipTmp, m_filterTmp, MAX_NUM_ALF_LUMA_COEFF, invFactor)
4190  : m_alfCovariance[COMP_Y][0][ctbIdx][classIdx].calcErrorForCoeffs<false>(m_clipTmp, m_filterTmp, MAX_NUM_ALF_LUMA_COEFF, invFactor);
4191  }
4192  } //for(classIdx)
4193  //cost
4194  const double costOnTmp = dist + ctuLambda * rateOn;
4195  DTRACE( g_trace_ctx, D_MISC, "\t cost = %.2f, rate = %.2f, dist = %.2f", costOnTmp, rateOn, dist );
4196 
4197  if (costOnTmp < costOn)
4198  {
4199  ctxTempBest = AlfCtx(m_CABACEstimator->getCtx());
4200  costOn = costOnTmp;
4201  iBestFilterSetIdx = filterSetIdx;
4202  }
4203  DTRACE( g_trace_ctx, D_MISC, "\n" );
4204  } //for(filterSetIdx)
4205 
4206  DTRACE( g_trace_ctx, D_MISC, "\t\t\t costOn =%.2f\n", costOn );
4207  //ctb off
4208  m_ctuEnableFlag[COMP_Y][ctbIdx] = 0;
4209  //rate
4210  m_CABACEstimator->getCtx() = AlfCtx(ctxTempStart);
4211  m_CABACEstimator->resetBits();
4212  m_CABACEstimator->codeAlfCtuEnabledFlag(cs, ctbIdx, COMP_Y, &m_alfParamTemp);
4213  //cost
4214  const double costOff = distUnfilterCtb + ctuLambda * FRAC_BITS_SCALE * m_CABACEstimator->getEstFracBits();
4215  DTRACE( g_trace_ctx, D_MISC, "\t\t\t costOff=%.2f\n", costOff );
4216 
4217  if (costOn < costOff)
4218  {
4219  m_CABACEstimator->getCtx() = AlfCtx(ctxTempBest);
4220  m_ctuEnableFlag[COMP_Y][ctbIdx] = 1;
4221  alfCtbFilterSetIndex[ctbIdx] = iBestFilterSetIdx;
4222  curCost += costOn;
4223  }
4224  else
4225  {
4226  m_ctuEnableFlag[COMP_Y][ctbIdx] = 0;
4227  curCost += costOff;
4228  }
4229  } //for(ctbIdx)
4230  int tmpBits = bitsNewFilter + 3 * (numFilterSet - NUM_FIXED_FILTER_SETS);
4231  curCost += tmpBits * m_lambda[COMP_Y];
4232  if (curCost < costMin)
4233  {
4234  costMin = curCost;
4235  bestApsIds.resize(numFilterSet - NUM_FIXED_FILTER_SETS);
4236  for (int i = 0; i < bestApsIds.size(); i++)
4237  {
4238  if (i == 0 && useNewFilter)
4239  {
4240  bestApsIds[i] = newApsId;
4241  }
4242  else
4243  {
4244  bestApsIds[i] = apsIds[i - useNewFilter];
4245  }
4246  }
4247  alfParamNewFiltersBest = m_alfParamTemp;
4248  ctxBest = AlfCtx(m_CABACEstimator->getCtx());
4249  copyCtuEnableFlag(m_ctuEnableFlagTmp, m_ctuEnableFlag, CH_L);
4250  for (int ctuIdx = 0; ctuIdx < m_numCTUsInPic; ctuIdx++)
4251  {
4252  m_alfCtbFilterSetIndexTmp[ctuIdx] = alfCtbFilterSetIndex[ctuIdx];
4253  }
4254  alfParamNewFiltersBest.newFilterFlag[CH_L] = useNewFilter;
4255  }
4256  DTRACE( g_trace_ctx, D_MISC, "\t\t curCost=%.2f\n", curCost );
4257  DTRACE( g_trace_ctx, D_MISC, "\t\t costMin=%.2f\n", costMin );
4258  }//for (int iter = 0; iter < numIter; iter++)
4259  }// for (int numTemporalAps = 0; numTemporalAps < apsIds.size(); numTemporalAps++)
4260  }//for (int useNewFilter = 0; useNewFilter <= 1; useNewFilter++)
4261 
4262  cs.slice->tileGroupCcAlfCbApsId = newApsId;
4263  cs.slice->tileGroupCcAlfCrApsId = newApsId;
4264 
4265  if (costOff <= costMin)
4266  {
4267  memset( cs.slice->tileGroupAlfEnabled, 0, sizeof( cs.slice->tileGroupAlfEnabled ) );
4268  cs.slice->tileGroupNumAps = (0);
4269  setCtuEnableFlag(m_ctuEnableFlag, CH_L, 0);
4270  setCtuEnableFlag(m_ctuEnableFlag, CH_C, 0);
4271  return;
4272  }
4273  else
4274  {
4275  cs.slice->tileGroupAlfEnabled[COMP_Y] = true;
4276  cs.slice->tileGroupNumAps = ((int)bestApsIds.size());
4277  cs.slice->setAlfApsIds(bestApsIds);
4278  copyCtuEnableFlag(m_ctuEnableFlag, m_ctuEnableFlagTmp, CH_L);
4279  for (int ctuIdx = 0; ctuIdx < m_numCTUsInPic; ctuIdx++)
4280  {
4281  alfCtbFilterSetIndex[ctuIdx] = m_alfCtbFilterSetIndexTmp[ctuIdx];
4282  }
4283  if (alfParamNewFiltersBest.newFilterFlag[CH_L])
4284  {
4285  APS* newAPS = m_apsMap->getPS((newApsId << NUM_APS_TYPE_LEN) + ALF_APS);
4286  if (newAPS == NULL)
4287  {
4288  newAPS = m_apsMap->allocatePS((newApsId << NUM_APS_TYPE_LEN) + ALF_APS);
4289  newAPS->apsId = newApsId;
4290  newAPS->apsType = ALF_APS;
4291  }
4292  newAPS->alfParam = alfParamNewFiltersBest;
4293  newAPS->temporalId = cs.slice->TLayer;
4294  newAPS->alfParam.newFilterFlag[CH_C] = false;
4295  newAPS->poc = cs.slice->poc;
4296  m_apsMap->setChangedFlag((newApsId << NUM_APS_TYPE_LEN) + ALF_APS);
4297  m_apsIdStart = newApsId;
4298  }
4299 
4300  const std::vector<int>& apsIds = cs.slice->tileGroupLumaApsId;
4301  for (int i = 0; i < (int)cs.slice->tileGroupNumAps; i++)
4302  {
4303  apss[apsIds[i]] = m_apsMap->getPS((apsIds[i] << NUM_APS_TYPE_LEN) + ALF_APS);
4304  }
4305  }
4306 
4307  //chroma
4308  if (isChromaEnabled(cs.pcv->chrFormat))
4309  {
4310  m_alfParamTemp = alfParamNewFiltersBest;
4311  if( m_alfParamTemp.numAlternativesChroma < 1 )
4312  {
4313  m_alfParamTemp.numAlternativesChroma = 1;
4314  }
4315  setCtuAlternativeChroma( m_ctuAlternative, 0 );
4316  setCtuEnableFlag(m_ctuEnableFlag, CH_C, 1);
4317  getFrameStats(CH_C, 0);
4318  costOff = getUnfilteredDistortion(m_alfCovarianceFrame[CH_C][0], CH_C)/* + m_lambda[CH_C] * 1.0*/;
4319  costMin = MAX_DOUBLE;
4320  m_CABACEstimator->getCtx() = AlfCtx(ctxBest);
4321  ctxStart = AlfCtx(m_CABACEstimator->getCtx());
4322  int newApsIdChroma = -1;
4323  if (alfParamNewFiltersBest.newFilterFlag[CH_L] && (alfParamNewFiltersBest.alfEnabled[COMP_Cb] || alfParamNewFiltersBest.alfEnabled[COMP_Cr]))
4324  {
4325  newApsIdChroma = newApsId;
4326  }
4327  else if (alfParamNewFiltersBest.alfEnabled[COMP_Cb] || alfParamNewFiltersBest.alfEnabled[COMP_Cr])
4328  {
4329  int curId = m_apsIdStart;
4330  while (newApsIdChroma < 0)
4331  {
4332  curId--;
4333  if (curId < 0)
4334  {
4335  curId = ALF_CTB_MAX_NUM_APS - 1;
4336  }
4337  if (std::find(bestApsIds.begin(), bestApsIds.end(), curId) == bestApsIds.end())
4338  {
4339  newApsIdChroma = !m_encCfg->m_alfTempPred ? newApsId: curId;
4340  }
4341  }
4342  }
4343  for (int curApsId = 0; curApsId < ALF_CTB_MAX_NUM_APS; curApsId++)
4344  {
4345  if ((cs.slice->pendingRasInit || cs.slice->isIDRorBLA() || cs.slice->isIntra()) && curApsId != newApsIdChroma)
4346  {
4347  continue;
4348  }
4349  APS* curAPS = m_apsMap->getPS((curApsId << NUM_APS_TYPE_LEN) + ALF_APS);
4350 
4351  if( curAPS && curAPS->layerId != cs.slice->pic->layerId )
4352  {
4353  continue;
4354  }
4355  const double lambdaChroma = (m_lambda[COMP_Cb] + m_lambda[COMP_Cr]) * 0.5;
4356  double curCost = lambdaChroma * 3;
4357  int maxTID = cs.slice->TLayer;
4358  if (curApsId == newApsIdChroma)
4359  {
4360  m_alfParamTemp = alfParamNewFilters;
4361  curCost += lambdaChroma * m_bitsNewFilter[CH_C];
4362  }
4363  else if (m_encCfg->m_alfTempPred && curAPS && curAPS->temporalId <= maxTID && curAPS->alfParam.newFilterFlag[CH_C])
4364  {
4365  m_alfParamTemp = curAPS->alfParam;
4366  }
4367  else
4368  {
4369  continue;
4370  }
4371  reconstructCoeff(m_alfParamTemp, CH_C, true, true);
4372  m_CABACEstimator->getCtx() = AlfCtx(ctxStart);
4373  for (int compId = 1; compId < MAX_NUM_COMP; compId++)
4374  {
4375  m_alfParamTemp.alfEnabled[compId] = true;
4376  for (int ctbIdx = 0; ctbIdx < m_numCTUsInPic; ctbIdx++)
4377  {
4378  const double ctuLambda = lambdaChromaWeight > 0.0 ? cs.picture->ctuQpaLambda[ctbIdx] * lambdaChromaWeight : m_lambda[compId];
4379  double distUnfilterCtu = m_ctbDistortionUnfilter[compId][ctbIdx];
4380  //cost on
4381  m_ctuEnableFlag[compId][ctbIdx] = 1;
4382  ctxTempStart = AlfCtx(m_CABACEstimator->getCtx());
4383  //rate
4384  m_CABACEstimator->getCtx() = AlfCtx(ctxTempStart);
4385  m_CABACEstimator->resetBits();
4386  //ctb flag
4387  m_CABACEstimator->codeAlfCtuEnabledFlag(cs, ctbIdx, compId, &m_alfParamTemp);
4388  double rateOn = FRAC_BITS_SCALE * m_CABACEstimator->getEstFracBits();
4389  double dist = MAX_DOUBLE;
4390  int numAlts = m_alfParamTemp.numAlternativesChroma;
4391  ctxTempBest = AlfCtx( m_CABACEstimator->getCtx() );
4392  double bestAltRate = 0;
4393  double bestAltCost = MAX_DOUBLE;
4394  int bestAltIdx = -1;
4395  ctxTempAltStart = AlfCtx( ctxTempBest );
4396  for( int altIdx = 0; altIdx < numAlts; ++altIdx )
4397  {
4398  if( altIdx )
4399  m_CABACEstimator->getCtx() = AlfCtx( ctxTempAltStart );
4400  m_CABACEstimator->resetBits();
4401  m_ctuAlternative[compId][ctbIdx] = altIdx;
4402  m_CABACEstimator->codeAlfCtuAlternative( cs, ctbIdx, compId, &m_alfParamTemp );
4403  double altRate = FRAC_BITS_SCALE * m_CABACEstimator->getEstFracBits();
4404  double r_altCost = ctuLambda * altRate;
4405 
4406  //distortion
4407  for (int i = 0; i < MAX_NUM_ALF_CHROMA_COEFF; i++)
4408  {
4409  m_filterTmp[i] = m_chromaCoeffFinal[altIdx][i];
4410  m_clipTmp[i] = m_chromaClippFinal[altIdx][i];
4411  }
4412  double altDist = doClip ? m_alfCovariance[compId][0][ctbIdx][0].calcErrorForCoeffs<true >( m_clipTmp, m_filterTmp, MAX_NUM_ALF_CHROMA_COEFF, invFactor )
4413  : m_alfCovariance[compId][0][ctbIdx][0].calcErrorForCoeffs<false>( m_clipTmp, m_filterTmp, MAX_NUM_ALF_CHROMA_COEFF, invFactor );
4414  double altCost = altDist + r_altCost;
4415  if( altCost < bestAltCost )
4416  {
4417  bestAltCost = altCost;
4418  bestAltIdx = altIdx;
4419  bestAltRate = altRate;
4420  ctxTempBest = AlfCtx( m_CABACEstimator->getCtx() );
4421  dist = altDist;
4422  }
4423  }
4424  m_ctuAlternative[compId][ctbIdx] = bestAltIdx;
4425  rateOn += bestAltRate;
4426  dist += distUnfilterCtu;
4427  //cost
4428  const double costOn = dist + ctuLambda * rateOn;
4429  //cost off
4430  m_ctuEnableFlag[compId][ctbIdx] = 0;
4431  //rate
4432  m_CABACEstimator->getCtx() = AlfCtx(ctxTempStart);
4433  m_CABACEstimator->resetBits();
4434  m_CABACEstimator->codeAlfCtuEnabledFlag(cs, ctbIdx, compId, &m_alfParamTemp);
4435  //cost
4436  const double costOff = distUnfilterCtu + ctuLambda * FRAC_BITS_SCALE * m_CABACEstimator->getEstFracBits();
4437 
4438  if (costOn < costOff)
4439  {
4440  m_CABACEstimator->getCtx() = AlfCtx(ctxTempBest);
4441  m_ctuEnableFlag[compId][ctbIdx] = 1;
4442  curCost += costOn;
4443  }
4444  else
4445  {
4446  m_ctuEnableFlag[compId][ctbIdx] = 0;
4447  curCost += costOff;
4448  }
4449  } //for(ctbIdx)
4450  }
4451  //chroma idc
4452  setEnableFlag(m_alfParamTemp, CH_C, m_ctuEnableFlag);
4453 
4454  if (curCost < costMin)
4455  {
4456  costMin = curCost;
4457  cs.slice->tileGroupChromaApsId = curApsId;
4458  cs.slice->tileGroupAlfEnabled[COMP_Cb] = m_alfParamTemp.alfEnabled[COMP_Cb];
4459  cs.slice->tileGroupAlfEnabled[COMP_Cr] = m_alfParamTemp.alfEnabled[COMP_Cr];
4460  copyCtuEnableFlag(m_ctuEnableFlagTmp, m_ctuEnableFlag, CH_C);
4461  copyCtuAlternativeChroma(m_ctuAlternativeTmp, m_ctuAlternative);
4462  }
4463  }
4464  if (newApsIdChroma >= 0)
4465  {
4466  cs.slice->tileGroupCcAlfCbApsId = newApsIdChroma;
4467  cs.slice->tileGroupCcAlfCrApsId = newApsIdChroma;
4468  }
4469  if (costOff < costMin)
4470  {
4471  cs.slice->tileGroupAlfEnabled[COMP_Cb] = false;
4472  cs.slice->tileGroupAlfEnabled[COMP_Cr] = false;
4473  setCtuEnableFlag(m_ctuEnableFlag, CH_C, 0);
4474  }
4475  else
4476  {
4477  copyCtuEnableFlag(m_ctuEnableFlag, m_ctuEnableFlagTmp, CH_C);
4478  copyCtuAlternativeChroma(m_ctuAlternative, m_ctuAlternativeTmp);
4479  if (cs.slice->tileGroupChromaApsId == newApsIdChroma) //new filter
4480  {
4481  APS* newAPS = m_apsMap->getPS((newApsIdChroma << NUM_APS_TYPE_LEN) + ALF_APS);
4482  if (newAPS == NULL)
4483  {
4484  newAPS = m_apsMap->allocatePS((newApsIdChroma << NUM_APS_TYPE_LEN) + ALF_APS);
4485  newAPS->apsType = ALF_APS;
4486  newAPS->apsId = newApsIdChroma;
4487  newAPS->alfParam.reset();
4488  }
4489  newAPS->alfParam.newFilterFlag[CH_C] = true;
4490  if (!alfParamNewFiltersBest.newFilterFlag[CH_L])
4491  {
4492  newAPS->alfParam.newFilterFlag[CH_L] = false;
4493  }
4494  newAPS->alfParam.numAlternativesChroma = alfParamNewFilters.numAlternativesChroma;
