4495  newAPS->alfParam.nonLinearFlag[CH_C] = alfParamNewFilters.nonLinearFlag[CH_C];
4496  newAPS->temporalId = cs.slice->TLayer;
4497  newAPS->poc = cs.slice->poc;
4498  for (int altIdx = 0; altIdx < VVENC_MAX_NUM_ALF_ALTERNATIVES_CHROMA; ++altIdx )
4499  for (int i = 0; i < MAX_NUM_ALF_CHROMA_COEFF; i++)
4500  {
4501  newAPS->alfParam.chromaCoeff[altIdx][i] = alfParamNewFilters.chromaCoeff[altIdx][i];
4502  newAPS->alfParam.chromaClipp[altIdx][i] = alfParamNewFilters.chromaClipp[altIdx][i];
4503  }
4504  m_apsMap->setChangedFlag((newApsIdChroma << NUM_APS_TYPE_LEN) + ALF_APS);
4505  m_apsIdStart = newApsIdChroma;
4506  }
4507  apss[cs.slice->tileGroupChromaApsId] = m_apsMap->getPS((cs.slice->tileGroupChromaApsId << NUM_APS_TYPE_LEN) + ALF_APS);
4508  }
4509  }
4510 }
4511 
4512 void EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::copyCtuAlternativeChroma( uint8_t* ctuAltsDst[MAX_NUM_COMP], uint8_t* ctuAltsSrc[MAX_NUM_COMP] )
4513 {
4514  std::copy_n( ctuAltsSrc[COMP_Cb], m_numCTUsInPic, ctuAltsDst[COMP_Cb] );
4515  std::copy_n( ctuAltsSrc[COMP_Cr], m_numCTUsInPic, ctuAltsDst[COMP_Cr] );
4516 }
4517 
4518 void EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::setCtuAlternativeChroma( uint8_t* ctuAlts[MAX_NUM_COMP], uint8_t val )
4519 {
4520  std::fill_n( ctuAlts[COMP_Cb], m_numCTUsInPic, val );
4521  std::fill_n( ctuAlts[COMP_Cr], m_numCTUsInPic, val );
4522 }
4523 
4524 void EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::initCtuAlternativeChroma( uint8_t* ctuAlts[MAX_NUM_COMP] )
4525 {
4526  uint8_t altIdx = 0;
4527  for( int ctuIdx = 0; ctuIdx < m_numCTUsInPic; ++ctuIdx )
4528  {
4529  ctuAlts[COMP_Cb][ctuIdx] = altIdx;
4530  if( (ctuIdx+1) * m_alfParamTemp.numAlternativesChroma >= (altIdx+1)*m_numCTUsInPic )
4531  ++altIdx;
4532  }
4533  altIdx = 0;
4534  for( int ctuIdx = 0; ctuIdx < m_numCTUsInPic; ++ctuIdx )
4535  {
4536  ctuAlts[COMP_Cr][ctuIdx] = altIdx;
4537  if( (ctuIdx+1) * m_alfParamTemp.numAlternativesChroma >= (altIdx+1)*m_numCTUsInPic )
4538  ++altIdx;
4539  }
4540 }
4541 
4542 int EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::getMaxNumAlternativesChroma( )
4543 {
4544  return std::min<int>( m_numCTUsInPic * 2, m_encCfg->m_maxNumAlfAlternativesChroma );
4545 }
4546 
4547 int EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::getCoeffRateCcAlf(short chromaCoeff[MAX_NUM_CC_ALF_FILTERS][MAX_NUM_CC_ALF_CHROMA_COEFF], bool filterEnabled[MAX_NUM_CC_ALF_FILTERS], uint8_t filterCount, ComponentID compID)
4548 {
4549  int bits = 0;
4550 
4551  if ( filterCount > 0 )
4552  {
4553  bits += lengthUvlc(filterCount - 1);
4554  int signaledFilterCount = 0;
4555  for ( int filterIdx=0; filterIdx<MAX_NUM_CC_ALF_FILTERS; filterIdx++ )
4556  {
4557  if (filterEnabled[filterIdx])
4558  {
4559  AlfFilterShape alfShape(size_CC_ALF);
4560  // Filter coefficients
4561  for (int i = 0; i < alfShape.numCoeff - 1; i++)
4562  {
4563  bits += CCALF_BITS_PER_COEFF_LEVEL + (chromaCoeff[filterIdx][i] == 0 ? 0 : 1);
4564  }
4565 
4566  signaledFilterCount++;
4567  }
4568  }
4569  CHECK(signaledFilterCount != filterCount, "Number of filter signaled not same as indicated");
4570  }
4571 
4572  return bits;
4573 }
4574 
4575 void EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::deriveCcAlfFilterCoeff( ComponentID compID, const PelUnitBuf& recYuv, const PelUnitBuf& recYuvExt, short filterCoeff[MAX_NUM_CC_ALF_FILTERS][MAX_NUM_CC_ALF_CHROMA_COEFF], const uint8_t filterIdx )
4576 {
4577  int forward_tab[CCALF_CANDS_COEFF_NR * 2 - 1] = {0};
4578  for (int i = 0; i < CCALF_CANDS_COEFF_NR; i++)
4579  {
4580  forward_tab[CCALF_CANDS_COEFF_NR - 1 + i] = CCALF_SMALL_TAB[i];
4581  forward_tab[CCALF_CANDS_COEFF_NR - 1 - i] = (-1) * CCALF_SMALL_TAB[i];
4582  }
4583  using TE = double[MAX_NUM_ALF_LUMA_COEFF][MAX_NUM_ALF_LUMA_COEFF];
4584  using Ty = double[MAX_NUM_ALF_LUMA_COEFF];
4585 
4586  double filterCoeffDbl[MAX_NUM_CC_ALF_CHROMA_COEFF];
4587  int16_t filterCoeffInt[MAX_NUM_CC_ALF_CHROMA_COEFF];
4588 
4589  std::fill_n(filterCoeffInt, MAX_NUM_CC_ALF_CHROMA_COEFF, 0);
4590 
4591  TE kE;
4592  Ty ky;
4593  const int size = m_filterShapesCcAlf[compID - 1][0].numCoeff - 1;
4594 
4595  for (int k = 0; k < size; k++)
4596  {
4597  ky[k] = m_alfCovarianceFrameCcAlf[compID - 1][0][filterIdx].y[0][k];
4598  for (int l = 0; l < size; l++)
4599  {
4600  kE[k][l] = m_alfCovarianceFrameCcAlf[compID - 1][0][filterIdx].E[0][0][k][l];
4601  }
4602  }
4603 
4604  m_alfCovarianceFrameCcAlf[compID - 1][0][filterIdx].gnsSolveByChol(kE, ky, filterCoeffDbl, size);
4605  roundFiltCoeffCCALF(filterCoeffInt, filterCoeffDbl, size, (1 << m_scaleBits));
4606 
4607  for (int k = 0; k < size; k++)
4608  {
4609  CHECK( filterCoeffInt[k] < -(1 << CCALF_DYNAMIC_RANGE), "this is not possible: filterCoeffInt[k] < -(1 << CCALF_DYNAMIC_RANGE)");
4610  CHECK( filterCoeffInt[k] > (1 << CCALF_DYNAMIC_RANGE), "this is not possible: filterCoeffInt[k] > (1 << CCALF_DYNAMIC_RANGE)");
4611  }
4612 
4613  const double invFactor = 1.0 / (double)(1 << m_scaleBits );
4614  // Refine quanitzation
4615  int modified = 1;
4616  double errRef = m_alfCovarianceFrameCcAlf[compID - 1][0][filterIdx].calcErrorForCcAlfCoeffs(filterCoeffInt, size, invFactor);
4617  while (modified)
4618  {
4619  modified = 0;
4620  for (int delta : { 1, -1 })
4621  {
4622  double errMin = MAX_DOUBLE;
4623  int idxMin = -1;
4624  int minIndex = -1;
4625 
4626  for (int k = 0; k < size; k++)
4627  {
4628  int org_idx = -1;
4629  for (int i = 0; i < CCALF_CANDS_COEFF_NR * 2 - 1; i++)
4630  {
4631  if (forward_tab[i] == filterCoeffInt[k])
4632  {
4633  org_idx = i;
4634  break;
4635  }
4636  }
4637  CHECK( org_idx < 0, "this is wrong, does not find coeff from forward_tab");
4638  if ( (org_idx - delta < 0) || (org_idx - delta >= CCALF_CANDS_COEFF_NR * 2 - 1) )
4639  continue;
4640 
4641  filterCoeffInt[k] = forward_tab[org_idx - delta];
4642  double error = m_alfCovarianceFrameCcAlf[compID - 1][0][filterIdx].calcErrorForCcAlfCoeffs(filterCoeffInt, size, invFactor);
4643  if( error < errMin )
4644  {
4645  errMin = error;
4646  idxMin = k;
4647  minIndex = org_idx;
4648  }
4649  filterCoeffInt[k] = forward_tab[org_idx];
4650  }
4651  if (errMin < errRef)
4652  {
4653  minIndex -= delta;
4654  CHECK( minIndex < 0, "this is wrong, index - delta < 0");
4655  CHECK( minIndex >= CCALF_CANDS_COEFF_NR * 2 - 1, "this is wrong, index - delta >= CCALF_CANDS_COEFF_NR * 2 - 1");
4656  filterCoeffInt[idxMin] = forward_tab[minIndex];
4657  modified++;
4658  errRef = errMin;
4659  }
4660  }
4661  }
4662 
4663 
4664  for (int k = 0; k < (size + 1); k++)
4665  {
4666  CHECK((filterCoeffInt[k] < -(1 << CCALF_DYNAMIC_RANGE)) || (filterCoeffInt[k] > (1 << CCALF_DYNAMIC_RANGE)), "Exceeded valid range for CC ALF coefficient");
4667  filterCoeff[filterIdx][k] = filterCoeffInt[k];
4668  }
4669 }
4670 
4671 
4672 void EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::determineControlIdcValues(CodingStructure &cs, const ComponentID compID, const PelBuf *buf,
4673  const int ctuWidthC, const int ctuHeightC, const int picWidthC,
4674  const int picHeightC, double **unfilteredDistortion,
4675  uint64_t *trainingDistortion[MAX_NUM_CC_ALF_FILTERS],
4676  uint64_t *lumaSwingGreaterThanThresholdCount,
4677  uint64_t *chromaSampleCountNearMidPoint,
4678  bool reuseTemporalFilterCoeff, uint8_t *trainingCovControl,
4679  uint8_t *filterControl, uint64_t &curTotalDistortion,
4680  double &curTotalRate, bool filterEnabled[MAX_NUM_CC_ALF_FILTERS],
4681  uint8_t mapFilterIdxToFilterIdc[MAX_NUM_CC_ALF_FILTERS + 1],
4682  uint8_t &ccAlfFilterCount)
4683 {
4684  bool curFilterEnabled[MAX_NUM_CC_ALF_FILTERS];
4685  std::fill_n(curFilterEnabled, MAX_NUM_CC_ALF_FILTERS, false);
4686 
4687  FilterIdxCount filterIdxCount[MAX_NUM_CC_ALF_FILTERS];
4688  for (int i = 0; i < MAX_NUM_CC_ALF_FILTERS; i++)
4689  {
4690  filterIdxCount[i].count = 0;
4691  filterIdxCount[i].filterIdx = i;
4692  }
4693 
4694  double prevRate = curTotalRate;
4695 
4696  TempCtx ctxInitial(m_CtxCache);
4697  TempCtx ctxBest(m_CtxCache);
4698  TempCtx ctxStart(m_CtxCache);
4699  ctxInitial = SubCtx(Ctx::CcAlfFilterControlFlag, m_CABACEstimator->getCtx());
4700  ctxBest = SubCtx(Ctx::CcAlfFilterControlFlag, m_CABACEstimator->getCtx());
4701 
4702  int ctuIdx = 0;
4703  for (int yCtu = 0; yCtu < buf->height; yCtu += ctuHeightC)
4704  {
4705  for (int xCtu = 0; xCtu < buf->width; xCtu += ctuWidthC)
4706  {
4707  uint64_t ssd;
4708  double rate;
4709  double cost;
4710 
4711  uint64_t bestSSD = MAX_UINT64;
4712  double bestRate = MAX_DOUBLE;
4713  double bestCost = MAX_DOUBLE;
4714  uint8_t bestFilterIdc = 0;
4715  uint8_t bestFilterIdx = 0;
4716  const uint32_t thresholdS = std::min<int>(buf->height - yCtu, ctuHeightC) << getComponentScaleY(COMP_Cb, m_chromaFormat);
4717  const uint32_t numberOfChromaSamples = std::min<int>(buf->height - yCtu, ctuHeightC) * std::min<int>(buf->width - xCtu, ctuWidthC);
4718  const uint32_t thresholdC = (numberOfChromaSamples >> 2);
4719 
4720  m_CABACEstimator->getCtx() = ctxBest;
4721  ctxStart = SubCtx(Ctx::CcAlfFilterControlFlag, m_CABACEstimator->getCtx());
4722 
4723  for (int filterIdx = 0; filterIdx <= MAX_NUM_CC_ALF_FILTERS; filterIdx++)
4724  {
4725  uint8_t filterIdc = mapFilterIdxToFilterIdc[filterIdx];
4726  if (filterIdx < MAX_NUM_CC_ALF_FILTERS && !filterEnabled[filterIdx])
4727  {
4728  continue;
4729  }
4730 
4731  if (filterIdx == MAX_NUM_CC_ALF_FILTERS)
4732  {
4733  ssd = unfilteredDistortion[compID][ctuIdx]; // restore saved distortion computation
4734  }
4735  else
4736  {
4737  ssd = trainingDistortion[filterIdx][ctuIdx];
4738  }
4739  m_CABACEstimator->getCtx() = ctxStart;
4740  m_CABACEstimator->resetBits();
4741  const Position lumaPos = Position({ xCtu << getComponentScaleX(compID, cs.pcv->chrFormat),
4742  yCtu << getComponentScaleY(compID, cs.pcv->chrFormat) });
4743  m_CABACEstimator->codeCcAlfFilterControlIdc(filterIdc, cs, compID, ctuIdx, filterControl, lumaPos,
4744  ccAlfFilterCount);
4745  rate = FRAC_BITS_SCALE * m_CABACEstimator->getEstFracBits();
4746  cost = rate * m_lambda[compID] + ssd;
4747 
4748  bool limitationExceeded = false;
4749  if (m_limitCcAlf && filterIdx < MAX_NUM_CC_ALF_FILTERS)
4750  {
4751  limitationExceeded = limitationExceeded || (lumaSwingGreaterThanThresholdCount[ctuIdx] >= thresholdS);
4752  limitationExceeded = limitationExceeded || (chromaSampleCountNearMidPoint[ctuIdx] >= thresholdC);
4753  }
4754  if (cost < bestCost && !limitationExceeded)
4755  {
4756  bestCost = cost;
4757  bestRate = rate;
4758  bestSSD = ssd;
4759  bestFilterIdc = filterIdc;
4760  bestFilterIdx = filterIdx;
4761 
4762  ctxBest = SubCtx(Ctx::CcAlfFilterControlFlag, m_CABACEstimator->getCtx());
4763 
4764  trainingCovControl[ctuIdx] = (filterIdx == MAX_NUM_CC_ALF_FILTERS) ? 0 : (filterIdx + 1);
4765  filterControl[ctuIdx] = (filterIdx == MAX_NUM_CC_ALF_FILTERS) ? 0 : (filterIdx + 1);
4766  }
4767  }
4768  if (bestFilterIdc != 0)
4769  {
4770  curFilterEnabled[bestFilterIdx] = true;
4771  filterIdxCount[bestFilterIdx].count++;
4772  }
4773  curTotalRate += bestRate;
4774  curTotalDistortion += bestSSD;
4775  ctuIdx++;
4776  }
4777  }
4778 
4779  if (!reuseTemporalFilterCoeff)
4780  {
4781  std::copy_n(curFilterEnabled, MAX_NUM_CC_ALF_FILTERS, filterEnabled);
4782 
4783  std::stable_sort(filterIdxCount, filterIdxCount + MAX_NUM_CC_ALF_FILTERS, compareCounts);
4784 
4785  int filterIdc = 1;
4786  ccAlfFilterCount = 0;
4787  for ( FilterIdxCount &s : filterIdxCount )
4788  {
4789  const int filterIdx = s.filterIdx;
4790  if (filterEnabled[filterIdx])
4791  {
4792  mapFilterIdxToFilterIdc[filterIdx] = filterIdc;
4793  filterIdc++;
4794  ccAlfFilterCount++;
4795  }
4796  }
4797 
4798  curTotalRate = prevRate;
4799  m_CABACEstimator->getCtx() = ctxInitial;
4800  m_CABACEstimator->resetBits();
4801  int ctuIdx = 0;
4802  for (int y = 0; y < buf->height; y += ctuHeightC)
4803  {
4804  for (int x = 0; x < buf->width; x += ctuWidthC)
4805  {
4806  const int filterIdxPlus1 = filterControl[ctuIdx];
4807 
4808  const Position lumaPos = Position(
4809  { x << getComponentScaleX(compID, cs.pcv->chrFormat), y << getComponentScaleY(compID, cs.pcv->chrFormat) });
4810 
4811  m_CABACEstimator->codeCcAlfFilterControlIdc(filterIdxPlus1 == 0 ? 0
4812  : mapFilterIdxToFilterIdc[filterIdxPlus1 - 1],
4813  cs, compID, ctuIdx, filterControl, lumaPos, ccAlfFilterCount);
4814 
4815  ctuIdx++;
4816  }
4817  }
4818  curTotalRate += FRAC_BITS_SCALE*m_CABACEstimator->getEstFracBits();
4819  }
4820 
4821  // restore for next iteration
4822  m_CABACEstimator->getCtx() = ctxInitial;
4823 }
4824 
4825 std::vector<int> EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::getAvailableCcAlfApsIds(CodingStructure& cs, ComponentID compID)
4826 {
4827  APS** apss = cs.slice->alfAps;
4828  for (int i = 0; i < ALF_CTB_MAX_NUM_APS; i++)
4829  {
4830  apss[i] = m_apsMap->getPS((i << NUM_APS_TYPE_LEN) + ALF_APS);
4831  }
4832 
4833  std::vector<int> result;
4834  if( m_encCfg->m_alfTempPred )
4835  {
4836  int apsIdChecked = 0, curApsId = m_apsIdStart;
4837  if (curApsId < ALF_CTB_MAX_NUM_APS)
4838  {
4839  while (apsIdChecked < ALF_CTB_MAX_NUM_APS && !cs.slice->isIntra() && result.size() < ALF_CTB_MAX_NUM_APS && !cs.slice->pendingRasInit && !cs.slice->isIDRorBLA())
4840  {
4841  APS* curAPS = cs.slice->alfAps[curApsId];
4842  if (curAPS && curAPS->layerId == cs.picture->layerId && curAPS->temporalId <= cs.slice->TLayer && curAPS->ccAlfParam.newCcAlfFilter[compID - 1])
4843  {
4844  result.push_back(curApsId);
4845  }
4846  apsIdChecked++;
4847  curApsId = (curApsId + 1) % ALF_CTB_MAX_NUM_APS;
4848  }
4849  }
4850  }
4851  return result;
4852 }
4853 
4854 void EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::getFrameStatsCcalf(ComponentID compIdx, int filterIdc)
4855 {
4856  int ctuRsAddr = 0;
4857  const int filterIdx = filterIdc - 1;
4858 
4859  // init Frame stats buffers
4860  for (int shape = 0; shape != m_filterShapesCcAlf[compIdx - 1].size(); shape++)
4861  {
4862  m_alfCovarianceFrameCcAlf[compIdx - 1][shape][filterIdx].reset();
4863  }
4864 
4865  for (int yPos = 0; yPos < m_picHeight; yPos += m_maxCUHeight)
4866  {
4867  for (int xPos = 0; xPos < m_picWidth; xPos += m_maxCUWidth)
4868  {
4869  if (m_trainingCovControl[ctuRsAddr] == filterIdc)
4870  {
4871  for (int shape = 0; shape != m_filterShapesCcAlf[compIdx - 1].size(); shape++)
4872  {
4873  m_alfCovarianceFrameCcAlf[compIdx - 1][shape][filterIdx] +=
4874  m_alfCovarianceCcAlf[compIdx - 1][shape][0][ctuRsAddr];
4875  }
4876  }
4877  ctuRsAddr++;
4878  }
4879  }
4880 }
4881 
4882 void EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::deriveCcAlfFilter( CodingStructure& cs, ComponentID compID, const PelUnitBuf& orgYuv, const PelUnitBuf& tempDecYuvBuf, const PelUnitBuf& dstYuv )
4883 {
4884  if (!cs.slice->tileGroupAlfEnabled[COMP_Y])
4885  {
4886  m_ccAlfFilterParam.ccAlfFilterEnabled[compID - 1] = false;
4887  return;
4888  }
4889 
4890  m_limitCcAlf = m_encCfg->m_QP >= m_encCfg->m_ccalfQpThreshold;
4891  if (m_limitCcAlf && cs.slice->sliceQp <= m_encCfg->m_QP + 1)
4892  {
4893  m_ccAlfFilterParam.ccAlfFilterEnabled[compID - 1] = false;
4894  return;
4895  }
4896 
4897  uint8_t bestMapFilterIdxToFilterIdc[MAX_NUM_CC_ALF_FILTERS+1];
4898  const int scaleX = getComponentScaleX(compID, cs.pcv->chrFormat);
4899  const int scaleY = getComponentScaleY(compID, cs.pcv->chrFormat);
4900  const int ctuWidthC = cs.pcv->maxCUSize >> scaleX;
4901  const int ctuHeightC = cs.pcv->maxCUSize >> scaleY;
4902  const int picWidthC = cs.pcv->lumaWidth >> scaleX;
4903  const int picHeightC = cs.pcv->lumaHeight >> scaleY;
4904  const int maxTrainingIterCount = 15;
4905 
4906  if (m_limitCcAlf)
4907  {
4908  countLumaSwingGreaterThanThreshold(dstYuv.get(COMP_Y).bufAt(0, 0), dstYuv.get(COMP_Y).stride, dstYuv.get(COMP_Y).height, dstYuv.get(COMP_Y).width, cs.pcv->maxCUSizeLog2, cs.pcv->maxCUSizeLog2, m_lumaSwingGreaterThanThresholdCount, m_numCTUsInWidth);
4909  }
4910  if (m_limitCcAlf)
4911  {
4912  countChromaSampleValueNearMidPoint(dstYuv.get(compID).bufAt(0, 0), dstYuv.get(compID).stride, dstYuv.get(compID).height, dstYuv.get(compID).width, cs.pcv->maxCUSizeLog2- scaleX, cs.pcv->maxCUSizeLog2 - scaleY, m_chromaSampleCountNearMidPoint, m_numCTUsInWidth);
4913  }
4914 
4915  for ( int filterIdx = 0; filterIdx <= MAX_NUM_CC_ALF_FILTERS; filterIdx++ )
4916  {
4917  if ( filterIdx < MAX_NUM_CC_ALF_FILTERS)
4918  {
4919  memset( m_bestFilterCoeffSet[filterIdx], 0, sizeof(m_bestFilterCoeffSet[filterIdx]) );
4920  bestMapFilterIdxToFilterIdc[filterIdx] = filterIdx + 1;
4921  }
4922  else
4923  {
4924  bestMapFilterIdxToFilterIdc[filterIdx] = 0;
4925  }
4926  }
4927  memset(m_bestFilterControl, 0, sizeof(uint8_t) * m_numCTUsInPic);
4928  int ccalfReuseApsId = -1;
4929  m_reuseApsId[compID - 1] = -1;
4930 
4931  const TempCtx ctxStartCcAlfFilterControlFlag ( m_CtxCache, SubCtx( Ctx::CcAlfFilterControlFlag, m_CABACEstimator->getCtx() ) );
4932 
4933  // compute cost of not filtering
4934  uint64_t unfilteredDistortion = 0;
4935  for (int ctbIdx = 0; ctbIdx < m_numCTUsInPic; ctbIdx++)
4936  {
4937  unfilteredDistortion += (uint64_t)m_alfCovarianceCcAlf[compID - 1][0][0][ctbIdx].pixAcc;
4938  }
4939  double bestUnfilteredTotalCost = 1 * m_lambda[compID] + unfilteredDistortion; // 1 bit is for gating flag
4940 
4941  bool ccAlfFilterIdxEnabled[MAX_NUM_CC_ALF_FILTERS];
4942  short ccAlfFilterCoeff[MAX_NUM_CC_ALF_FILTERS][MAX_NUM_CC_ALF_CHROMA_COEFF];
4943  uint8_t ccAlfFilterCount = MAX_NUM_CC_ALF_FILTERS;
4944  double bestFilteredTotalCost = MAX_DOUBLE;
4945  bool bestreuseTemporalFilterCoeff = false;
4946  std::vector<int> apsIds = getAvailableCcAlfApsIds(cs, compID);
4947  const double invFactor = 1.0 / (double)(1 << m_scaleBits );
4948 
4949  for (int testFilterIdx = 0; testFilterIdx < ( apsIds.size() + 1 ); testFilterIdx++ )
4950  {
4951  bool referencingExistingAps = (testFilterIdx < apsIds.size()) ? true : false;
4952  int maxNumberOfFiltersBeingTested = MAX_NUM_CC_ALF_FILTERS - (testFilterIdx - static_cast<int>(apsIds.size()));
4953 
4954  if (maxNumberOfFiltersBeingTested < 0)
4955  {
4956  maxNumberOfFiltersBeingTested = 1;
4957  }
4958 
4959  {
4960  // Instead of rewriting the control buffer for every training iteration just keep a mapping from filterIdx to filterIdc
4961  uint8_t mapFilterIdxToFilterIdc[MAX_NUM_CC_ALF_FILTERS + 1];
4962  for (int filterIdx = 0; filterIdx <= MAX_NUM_CC_ALF_FILTERS; filterIdx++)
4963  {
4964  if (filterIdx == MAX_NUM_CC_ALF_FILTERS)
4965  {
4966  mapFilterIdxToFilterIdc[filterIdx] = 0;
4967  }
4968  else
4969  {
4970  mapFilterIdxToFilterIdc[filterIdx] = filterIdx + 1;
4971  }
4972  }
4973 
4974  // initialize filters
4975  for ( int filterIdx = 0; filterIdx < MAX_NUM_CC_ALF_FILTERS; filterIdx++ )
4976  {
4977  ccAlfFilterIdxEnabled[filterIdx] = false;
4978  memset(ccAlfFilterCoeff[filterIdx], 0, sizeof(ccAlfFilterCoeff[filterIdx]));
4979  }
4980  if ( referencingExistingAps )
4981  {
4982  maxNumberOfFiltersBeingTested = m_apsMap->getPS((apsIds[testFilterIdx] << NUM_APS_TYPE_LEN) + ALF_APS)->ccAlfParam.ccAlfFilterCount[compID - 1];
4983  ccAlfFilterCount = maxNumberOfFiltersBeingTested;
4984  for (int filterIdx = 0; filterIdx < maxNumberOfFiltersBeingTested; filterIdx++)
4985  {
4986  ccAlfFilterIdxEnabled[filterIdx] = true;
4987  memcpy(ccAlfFilterCoeff[filterIdx], m_ccAlfFilterParam.ccAlfCoeff[compID - 1][filterIdx],
4988  sizeof(ccAlfFilterCoeff[filterIdx]));
4989  }
4990  memcpy( ccAlfFilterCoeff, m_apsMap->getPS((apsIds[testFilterIdx] << NUM_APS_TYPE_LEN) + ALF_APS)->ccAlfParam.ccAlfCoeff[compID - 1], sizeof(ccAlfFilterCoeff) );
4991  }
4992  else
4993  {
4994  for (int i = 0; i < maxNumberOfFiltersBeingTested; i++)
4995  {
4996  ccAlfFilterIdxEnabled[i] = true;
4997  }
4998  ccAlfFilterCount = maxNumberOfFiltersBeingTested;
4999  }
5000 
5001  // initialize
5002  int controlIdx = 0;
5003  const int columnSize = ( m_buf->width / maxNumberOfFiltersBeingTested);
5004  for (int y = 0; y < m_buf->height; y += ctuHeightC)
5005  {
5006  for (int x = 0; x < m_buf->width; x += ctuWidthC)
5007  {
5008  m_trainingCovControl[controlIdx] = ( x / columnSize ) + 1;
5009  controlIdx++;
5010  }
5011  }
5012 
5013  // compute cost of filtering
5014  int trainingIterCount = 0;
5015  bool keepTraining = true;
5016  bool improvement = false;
5017  double prevTotalCost = MAX_DOUBLE;
5018  while (keepTraining)
5019  {
5020  improvement = false;
5021  for (int filterIdx = 0; filterIdx < maxNumberOfFiltersBeingTested; filterIdx++)
5022  {
5023  if (ccAlfFilterIdxEnabled[filterIdx])
5024  {
5025  if (!referencingExistingAps)
5026  {
5027  getFrameStatsCcalf(compID, (filterIdx + 1));
5028  deriveCcAlfFilterCoeff(compID, dstYuv, tempDecYuvBuf, ccAlfFilterCoeff, filterIdx);
5029  }
5030  const int numCoeff = m_filterShapesCcAlf[compID - 1][0].numCoeff - 1;
5031  int log2BlockWidth = cs.pcv->maxCUSizeLog2 - scaleX;
5032  int log2BlockHeight = cs.pcv->maxCUSizeLog2 - scaleY;
5033  for (int y = 0; y < m_buf->height; y += (1 << log2BlockHeight))
5034  {
5035  for (int x = 0; x < m_buf->width; x += (1 << log2BlockWidth))
5036  {
5037  int ctuIdx = (y >> log2BlockHeight) * m_numCTUsInWidth + (x >> log2BlockWidth);
5038  m_trainingDistortion[filterIdx][ctuIdx] =
5039  int(m_ctbDistortionUnfilter[compID][ctuIdx]
5040  + m_alfCovarianceCcAlf[compID - 1][0][0][ctuIdx].calcErrorForCcAlfCoeffs(
5041  ccAlfFilterCoeff[filterIdx], numCoeff, invFactor));
5042  }
5043  }
5044  }
5045  }
5046 
5047  m_CABACEstimator->getCtx() = ctxStartCcAlfFilterControlFlag;
5048 
5049  uint64_t curTotalDistortion = 0;
5050  double curTotalRate = 0;
5051  determineControlIdcValues(cs, compID, m_buf, ctuWidthC, ctuHeightC, picWidthC, picHeightC,
5052  m_ctbDistortionUnfilter, m_trainingDistortion,
5053  m_lumaSwingGreaterThanThresholdCount,
5054  m_chromaSampleCountNearMidPoint,
5055  (referencingExistingAps == true),
5056  m_trainingCovControl, m_filterControl, curTotalDistortion, curTotalRate,
5057  ccAlfFilterIdxEnabled, mapFilterIdxToFilterIdc, ccAlfFilterCount);
5058 
5059  // compute coefficient coding bit cost
5060  if (ccAlfFilterCount > 0)
5061  {
5062  if (referencingExistingAps)
5063  {
5064  curTotalRate += 1 + 3; // +1 for enable flag, +3 APS ID in slice header
5065  }
5066  else
5067  {
5068  curTotalRate += getCoeffRateCcAlf(ccAlfFilterCoeff, ccAlfFilterIdxEnabled, ccAlfFilterCount, compID) + 1
5069  + 9; // +1 for the enable flag, +9 3-bit for APS ID, one in slice header, 5-bit for APS ID in APS, a 1-bit
5070  // new filter flags (ignore shared cost such as other new-filter flags/NALU header/RBSP
5071  // terminating bit/byte alignment bits)
5072  }
5073 
5074  double curTotalCost = curTotalRate * m_lambda[compID] + curTotalDistortion;
5075 
5076  if (curTotalCost < prevTotalCost)
5077  {
5078  prevTotalCost = curTotalCost;
5079  improvement = true;
5080  }
5081 
5082  if (curTotalCost < bestFilteredTotalCost)
5083  {
5084  bestFilteredTotalCost = curTotalCost;
5085  memcpy(m_bestFilterIdxEnabled, ccAlfFilterIdxEnabled, sizeof(ccAlfFilterIdxEnabled));
5086  memcpy(m_bestFilterCoeffSet, ccAlfFilterCoeff, sizeof(ccAlfFilterCoeff));
5087  memcpy(m_bestFilterControl, m_filterControl, sizeof(uint8_t) * m_numCTUsInPic);
5088  m_bestFilterCount = ccAlfFilterCount;
5089  ccalfReuseApsId = referencingExistingAps ? apsIds[testFilterIdx] : -1;
5090  memcpy(bestMapFilterIdxToFilterIdc, mapFilterIdxToFilterIdc, sizeof(mapFilterIdxToFilterIdc));
5091  }
5092  }
5093 
5094  trainingIterCount++;
5095  if (!improvement || trainingIterCount > maxTrainingIterCount || referencingExistingAps)
5096  {
5097  keepTraining = false;
5098  }
5099  }
5100  }
5101  }
5102 
5103  if (bestUnfilteredTotalCost < bestFilteredTotalCost)
5104  {
5105  memset(m_bestFilterControl, 0, sizeof(uint8_t) * m_numCTUsInPic);
5106  }
5107 
5108  // save best coeff and control
5109  bool atleastOneBlockUndergoesFitlering = false;
5110  for (int controlIdx = 0; m_bestFilterCount > 0 && controlIdx < m_numCTUsInPic; controlIdx++)
5111  {
5112  if (m_bestFilterControl[controlIdx])
5113  {
5114  atleastOneBlockUndergoesFitlering = true;
5115  break;
5116  }
5117  }
5118  m_ccAlfFilterParam.numberValidComponents = getNumberValidComponents(m_chromaFormat);
5119  m_ccAlfFilterParam.ccAlfFilterEnabled[compID - 1] = atleastOneBlockUndergoesFitlering;
5120  if (atleastOneBlockUndergoesFitlering)
5121  {
5122  // update the filter control indicators
5123  if (bestreuseTemporalFilterCoeff!=1)
5124  {
5125  short storedBestFilterCoeffSet[MAX_NUM_CC_ALF_FILTERS][MAX_NUM_CC_ALF_CHROMA_COEFF];
5126  for (int filterIdx=0; filterIdx<MAX_NUM_CC_ALF_FILTERS; filterIdx++)
5127  {
5128  memcpy(storedBestFilterCoeffSet[filterIdx], m_bestFilterCoeffSet[filterIdx], sizeof(m_bestFilterCoeffSet[filterIdx]));
5129  }
5130  memcpy(m_filterControl, m_bestFilterControl, sizeof(uint8_t) * m_numCTUsInPic);
5131 
5132  int filterCount = 0;
5133  for ( int filterIdx = 0; filterIdx < MAX_NUM_CC_ALF_FILTERS; filterIdx++ )
5134  {
5135  uint8_t curFilterIdc = bestMapFilterIdxToFilterIdc[filterIdx];
5136  if (m_bestFilterIdxEnabled[filterIdx])
5137  {
5138  for (int controlIdx = 0; controlIdx < m_numCTUsInPic; controlIdx++)
5139  {
5140  if (m_filterControl[controlIdx] == (filterIdx+1) )
5141  {
5142  m_bestFilterControl[controlIdx] = curFilterIdc;
5143  }
5144  }
5145  memcpy( m_bestFilterCoeffSet[curFilterIdc-1], storedBestFilterCoeffSet[filterIdx], sizeof(storedBestFilterCoeffSet[filterIdx]) );
5146  filterCount++;
5147  }
5148  m_bestFilterIdxEnabled[filterIdx] = ( filterIdx < m_bestFilterCount ) ? true : false;
5149  }
5150  CHECK( filterCount != m_bestFilterCount, "Number of filters enabled did not match the filter count");
5151  }
5152 
5153  m_ccAlfFilterParam.ccAlfFilterCount[compID - 1] = m_bestFilterCount;
5154  // cleanup before copying
5155  memset(m_ccAlfFilterControl[compID - 1], 0, sizeof(uint8_t) * m_numCTUsInPic);
5156  for ( int filterIdx = 0; filterIdx < MAX_NUM_CC_ALF_FILTERS; filterIdx++ )
5157  {
5158  memset(m_ccAlfFilterParam.ccAlfCoeff[compID - 1][filterIdx], 0,
5159  sizeof(m_ccAlfFilterParam.ccAlfCoeff[compID - 1][filterIdx]));
5160  }
5161  memset(m_ccAlfFilterParam.ccAlfFilterIdxEnabled[compID - 1], false,
5162  sizeof(m_ccAlfFilterParam.ccAlfFilterIdxEnabled[compID - 1]));
5163  for ( int filterIdx = 0; filterIdx < m_bestFilterCount; filterIdx++ )
5164  {
5165  m_ccAlfFilterParam.ccAlfFilterIdxEnabled[compID - 1][filterIdx] = m_bestFilterIdxEnabled[filterIdx];
5166  memcpy(m_ccAlfFilterParam.ccAlfCoeff[compID - 1][filterIdx], m_bestFilterCoeffSet[filterIdx],
5167  sizeof(m_bestFilterCoeffSet[filterIdx]));
5168  }
5169  memcpy(m_ccAlfFilterControl[compID - 1], m_bestFilterControl, sizeof(uint8_t) * m_numCTUsInPic);
5170  if ( ccalfReuseApsId >= 0 )
5171  {
5172  m_reuseApsId[compID - 1] = ccalfReuseApsId;
5173  if (compID == COMP_Cb)
5174  {
5175  cs.slice->tileGroupCcAlfCbApsId = ccalfReuseApsId;
5176  }
5177  else
5178  {
5179  cs.slice->tileGroupCcAlfCrApsId = ccalfReuseApsId;
5180  }
5181  }
5182  }
5183 }
5184 
5185 void EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::deriveStatsForCcAlfFiltering(const PelUnitBuf &orgYuv, const PelUnitBuf &recYuv,
5186  const int compIdx, const int maskStride,
5187  const uint8_t filterIdc, CodingStructure &cs)
5188 {
5189  const int filterIdx = filterIdc - 1;
5190 
5191  // init CTU stats buffers
5192  for( int shape = 0; shape != m_filterShapesCcAlf[compIdx-1].size(); shape++ )
5193  {
5194  for (int ctuIdx = 0; ctuIdx < m_numCTUsInPic; ctuIdx++)
5195  {
5196  m_alfCovarianceCcAlf[compIdx - 1][shape][filterIdx][ctuIdx].reset();
5197  }
5198  }
5199 
5200  // init Frame stats buffers
5201  for (int shape = 0; shape != m_filterShapesCcAlf[compIdx - 1].size(); shape++)
5202  {
5203  m_alfCovarianceFrameCcAlf[compIdx - 1][shape][filterIdx].reset();
5204  }
5205 
5206  int ctuRsAddr = 0;
5207  const PreCalcValues &pcv = *cs.pcv;
5208  bool clipTop = false, clipBottom = false, clipLeft = false, clipRight = false;
5209  int numHorVirBndry = 0, numVerVirBndry = 0;
5210  int horVirBndryPos[] = { 0, 0, 0 };
5211  int verVirBndryPos[] = { 0, 0, 0 };
5212 
5213  for (int yPos = 0; yPos < m_picHeight; yPos += m_maxCUHeight)
5214  {
5215  for (int xPos = 0; xPos < m_picWidth; xPos += m_maxCUWidth)
5216  {
5217 // if (m_trainingCovControl[ctuRsAddr] == filterIdc)
5218  {
5219  const int width = (xPos + m_maxCUWidth > m_picWidth) ? (m_picWidth - xPos) : m_maxCUWidth;
5220  const int height = (yPos + m_maxCUHeight > m_picHeight) ? (m_picHeight - yPos) : m_maxCUHeight;
5221  int rasterSliceAlfPad = 0;
5222  if (isCrossedByVirtualBoundaries(cs, xPos, yPos, width, height, clipTop, clipBottom, clipLeft, clipRight,
5223  numHorVirBndry, numVerVirBndry, horVirBndryPos, verVirBndryPos,
5224  rasterSliceAlfPad))
5225  {
5226  int yStart = yPos;
5227  for (int i = 0; i <= numHorVirBndry; i++)
5228  {
5229  const int yEnd = i == numHorVirBndry ? yPos + height : horVirBndryPos[i];
5230  const int h = yEnd - yStart;
5231  const bool clipT = (i == 0 && clipTop) || (i > 0) || (yStart == 0);
5232  const bool clipB = (i == numHorVirBndry && clipBottom) || (i < numHorVirBndry) || (yEnd == pcv.lumaHeight);
5233  int xStart = xPos;
5234  for (int j = 0; j <= numVerVirBndry; j++)
5235  {
5236  const int xEnd = j == numVerVirBndry ? xPos + width : verVirBndryPos[j];
5237  const int w = xEnd - xStart;
5238  const bool clipL = (j == 0 && clipLeft) || (j > 0) || (xStart == 0);
5239  const bool clipR = (j == numVerVirBndry && clipRight) || (j < numVerVirBndry) || (xEnd == pcv.lumaWidth);
5240  const int wBuf = w + (clipL ? 0 : MAX_ALF_PADDING_SIZE) + (clipR ? 0 : MAX_ALF_PADDING_SIZE);
5241  const int hBuf = h + (clipT ? 0 : MAX_ALF_PADDING_SIZE) + (clipB ? 0 : MAX_ALF_PADDING_SIZE);
5242  PelUnitBuf recBuf = m_tempBuf2.subBuf(UnitArea(cs.area.chromaFormat, Area(0, 0, wBuf, hBuf)));
5243  recBuf.copyFrom(recYuv.subBuf(
5244  UnitArea(cs.area.chromaFormat, Area(xStart - (clipL ? 0 : MAX_ALF_PADDING_SIZE),
5245  yStart - (clipT ? 0 : MAX_ALF_PADDING_SIZE), wBuf, hBuf))));
5246  // pad top-left unavailable samples for raster slice
5247  if (xStart == xPos && yStart == yPos && (rasterSliceAlfPad & 1))
5248  {
5249  recBuf.padBorderPel(MAX_ALF_PADDING_SIZE, 1);
5250  }
5251 
5252  // pad bottom-right unavailable samples for raster slice
5253  if (xEnd == xPos + width && yEnd == yPos + height && (rasterSliceAlfPad & 2))
5254  {
5255  recBuf.padBorderPel(MAX_ALF_PADDING_SIZE, 2);
5256  }
5257  recBuf.extendBorderPel(MAX_ALF_PADDING_SIZE);
5258  recBuf = recBuf.subBuf(UnitArea(
5259  cs.area.chromaFormat, Area(clipL ? 0 : MAX_ALF_PADDING_SIZE, clipT ? 0 : MAX_ALF_PADDING_SIZE, w, h)));
5260 
5261  const UnitArea area(m_chromaFormat, Area(0, 0, w, h));
5262  const UnitArea areaDst(m_chromaFormat, Area(xStart, yStart, w, h));
5263 
5264  const ComponentID compID = ComponentID(compIdx);
5265 
5266  for (int shape = 0; shape != m_filterShapesCcAlf[compIdx - 1].size(); shape++)
5267  {
5268  getBlkStatsCcAlf(m_alfCovarianceCcAlf[compIdx - 1][0][filterIdx][ctuRsAddr],
5269  m_filterShapesCcAlf[compIdx - 1][shape], orgYuv, recBuf, areaDst, area, compID, yPos);
5270  m_alfCovarianceFrameCcAlf[compIdx - 1][shape][filterIdx] +=
5271  m_alfCovarianceCcAlf[compIdx - 1][shape][filterIdx][ctuRsAddr];
5272  }
5273 
5274  xStart = xEnd;
5275  }
5276 
5277  yStart = yEnd;
5278  }
5279  }
5280  else
5281  {
5282  const UnitArea area(m_chromaFormat, Area(xPos, yPos, width, height));
5283 
5284  const ComponentID compID = ComponentID(compIdx);
5285 
5286  for (int shape = 0; shape != m_filterShapesCcAlf[compIdx - 1].size(); shape++)
5287  {
5288  getBlkStatsCcAlf(m_alfCovarianceCcAlf[compIdx - 1][0][filterIdx][ctuRsAddr],
5289  m_filterShapesCcAlf[compIdx - 1][shape], orgYuv, recYuv, area, area, compID, yPos);
5290  m_alfCovarianceFrameCcAlf[compIdx - 1][shape][filterIdx] +=
5291  m_alfCovarianceCcAlf[compIdx - 1][shape][filterIdx][ctuRsAddr];
5292  }
5293  }
5294  }
5295  ctuRsAddr++;
5296  }
5297  }
5298 }
5299 
5300 void EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::getBlkStatsCcAlf(AlfCovariance &alfCovariance, const AlfFilterShape &shape,
5301  const PelUnitBuf &orgYuv, const PelUnitBuf &recYuv,
5302  const UnitArea &areaDst, const UnitArea &area, const ComponentID compID,
5303  const int yPos)
5304 {
5305  const CompArea &compArea = areaDst.block(compID);
5306 
5307  int recStride = recYuv.get(COMP_Y).stride;
5308  const Pel* rec = recYuv.get(COMP_Y).bufAt(area.lumaPos());
5309 
5310  int slfStride = recYuv.get(compID).stride;
5311  const Pel* slf = recYuv.get(compID).bufAt(compArea);
5312 
5313  int orgStride = orgYuv.get(compID).stride;
5314  const Pel *org = orgYuv.get(compID).bufAt(compArea);
5315 
5316  int vbCTUHeight = m_alfVBLumaCTUHeight;
5317  int vbPos = m_alfVBLumaPos;
5318 
5319  if ((yPos + m_maxCUHeight) >= m_picHeight)
5320  {
5321  vbPos = m_picHeight;
5322  }
5323 
5324  CHECK( ( compArea.width & 3 ) != 0, "Area width has to be a multiple of 4!" );
5325  CHECK( ( compArea.height & 3 ) != 0, "Area width has to be a multiple of 4!" );
5326  CHECK( isLuma( compID ), "Only chroma can be analysed in CCALF!" );
5327 
5328  int effStride = recStride << getComponentScaleY(compID, m_chromaFormat);
5329 
5330  Pel ELocal[MAX_NUM_CC_ALF_CHROMA_COEFF][16];
5331  Pel yLocal[4][4];
5332  double weight[4][4];
5333 
5334  for (int i = 0; i < compArea.height; i += 4)
5335  {
5336  int vbDistance0 = (((i+0) << getComponentScaleX(compID, m_chromaFormat)) % vbCTUHeight) - vbPos;
5337  int vbDistance1 = (((i+1) << getComponentScaleX(compID, m_chromaFormat)) % vbCTUHeight) - vbPos;
5338  int vbDistance2 = (((i+2) << getComponentScaleX(compID, m_chromaFormat)) % vbCTUHeight) - vbPos;
5339  int vbDistance3 = (((i+3) << getComponentScaleX(compID, m_chromaFormat)) % vbCTUHeight) - vbPos;
5340 
5341  const Pel* recLine[4] = { &rec[0], &rec[effStride], &rec[2 * effStride], &rec[3 * effStride] };
5342  const Pel* orgLine[4] = { &org[0], &org[orgStride], &org[2 * orgStride], &org[3 * orgStride] };
5343  const Pel* slfLine[4] = { &slf[0], &slf[slfStride], &slf[2 * slfStride], &slf[3 * slfStride] };
5344 
5345  for (int j = 0; j < compArea.width; j += 4)
5346  {
5347  for (int ii = 0; ii < 4; ii++) for (int jj = 0; jj < 4; jj++)
5348  {
5349  yLocal[ii][jj] = orgLine[ii][j + jj] - slfLine[ii][j + jj];
5350  }
5351 
5352  calcCovariance4CcAlf(ELocal, 0, recLine[0] + (j << getChannelTypeScaleX(CH_C, m_chromaFormat)), recStride, shape, vbDistance0);
5353  calcCovariance4CcAlf(ELocal, 4, recLine[1] + (j << getChannelTypeScaleX(CH_C, m_chromaFormat)), recStride, shape, vbDistance1);
5354  calcCovariance4CcAlf(ELocal, 8, recLine[2] + (j << getChannelTypeScaleX(CH_C, m_chromaFormat)), recStride, shape, vbDistance2);
5355  calcCovariance4CcAlf(ELocal, 12, recLine[3] + (j << getChannelTypeScaleX(CH_C, m_chromaFormat)), recStride, shape, vbDistance3);
5356 
5357  if( m_alfWSSD )
5358  {
5359  for (int ii = 0; ii < 4; ii++) for (int jj = 0; jj < 4; jj++)
5360  {
5361  weight[ii][jj] = m_lumaLevelToWeightPLUT[orgLine[ii][j + jj]];
5362  }
5363 
5364  for( int k = 0; k < ( shape.numCoeff - 1 ); k++ )
5365  {
5366  for( int l = k; l < ( shape.numCoeff - 1 ); l++ )
5367  {
5368  double sum = 0;
5369  for (int ii = 0; ii < 4; ii++) for (int jj = 0; jj < 4; jj++)
5370  {
5371  sum += weight[ii][jj] * int( ELocal[k][(ii << 2) + jj] ) * ELocal[l][(ii << 2) + jj];
5372  }
5373  alfCovariance.E[0][0][k][l] += sum;
5374  }
5375 
5376  double sum = 0;
5377  for (int ii = 0; ii < 4; ii++) for (int jj = 0; jj < 4; jj++)
5378  {
5379  sum += weight[ii][jj] * int( ELocal[k][(ii << 2) + jj] ) * yLocal[ii][jj];
5380  }
5381  alfCovariance.y[0][k] += sum;
5382  }
5383 
5384 
5385  double sum = 0;
5386  for (int ii = 0; ii < 4; ii++) for (int jj = 0; jj < 4; jj++)
5387  {
5388  sum += weight[ii][jj] * int( yLocal[ii][jj] ) * yLocal[ii][jj];
5389  }
5390  alfCovariance.pixAcc += sum;
5391  }
5392  else
5393  {
5394 #if defined( TARGET_SIMD_X86 ) && ENABLE_SIMD_OPT_ALF
5395  if (read_x86_extension_flags() > SCALAR)
5396  {
5397  const __m128i mylocal0 = _mm_loadu_si128((const __m128i*) & yLocal[0][0]);
5398  const __m128i mylocal8 = _mm_loadu_si128((const __m128i*) & yLocal[2][0]);
5399 
5400  for (int k = 0; k < shape.numCoeff; k++)
5401  {
5402  const Pel* Elocalk = &ELocal[k][0];
5403  double* cov = &alfCovariance.E[0][0][k][k];
5404 
5405  const __m128i melocalk0 = _mm_loadu_si128((const __m128i*) & Elocalk[0]);
5406  const __m128i melocalk8 = _mm_loadu_si128((const __m128i*) & Elocalk[8]);
5407 
5408  for (int l = k; l < shape.numCoeff; l++)
5409  {
5410  const Pel* Elocall = &ELocal[l][0];
5411 
5412  const __m128i melocall0 = _mm_loadu_si128((const __m128i*) & Elocall[0]);
5413  const __m128i melocall8 = _mm_loadu_si128((const __m128i*) & Elocall[8]);
5414 
5415  const __m128i mmacc0 = _mm_madd_epi16(melocalk0, melocall0);
5416  const __m128i mmacc8 = _mm_madd_epi16(melocalk8, melocall8);
5417 
5418  __m128i mmacc = _mm_add_epi32(mmacc0, mmacc8);
5419  mmacc = _mm_hadd_epi32(mmacc, mmacc);
5420  mmacc = _mm_hadd_epi32(mmacc, mmacc);
5421 
5422  *cov++ += _mm_extract_epi32(mmacc, 0);
5423  }
5424 
5425  const __m128i mmacc0 = _mm_madd_epi16(melocalk0, mylocal0);
5426  const __m128i mmacc8 = _mm_madd_epi16(melocalk8, mylocal8);
5427 
5428  __m128i mmacc = _mm_add_epi32(mmacc0, mmacc8);
5429  mmacc = _mm_hadd_epi32(mmacc, mmacc);
5430  mmacc = _mm_hadd_epi32(mmacc, mmacc);
5431 
5432  alfCovariance.y[0][k] += _mm_extract_epi32(mmacc, 0);
5433  }
5434 
5435  const __m128i mmacc0 = _mm_madd_epi16(mylocal0, mylocal0);
5436  const __m128i mmacc8 = _mm_madd_epi16(mylocal8, mylocal8);
5437 
5438  __m128i mmacc = _mm_add_epi32(mmacc0, mmacc8);
5439  mmacc = _mm_hadd_epi32(mmacc, mmacc);
5440  mmacc = _mm_hadd_epi32(mmacc, mmacc);
5441 
5442  alfCovariance.pixAcc += _mm_extract_epi32(mmacc, 0);
5443  }
5444  else
5445 #endif
5446  {
5447  for( int k = 0; k < ( shape.numCoeff - 1 ); k++ )
5448  {
5449  for( int l = k; l < ( shape.numCoeff - 1 ); l++ )
5450  {
5451  int sum = 0;
5452  for (int ii = 0; ii < 4; ii++) for (int jj = 0; jj < 4; jj++)
5453  {
5454  sum += int( ELocal[k][(ii << 2) + jj] ) * ELocal[l][(ii << 2) + jj];
5455  }
5456  alfCovariance.E[0][0][k][l] += sum;
5457  }
5458 
5459  int sum = 0;
5460  for (int ii = 0; ii < 4; ii++) for (int jj = 0; jj < 4; jj++)
5461  {
5462  sum += int( ELocal[k][(ii << 2) + jj] ) * yLocal[ii][jj];
5463  }
5464  alfCovariance.y[0][k] += sum;
5465  }
5466 
5467 
5468  int sum = 0;
5469  for (int ii = 0; ii < 4; ii++) for (int jj = 0; jj < 4; jj++)
5470  {
5471  sum += int( yLocal[ii][jj] ) * yLocal[ii][jj];
5472  }
5473  alfCovariance.pixAcc += sum;
5474  }
5475  }
5476  }
5477 
5478  slf += (slfStride << 2);
5479  org += (orgStride << 2);
5480  rec += (effStride << 2);
5481  }
5482 
5483  for (int k = 1; k < (MAX_NUM_CC_ALF_CHROMA_COEFF - 1); k++)
5484  {
5485  for (int l = 0; l < k; l++)
5486  {
5487  alfCovariance.E[0][0][k][l] = alfCovariance.E[0][0][l][k];
5488  }
5489  }
5490 }
5491 
5492 void EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::calcCovariance4CcAlf(Pel ELocal[MAX_NUM_CC_ALF_CHROMA_COEFF][16], const int N, const Pel* rec, const int stride, const AlfFilterShape& shape, int vbDistance)
5493 {
5494  CHECK(shape.filterType != CC_ALF, "Bad CC ALF shape");
5495 
5496  const Pel* recYM1 = rec - 1 * stride;
5497  const Pel* recY0 = rec;
5498  const Pel* recYP1 = rec + 1 * stride;
5499  const Pel* recYP2 = rec + 2 * stride;
5500 
5501  if (vbDistance == -2 || vbDistance == +1)
5502  {
5503  recYP2 = recYP1;
5504  }
5505  else if (vbDistance == -1 || vbDistance == 0)
5506  {
5507  recYM1 = recY0;
5508  recYP2 = recYP1 = recY0;
5509  }
5510 
5511  const int dx0 = 0;
5512  const int dx1 = 1 << getChannelTypeScaleX( CH_C, m_chromaFormat );
5513  const int dx2 = dx1 << 1;
5514  const int dx3 = dx1 + dx2;
5515 
5516  const Pel centerValue0 = recY0[+dx0];
5517  const Pel centerValue1 = recY0[+dx1];
5518  const Pel centerValue2 = recY0[+dx2];
5519  const Pel centerValue3 = recY0[+dx3];
5520 
5521  ELocal[0][N+0] = recYM1[+0+dx0] - centerValue0;
5522  ELocal[0][N+1] = recYM1[+0+dx1] - centerValue1;
5523  ELocal[0][N+2] = recYM1[+0+dx2] - centerValue2;
5524  ELocal[0][N+3] = recYM1[+0+dx3] - centerValue3;
5525 
5526  ELocal[1][N+0] = recY0[ -1+dx0] - centerValue0;
5527  ELocal[1][N+1] = recY0[ -1+dx1] - centerValue1;
5528  ELocal[1][N+2] = recY0[ -1+dx2] - centerValue2;
5529  ELocal[1][N+3] = recY0[ -1+dx3] - centerValue3;
5530 
5531  ELocal[2][N+0] = recY0[ +1+dx0] - centerValue0;
5532  ELocal[2][N+1] = recY0[ +1+dx1] - centerValue1;
5533  ELocal[2][N+2] = recY0[ +1+dx2] - centerValue2;
5534  ELocal[2][N+3] = recY0[ +1+dx3] - centerValue3;
5535 
5536  ELocal[3][N+0] = recYP1[-1+dx0] - centerValue0;
5537  ELocal[3][N+1] = recYP1[-1+dx1] - centerValue1;
5538  ELocal[3][N+2] = recYP1[-1+dx2] - centerValue2;
5539  ELocal[3][N+3] = recYP1[-1+dx3] - centerValue3;
5540 
5541  ELocal[4][N+0] = recYP1[+0+dx0] - centerValue0;
5542  ELocal[4][N+1] = recYP1[+0+dx1] - centerValue1;
5543  ELocal[4][N+2] = recYP1[+0+dx2] - centerValue2;
5544  ELocal[4][N+3] = recYP1[+0+dx3] - centerValue3;
5545 
5546  ELocal[5][N+0] = recYP1[+1+dx0] - centerValue0;
5547  ELocal[5][N+1] = recYP1[+1+dx1] - centerValue1;
5548  ELocal[5][N+2] = recYP1[+1+dx2] - centerValue2;
5549  ELocal[5][N+3] = recYP1[+1+dx3] - centerValue3;
5550 
5551  ELocal[6][N+0] = recYP2[+0+dx0] - centerValue0;
5552  ELocal[6][N+1] = recYP2[+0+dx1] - centerValue1;
5553  ELocal[6][N+2] = recYP2[+0+dx2] - centerValue2;
5554  ELocal[6][N+3] = recYP2[+0+dx3] - centerValue3;
5555 }
5556 
5557 void EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::calcCovarianceCcAlf(Pel ELocal[MAX_NUM_CC_ALF_CHROMA_COEFF], const Pel *rec, const int stride, const AlfFilterShape& shape, int vbDistance)
5558 {
5559  CHECK(shape.filterType != CC_ALF, "Bad CC ALF shape");
5560 
5561  const Pel *recYM1 = rec - 1 * stride;
5562  const Pel *recY0 = rec;
5563  const Pel *recYP1 = rec + 1 * stride;
5564  const Pel *recYP2 = rec + 2 * stride;
5565 
5566  if (vbDistance == -2 || vbDistance == +1)
5567  {
5568  recYP2 = recYP1;
5569  }
5570  else if (vbDistance == -1 || vbDistance == 0)
5571  {
5572  recYM1 = recY0;
5573  recYP2 = recYP1 = recY0;
5574  }
5575 
5576  const Pel centerValue = recY0[+0];
5577 
5578  ELocal[0] += recYM1[+0] - centerValue;
5579  ELocal[1] += recY0 [-1] - centerValue;
5580  ELocal[2] += recY0 [+1] - centerValue;
5581  ELocal[3] += recYP1[-1] - centerValue;
5582  ELocal[4] += recYP1[+0] - centerValue;
5583  ELocal[5] += recYP1[+1] - centerValue;
5584  ELocal[6] += recYP2[+0] - centerValue;
5585 }
5586 
5587 void EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::countLumaSwingGreaterThanThreshold(const Pel* luma, int lumaStride, int height, int width, int log2BlockWidth, int log2BlockHeight, uint64_t* lumaSwingGreaterThanThresholdCount, int lumaCountStride)
5588 {
5589  const int lumaBitDepth = m_inputBitDepth[CH_L];
5590  const int threshold = (1 << ( m_inputBitDepth[CH_L] - 2 )) - 1;
5591 
5592  // 3x4 Diamond
5593  int xSupport[] = { 0, -1, 0, 1, -1, 0, 1, 0 };
5594  int ySupport[] = { -1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 1, 1, 2 };
5595 
5596  for (int y = 0; y < height; y += (1 << log2BlockHeight))
5597  {
5598  for (int x = 0; x < width; x += (1 << log2BlockWidth))
5599  {
5600  lumaSwingGreaterThanThresholdCount[(y >> log2BlockHeight) * lumaCountStride + (x >> log2BlockWidth)] = 0;
5601 
5602  for (int yOff = 0; yOff < (1 << log2BlockHeight); yOff++)
5603  {
5604  for (int xOff = 0; xOff < (1 << log2BlockWidth); xOff++)
5605  {
5606  if ((y + yOff) >= (height - 2) || (x + xOff) >= (width - 1) || (y + yOff) < 1 || (x + xOff) < 1) // only consider samples that are fully supported by picture
5607  {
5608  continue;
5609  }
5610 
5611  int minVal = ((1 << lumaBitDepth) - 1);
5612  int maxVal = 0;
5613  for (int i = 0; i < 8; i++)
5614  {
5615  Pel p = luma[(yOff + ySupport[i]) * lumaStride + x + xOff + xSupport[i]];
5616 
5617  if ( p < minVal )
5618  {
5619  minVal = p;
5620  }
5621  if ( p > maxVal )
5622  {
5623  maxVal = p;
5624  }
5625  }
5626 
5627  if ((maxVal - minVal) > threshold)
5628  {
5629  lumaSwingGreaterThanThresholdCount[(y >> log2BlockHeight) * lumaCountStride + (x >> log2BlockWidth)]++;
5630  }
5631  }
5632  }
5633  }
5634  luma += (lumaStride << log2BlockHeight);
5635  }
5636 }
5637 
5638 void EncAdaptiveLoopFilter::countChromaSampleValueNearMidPoint(const Pel* chroma, int chromaStride, int height, int width, int log2BlockWidth, int log2BlockHeight, uint64_t* chromaSampleCountNearMidPoint, int chromaSampleCountNearMidPointStride)
5639 {
5640  const int midPoint = (1 << m_inputBitDepth[CH_C]) >> 1;
5641  const int threshold = 16;
5642 
5643  for (int y = 0; y < height; y += (1 << log2BlockHeight))
5644  {
5645  for (int x = 0; x < width; x += (1 << log2BlockWidth))
5646  {
5647  chromaSampleCountNearMidPoint[(y >> log2BlockHeight)* chromaSampleCountNearMidPointStride + (x >> log2BlockWidth)] = 0;
5648 
5649  for (int yOff = 0; yOff < (1 << log2BlockHeight); yOff++)
5650  {
5651  for (int xOff = 0; xOff < (1 << log2BlockWidth); xOff++)
5652  {
5653  if ((y + yOff) >= height || (x + xOff) >= width)
5654  {
5655  continue;
5656  }
5657 
5658  int distanceToMidPoint = abs(chroma[yOff * chromaStride + x + xOff] - midPoint);
5659  if (distanceToMidPoint < threshold)
5660  {
5661  chromaSampleCountNearMidPoint[(y >> log2BlockHeight)* chromaSampleCountNearMidPointStride + (x >> log2BlockWidth)]++;
5662  }
5663  }
5664  }
5665  }
5666  chroma += (chromaStride << log2BlockHeight);
5667  }
5668 }
5669 
5670 } // namespace vvenc
